Reviews.Content: Works very well. My only complaint is that even though I measured how long the cable would need to be, it barely reaches between components after you get done routing it so that it will not be visible. In the future I would order the next longer length.

Reviews.Title: cheap and great
Reviews.Author: Susan D
Reviews.Content: this works great for the price! I am happy with my purchase. No need to buy an expensive cable. Thumbs up

Reviews.Title: Awesomeness!!!
Reviews.Author: Mr. Yazen J. Qafisheh
Reviews.Content: My wife & I use this in our new place with her computer that I bought her. It's got an HDMI out. We do have a smart TV but I fiddled with that feature when we first got our TV & it's a dumb feature. Coneecting the HDMI to her computer takes literally 5 seconds. My smart TV function takes 10 to 15 seconds to launch, then you gotta go through some menus... whatever. I don't have the time or patience to deal with that everytime we wanna hook up her computer to the tv.When connected to her computer, the tv fires up the super crisp image immediately. We've used the cord to watch movies, wedding & honeymoon videos & pictures, etc. We needed a 15' one so that we can comfortably sit on the couch & use the laptop with the long HDMI cord plugged into the computer & TV. The setup works VERY well.Picture quality is awesome with this thing, audio is very good too. My home theater receiver is from 2000, it does not have HDMI capability, Only optical inputs. I have an optical out from the TV running to the receiver. I've tested the audio from a souce that ran 5.1 Digital Digital output to the receiver then compared to the audio the receiver put out after receiving the non 5.1 signal from the TV. It was VERY similar. It was not as good, I'm sure, as if I had an HDMI receiver that would be able to use an HDMI out from my TV, but I'm not too worried about getting 100% 5.1 audio from watching a quick video on the TV off the computer. The rear surround speakers still put out audio, it's just not as defined as it would've been had I had an HDMI receiver. I thing when there's an optical link somewhere in the HDMI connection, it prevents 5.1 & downgrades it possibly as part of that DHCP business.All in all, super nice cord, high quality connector ends. The cord itself is nice & fat, a good sign. Lots of shielding, I'm sure. To use & put away, our cord has contoured to a certain pattern of how I winded the cable when not in use. It's pretty easy to get it to go back to the coiled pattern after we're done using it each time. We then just tuck the coil under the left corner of the TV in the TV slot of our big bookshelf style entertainment center. I really like this cable & would very much recommend it if it's something that your particular setup is calling for.***EDIT - 2/02/14 - I was still curious & not definitive/ entirely convinced about the HDMI in (to the tv, source is the Comcast X1 cable box), optical out (running via an optical cable from my relatively newer 60" Sharp Aquos to my old-school, circa 2000 Pioneer 500w home theater 5.1 Dolby Digital receiver). The 1st article I came across after Googling this issue instructed to see if the tv has an option in the set-up menu to change the audio out from PCM to Dolby Digital or raw. There, indeed, was an option to toggle it & it actually worked on my set-up :D The option, though, was not in audio settings on my tv menus, as one would think... It was under the "system options" menu then under "terminal settings." Then there's an "audio setup." It was on PCM, I switched it to Bitsream. 5.1 Baby!!! I'm pretty fortunate to have caught this now & not much later down the road. I've had the tv for about 4 months... Better late than never I guess.***EDIT #2 - From time to time I'll listen to channel 703 on my Comcast box. It's the EDM (Electronic Dance Music) channel in the block of music channels. Actually, the audio sounded like s*** when ouput in 5.1 Dolby Digital. It was severely lacking lacking subwoofer bass. So I switched the signal back to PCM just for this application. The bass was back & it sounded a lot better. The Bitstream setting works better for movies & shows that output 5.1 Dolby Digital. For music channels, the PCM output is better. Think about it, most music is simply in stereo with some bass. So it makes sense that the PCM output would be MUCH better for music.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME
Reviews.Author: Lucas Allen Seidel
Reviews.Content: This is way cheaper and works just as well as the $59.99 Monster HDMI cable BestBuy keeps trying to sell me.

Reviews.Title: great price and great hdmi cable
Reviews.Author: Geek Queen "Geek Queen"
Reviews.Content: I use HDMI cable in my classes all the time when I teach or meet with students.  The cable is well made and never fails. You cannot beat the price for the quality. I would go longer than you think you will need by at least 3 feet.

Reviews.Title: Surprisingly great quality
Reviews.Author: Shawn M. Adams
Reviews.Content: AmazonBasics have good quality products that are significantly cheaper than the other name brand items.  I am exclusively purchasing AmazonBasics products at this point and have seen absolutely no degradation in quality of the product itself.

Reviews.Title: Great cables

Reviews.Content: They work beautifully all the time, and I have no HDMI "Fall out" with these cables. The price is pretty good. You will like them, and they are the latest HDMI version.

Reviews.Content: I use it to hook my HTPC to TV, it does the job as well as any other HDMI cord...for much less money.  Ill definitely consider AmazonBasics moving forward for other items.

Reviews.Title: Yep. Love It

Reviews.Title: great quality and cost

Reviews.Title: no complaints
Reviews.Author: Sly Piggle
Reviews.Content: I've had this for over a year now and it still performing to expectations.  Good price and equal to other expensive ones.

Reviews.Title: Great price.

Reviews.Content: This is a quality cable for a great price. Amazon also offers different lengths which was nice, too. I found that this cable saved me a lot more money than those found in electronic stores and it served it's purpose equally. I highly recommend.

Reviews.Content: Ordered This cable and it arrived early, Not much I can say about an HDMI cable other than it works well and it is an Amazon branded cable. This cable works as well as the name brand one I bought for 5 times the price at Walmart.

Reviews.Title: Meets my needs at excellent price

Reviews.Content: I shopped around for a cable for my new TV in my office.  I sure didn't want to pay the prices at the Big Box stores.  This cable was very reasonably priced and does the job!  Highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: It's a good cable.

Reviews.Content: It's a good cable , & was  a very good price.  I would recommend it.  It was to long but I coiled i tup.

Reviews.Title: Cheap and gets the job done
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: I am not sure what else to put in this review. The cables were priced right and the quality was good.

Reviews.Title: Works Fine

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive and works great.

Reviews.Title: Works well.

Reviews.Title: Great Cable for the price

Reviews.Title: Perfect

Reviews.Content: What can you say? Good product, good price, does what it's supposed to. Why spend a fortune for cables when you can get these?

Reviews.Title: Good product

Reviews.Title: Great Product good price

Reviews.Title: Perfect

Reviews.Content: The headline says it all.Each time I have purchased an HDMI-compatible device from Amazon, I have included one of their Amazon basic HDMI cables.They have performed flawlessly for me, unlike the one the cable company gave me recently that this one is replacing.Recommended.

Reviews.Title: It is what it is.

Reviews.Content: Nothing wrong with it. I don't really understand how the Ethernet specs works. I just use it as a regular HDMI cable and it works fine. Wish I would've bought it just a little longer though.

Reviews.Title: amazon basics does the job... again
Reviews.Author: Msokaris
Reviews.Content: out of the many brands of cables i have used over the years this amazon basic cable was the best so far. i was skeptical that i was going to get a cheaper case because i was saving money, but that wasnt the case! the build quality was amazing. the refresh rate on my tv is very high. i worried that the cable wouldnt be able to keep up, but it could i was so amazed that i would definently purchase again from amazon basic in the future and i think you should too

Don't ever waste your money on "premium" HDMI cables (or any premium A/V cable); save your money and spend it improving some other part of your home theater system.

Reviews.Content: I have had trouble with some cheaper brands not making good contact, but these cables are solid feeling and make good solid contact. I have six of these and every one works perfectly.

Reviews.Content: For a not very tech-savvy person with zero experience with HDMI cables, this was a great purchase. Just plug and work, no need to tinker with settings.Love the quality of audio transfer

Reviews.Title: Works Geat
Reviews.Author: Norris G.
Reviews.Content: I have purchased other 'AmazonBasics" products in the past and each and everyone of them works perfectly and are still in use today and working just fine. Whenever i see the "AmazonBasics" logo and it is something i am looking for, i buy it, because i know i will pay a very reasonable price and it will be a quality product that will work for years to come. These HDMI cables work just as good as the ones i payed $50.00 for with my first flat screen tv, the $50.00 cables are long gone and these work as good or better than the expensive ones. You can actually feel the quality when you hold them in your hands, they may cost very little, but they are not cheap at all. They are high speed to handle the most powerful HD signals 1080i,1080P, 720P, 3D, HD sound and Ethernet. These are a really great product and i do recommend them.  Thanks

Reviews.Title: Amazing price and amazing picture with sound

This cable is perfect for using with gaming systems, or just with your local cable box. 9 Feet of a cable is enough for me, and there is plenty left for any future maneuvers with the TV. Worth buying!

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Lovin' life in Florida
Reviews.Content: No complaints.  Excellent product for the price.  Seems to compare well with others costing 2 to 3 times as much.

Reviews.Title: It's digital
Reviews.Author: D. Donovan
Reviews.Content: Digital is digital - don't spend big bucks for a HDMI Cable - there are some out there that sell for as much as $50. If the digital signal is there, a $5 HDMI will do the same job as the $50 HDMI.  Don't get taken.  Amazon cable has a great low price for these.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: melody miller
Reviews.Content: Durable, Great price for a good brand. Came in excellent condition. No problems with compatability between different brands of electronics.

Reviews.Title: A good cable
Reviews.Author: William Derbyshire "bderb"
Reviews.Content: Come on its a cable, it works, and it didnt cost too much. These things should come with their devices, Done

Reviews.Title: Bought 2, Neither Worked
Reviews.Author: C. Kluge
Reviews.Content: I mounted a year old TV and bought these to run through the wall. Went through all the effort of running cables and mounting TV while waiting for a receiver to show up because I assumed Amazon would sell quality products. I was wrong. When I finally hooked everything up, no signal. I could get one to work if I bypassed receiver and hooked direct to source, but other wouldn't even do that. I checked and the receiver works just fine with real cables. I'm so pissed I have to unmount TV and run new cables. I thought Amazon was a company I could trust.

I felt pretty confident in that the HDMI cable was branded by Amazon, but I can kindly report to my fellow consumers that this HDMI cable is top notch. i would have hesitate to order another, should I have any future HDMI peripheral needs.

Opened package and one was already coming off.  The plastic film covering them was behind the little things so a piece of plastic film is stuck behind 2 of the little brats.  Other than that, super.

Reviews.Title: Good times

Reviews.Content: It transmit the data well, you don't have to wrorry about the data getting stuck where there is a bend in the wire or anything

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: shackles4uall
Reviews.Content: It works perfectly. Why in the world the box stores charge so much for these things is beyond me. You can practically by a new cable for every tv/device you have installed for the price of one cable at WM

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: VonFang
Reviews.Content: Works great, good price.  I don't see why to pay more for expensive cables, I can't tell the difference from the higher priced ones.

Reviews.Title: High quality thick cable from Amazon
Reviews.Author: Jeremy S.
Reviews.Content: This is a very good cable - high quality, durable, no issues with respect to data quality/image quality, etc.It's from AmazonBasics, so you know that the price will be reasonable and Amazon will stand behind it.Now... why didn't I give it 5 stars?  The product picture is accurate.  This is one big thick cable.  Probably 8 mm wide.  I would have preferred to have a slimmer cable to snake up behind my TV and AV equipment.  Based on my experience, the slim HDMI cables from Monoprice offer a great value in a slimmer package, so you might consider those.  But with free Prime shipping from Amazon, the economics must be considered as well!

Reviews.Title: Dead right out of the box/envelope
Reviews.Author: WFDDeac
Reviews.Content: Had a professional installer put everything together for my entire home theatre.  Both Amazon HDMI cables, brand new, were dead.  So, I had to buy another from him.  And, I don't want to pay the cost to return.

Reviews.Title: 2 did not work for me
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Fight Fan"
Reviews.Content: First one I recieved would cut in and out, not a good connection/signal. Amazon sent me another, same deal. Returning them both.I have other HDMI cables that work just fine on the same components.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Predatoress
Reviews.Content: This is a great cable. It seems to hold up well to kinks and bens. Excellent product especially for the price.

Reviews.Title: nice cable
Reviews.Author: Daniel S.
Reviews.Content: It works without problems is was cheaper than the one I got from GameStop, and worked wayyyyy better. I actually hate that I bought such a expensive cable from GameStop. I wish I could have seen this one before. It has been a year now it works fine.

Reviews.Title: Works as expected
Reviews.Author: Yarii
Reviews.Content: The perfect length to attach my Roku box to my TV without too much wire clutter. This is more like a cord than the flat wide wire so it's even better than the Cables To Go brand I previously purchased. It bends easier and stays where I put it, out of the way.

Reviews.Title: works like a charm and the price cant be beat
Reviews.Author: April and Josh "A&J;"
Reviews.Content: Noting much more to say that the title of the review didn't confer already.  The cable works fine and I am happy with it.  Glad it isn't as stiff as some other ones I have bought from amazon a few years back.

Reviews.Title: Great HDMI wire!
Reviews.Author: Christian Rowe
Reviews.Content: Use this cable to connect my Blu Ray player to my HD projector and it works flawlessly and the picture is absolutely stunning. This cable is very good quality and the picture is even better. Definitely will buy again for my future buying needs.

Reviews.Title: A good cable at a great price.
Reviews.Author: V. DiAngelus "Vincedia"
Reviews.Content: Very solid and well built basic cable. The cord is pliable for those "interesting" cable routs behind your TV and the ends feel liek they are attached well. I have used a number of these throughout my home and office.

Reviews.Title: Works great and is the right price
Reviews.Author: Toy Picker
Reviews.Content: Works great, super low price.  Connected a Sammy LCD to Apple TV and this works as expected.  Buy with confidence.

Reviews.Title: One Cable DOA.
Reviews.Author: richard G.
Reviews.Content: Ordered 2 cables and only one works. I have ordered other cables and this is the first time one arrived DOA.

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: CMG
Reviews.Content: This seems like an all or nothing proposition, and I give it 5-stars. I plugged it in and promptly dismissed it from my mind, which is exactly how I want my relationship with media cabling to go. No problems, good value.

Reviews.Title: Good cord
Reviews.Author: D. Sharp
Reviews.Content: Does its job well.  Connected easy and there is no issue with static. I would call it an overall good cord and recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Good cable
Reviews.Author: BW
Reviews.Content: Just need Amazon food trucks, doctor offices, and car dealerships and we'll be all set.  I like the cable, I ordered a bunch of them while reconfiguring my home theatre.

Reviews.Title: One of the good ones
Reviews.Author: Archie
Reviews.Content: Some folks would like you to believe that all HDMI cables are the same, not true. Any one who has had to spend a good part of their day trying to diagnose issues with sporadic video or sound loss will tell you, get the good ones. As you can clearly see by the reviews these cables are one of the good ones and they are priced very well. While I have not had any issues with the AmazonBasics cables I have purchased there is (as always) a possibility of acquiring a faulty one but Amazon's return policies help to quell that issue.In my experience I have found that cables fail for a few reasons so beware of these issues and these cables should work fine.1. People try to bend the cables to sharply causing wire or connection breaks inside. (don't bend it)2. People allow to much weight to hang from the connection causing premature wear of the connectors. (tie them up)3. People use cables that are to short pulling the connections to tight. (give it some slack)

Reviews.Title: Won't fit ROKU slot.
Reviews.Author: K. Wetzel
Reviews.Content: it's ok, but the body is to large for the Roku HDMI  inset slot, so I had move cables around to find one slim enough to fit.

Reviews.Title: Amazon basicsHDMI Cable
Reviews.Author: R. Lathigra
Reviews.Content: Good price but faulty cable. Cable does support ARC and 3D pass through. Upon connecting the cable the ARC supported HDMI out from a brand new receiver, to the ARC HDMI port on the TV, could only get audio but no video. No video as well when the cable was connected to other HDMI ports on the TV.  Contacted Amazon online for refund. The process was super easy and within thirty minutes received an email from Amazon about the approval and amount of refund. Did not have to ship the cable back to Amazon which is great!

Reviews.Title: Not a Monster But Still a Great Picture and Price
Reviews.Author: Ben Roy
Reviews.Content: It might not say MONSTER on it, but it works great! I have several of these hooked up to the satellite box, xbox and PS3 and Roku device.  Great picture. No need to shell out the $$$$ just to have a Monster label.

Reviews.Title: A good buy
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Faith"
Reviews.Content: Perfect for what I bought it for, to connect my laptop to my television.  I have not had a problem with it.

Reviews.Title: It's a cord + if it's the kind u need, it's terrific

Reviews.Content: Bought it for what it says it does -- and guees, what? It does it.  Great hookup between new-type TV and Roku. Kinda hard to write a great review about a piece of cable -- but without it, the two components don't work. So, thumbs up.

Reviews.Title: The Price is really hard to beat with this cable and it works perfectly!
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: The Price is really hard to beat with this cable and it works perfectly! I bought this cord to work with my raspberry pi computer and it works great. Perfect length and it automatically is formed to coil making it perfect for storage and compactness.

Reviews.Title: Dont consider the low price as a negative factor, they are comparable to higher proced ones
Reviews.Author: Scotch83
Reviews.Content: Basic/Simple no different than my expensive cables monster. I would buy more if I need them for other rooms. Very well built and quick shipped.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Deal
Reviews.Author: Handsome Nerd
Reviews.Content: It has been proved many times over regarding audio and video cords that there is no need to pay the price for higher end cords as the inherit simplicity of such a device does not warrant it. This cord is stable, fit snugly, and I have had no issues with it to date. It even held up being fished through a wall as many more expensive cords I have purchased have not. Great price for an HDMI cord.

Reviews.Title: Great Cables
Reviews.Author: FRL
Reviews.Content: Other stores have (very convincing) sales pitches for cables that cost hundreds but after reading articles on CNet, we bought six of these Amazon cables.  Two of them are for our new 65" 3D Smart TV. Every single cable works perfectly. We have hooked up both plasma and led, everything looks and sound beautiful, the 3D is great. I would definitely recommend these.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Su Heng
Reviews.Content: It works perfectly , thank you. AmazonBasics High-Speed HDMI Cable (6.5 Feet/2.0 Meters) - Supports. I like it. Thank  you.

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: Charles Heermans
Reviews.Content: I tried purchasing something cheaper but those cords just didn't work out.  Too cheap.  I guess you get what you pay for.  Amazon Basics is a solid line of products at a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Great HDMI cable
Reviews.Author: Bruce Sobocinski
Reviews.Content: This is a great quality HDMI cable. I love the AmazonBasics cables. I would buy this cable anytime over anything else. They are a great price and are built great!

Reviews.Title: What Are You Doing Reading This?
Reviews.Author: Adam
Reviews.Content: It's an HDMI cable made by Amazon. If you have to read reviews to come to a decision on this, life will be hard for you.

Reviews.Title: It Just Works
Reviews.Author: Speed Daemon
Reviews.Content: I've stopped counting the number of HDMI devices that I own, but it's a lot.  I've had some come with inexpensive cables, spent shocking amounts of money to get overly fancy cables from the local big box store, and much more reasonable rates to get one at Fry's (which I don't live near).  I'm not using any of the more advanced HDMI features, but have had some mysterious problems that vanished when I swapped one cable for another.Finally I got smart and bought a whole set of matching cables, enough to replace all 8 inputs and 2 outputs on the HDMI switcher/scaler that all of my home video devices run through.  Now I have no more headaches, no more worries, and no longer need to borrow a cable to take on trips.  I wish I had thought of this sooner!My only gripe is that the cables come rolled up, and tend to kink up instead of lying flat as my other cables do.  All things considered, I'm OK with that.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Javier
Reviews.Content: It works! Unexpensive and good quality, What else can I say? I used it to connect my tv and xbox and rid myself of some cables. Also works to use my tv as a monitor for my laptop.

Reviews.Title: A+
Reviews.Author: Robert Calver Jr.
Reviews.Content: Product is what it says it is and works fine great find for the price, don't waste your money on those expensive hdmi cables

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Tealtownfan
Reviews.Content: This cable delivers the same high quality picture and sound as other cables I have purchased costing far more. The shorter length is very nice

Reviews.Title: awful
Reviews.Author: Kevin Kelly
Reviews.Content: I bought three of these and they do not work all the time. Seems to go in and out. I guess they are defective.

Reviews.Title: It's a cable.
Reviews.Author: Nicholas Johnson
Reviews.Content: It's an HDMI cable. It does cable stuff. It is well made and didn't cost me $20. What more could it do?

Reviews.Title: No problems so far
Reviews.Author: Aaron Pagan
Reviews.Content: I chose this rating because I needed something for my MacBook Pro, so I bought the Tera Grand - Premium Mini Displayport / Thunderbolt to HDMI Adapter Cable & it works beautifully. To think I was going to pay $30 for a HDMI cord alone in a store over here... no thanks.

Reviews.Title: good deal
Reviews.Author: K. Fox
Reviews.Content: Work great and a great buy. Don't overpay! I have used these for everything from apple tv to video games and no problems.

Reviews.Title: Great value but inspect your usage case first
Reviews.Author: A. Hamrick "Lifter, listener"
Reviews.Content: I'm a huge fan of the entire AmazonBasics line of cabling, this is no exception.  At under a dollar a foot and Prime-qualified it's leaps ahead of others.The only even potential caveat is that the cable end is squared off and pretty chunky, so it might be inconvenient if you have connectors stacked in close proximity on your device.

Reviews.Title: Great quality, cheap
Reviews.Author: puargs
Reviews.Content: Great quality cables, very cheap, I use them around the house for my various devices and monitors. I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Good cable
Reviews.Author: Ted
Reviews.Content: I use it with slimport cable connect with my nexus 7. The picture quality is very good. For $5, this is a steal.

Reviews.Title: Excellent cable
Reviews.Author: Christopher Born
Reviews.Content: Very crisp, clean signal. Love it, and the price is definitely right. Challenges monoprice.com items and is a good complement to any system.

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted
Reviews.Author: D. Cessor
Reviews.Content: This is the connector I needed to use my laptop and other gadgets to the tv in order to view netflix, hulu, pics slideshows etc Great price also.

Reviews.Title: Goes great with new Roku 3 and 40 inch flatscreen TV.
Reviews.Author: tomterrific
Reviews.Content: Very good quality and does exactly what it was intended to do. Very good price and as good as the more expensive HDMI cables that I have. Would recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: HDMI CABLE
Reviews.Author: kathleen manning
Reviews.Content: the hdmi cable came damage seeing that it was a small item  i did not say any thing tell me what to do

Reviews.Title: Good Price, but damaged.
Reviews.Author: C. Thomson
Reviews.Content: I've bought other AmazonBasics products in the past, and they were never so useless. This cable didn't work, straight out of the box. I gave this two stars because I don't think that it reflects what you are likely to get. That having been said, be wary, as some of these cables are duds.

Reviews.Title: High quality HDMI cable with an amazingly low price.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I chose to purchase this cable from Amazon instead of a store because in my past experience, HDMI cables are overpriced in stores.I am more than happy with the product - I have even sent the link to several friends.The first reason for the five star review; it is a more durable, well-designed cable than one that I purchased in a store for a lot more money - approximately $30.Another great thing about this cable is that it is long enough to connect my computer to my HDTV; it is worry-free because of it's solid design.The cable is exactly as described: it is high speed and transmits high quality images and audio as well or better than comparable HDMI cables that I own.My advice is to buy this cable instead of driving to retail stores: you will have a better cable at a fraction of the price.

Reviews.Title: Works great for cheap.
Reviews.Author: Thomas S Somerville
Reviews.Content: This product works exactly like it should, was super cheap, and I was even able to have it delivered same day (local warehouse). Easily worth the money if you need a cheap HDMI cable.

Reviews.Title: Great Price, Great Product
Reviews.Author: Shawn Hamilton "Fat Idiot"
Reviews.Content: You couldn't ask for much more at a price this reasonable, it's not rocket science, no need to spend $50 on a flashy brand name cable, this one provides all the length, girth, and power you'll ever need

Reviews.Title: Great cable at a reasonable price.
Reviews.Author: Douglas R. Harwood "Doug"
Reviews.Content: I don't know who Amazon uses as a supplier, but this cableis of excellent quality and about one third the price of somebig box stores.

Reviews.Title: HDMI Cable
Reviews.Author: Sherolyn R Newell
Reviews.Content: It's a cable, it works.  There's not really a lot to say.  The price is significantly less than a cable from Best Buy.  I bought one there, and my son immediately said it was way too expensive.  I took it back and ordered this one.

Reviews.Title: Its a cord.
Reviews.Author: Todd E.
Reviews.Content: Its a cord that works well, no picture degradation and such. It is a little thick compared to some other HDMI cords.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful HDMI cord, very fast and great quality!
Reviews.Author: myselfff
Reviews.Content: I needed an extra HDMI, and every smart shopper knows to buy those online in lieu of the $50 ones in stores. HDMI cables are HDMI cables, they say. And as a former electronics salesman who was supposed to preach the opposite, I can confirm that claim. None are much better than the other in picture quality.The quality that DOES differ between models is the physical build of the cable. Any defect in the build of the cable can cause a poor picture quality. Amazon's cable is as good as any HDMI cable can get. It is very sturdy, and is made with high quality materials.My only qualm is that it is only 2m, and I could have used a little longer. But that is totally my fault, so the product gets no deduction from that.If you need an HDMI cable, this is for you. Just make sure that 2m is good enough for you.

Reviews.Title: Works fine
Reviews.Author: David K. Miller
Reviews.Content: I'm using this cable to mirror the iPad 3 display on my TV.  No problems and a low price.  What's not to like?

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: M. Turner "Mark T"
Reviews.Content: I ran this cable from my home theater receiver to my projector.  It works perfect, even in 3D.  No problems at all.  Perfect image.

Reviews.Title: Awesome product!
Reviews.Author: Boniquea Matthews "3rd year grad student. dry...
Reviews.Content: I don't know why I didn't buy this cord years ago! I connected it from my laptop right to my TV. Now I can use my TV as a second monitor or watch shows/movies online w/o having to quit everything else I'm working on at the time!

Reviews.Title: AMAZING
Reviews.Author: Melat
Reviews.Content: I recently bought this product to connect my laptop to my HDTV it was very easy to use & i could see my desktop screen on my tv. i recommend to get a longer one so you can use it while lying on your bed! (:

Reviews.Title: HDMI Cable
Reviews.Author: Ismael R Salazar
Reviews.Content: This cable is excellent.  Because of the length it allows for hook-ups from a longer distance than with a normal length cable (usually only 3ft length).  I now keep this cable hooked up to my large-screen TV and I don't have to put my laptop on the floor (with a shorter cable).

Reviews.Title: Worked Perfect Good Value
Reviews.Author: P. Shanahan "Fathead"
Reviews.Content: Used it to connect my Roku to my TV. Perfect length at a great price. Just what I needed. Provides a startlingly clear connection. I'm still getting used to how great a picture an antenna and digital box can make a new Hi-def television with connections. So don't be afraid to cut the cable bills by going rogue with the new technologies. It's a brave new world from the old days with a pair of rabbit ears and some tinfoil.

Reviews.Title: DOES AMAZONBASICS MAKE ANYTHING BAD??
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth A. Tool "LIZZYGOAT"
Reviews.Content: I love the deals I find by AmazonBasics and this is no exception. Great quality at a great price....I love Amazon. I use this to watch Amazon Prime on the flatscreen tv. Saves me a ton of money on cable....Again I love Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Cable
Reviews.Author: Mit
Reviews.Content: One of the best cables that I ever used. The quality of the the Amazon Basics products simple rock. I ordered one with lenght 2 meters and ordered another one with 5 meter's length as well after seeing the quality. I am really happy with the product

Reviews.Title: Heavy Duty
Reviews.Author: Ryo Nakagawa
Reviews.Content: This is Heavy Duty. I bought this for Work. Exhibition purpose to play videos with Plasma TV. I am going to order for Home to play videos from other room PC to Living room TV.

Reviews.Title: It works!
Reviews.Author: C. Grant
Reviews.Content: These are priced very reasonable and are of good quality.  There is no need to buy expensive HDMI cables for digital HDTV.  You are wasting your money.  Unlike analog, a digital signal produces either a perfect picture or a broken one.  You cannot improve your picture quality with expensive cables.  These are built well and deliver digital signals as well as the high-priced cables.

Reviews.Title: great partner for the ROKU machine
Reviews.Author: Stevie "LA-Story.com"
Reviews.Content: LOVE Roku but need a cable? This is a great one and it's long enough and it's not overly cumbersome

Reviews.Title: works
Reviews.Author: Christine
Reviews.Content: This is a good cord to pick, since you don't have to worry about the video, audio cords one cord with one port is better than the cord with the three plugs.

Reviews.Title: Simple, yet gets the job done.
Reviews.Author: LederHozen
Reviews.Content: It got here amazingly fast and works just how I wanted it to with my Playstation 3. Definitely get this to avoid the monopoly of the HDMI cable market.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: D. Stewart "Jar Head"
Reviews.Content: These cables work great. This is a well made cable with solid connectors that fit snug and tight. Passes 1080p digital video signals and audio just fine. HDMI cables must meet a required level of performance in order to be rated HDMI and sold as such. Digital HDMI cables either work or don't work,unlike analog cables that give various levels of performance. The information on the cables are digital one's and zero's not analog wave forms. You get a perfect signal or you get nothing. You will not get better performance than you get with this inexpensive basic cable.

Reviews.Title: Works great, very thick sturdy cable
Reviews.Author: Daniel J. Pickering
Reviews.Content: I just set up my home theater, I purchased this AmazonBasics HDMI cable along with a MediaBridge HDMI cable to run through multiple walls to an HTPC and DVR box.Both cables provide picture-perfect video and audio via the DVR box, both cables bring picture but no sound via the HTPC.  My TV seems to be the culprit, it is a 3-year old Samsung that wants dedicated audio via a 3.5mm cable.The AmazonBasics cable is a few millimeters thicker, and a couple dollars more expensive.  I pulled both cables through multiple walls and around a concrete corner, and both worked great.In hindsight I would have gotten two AmazonBasics cables to make sure they hold up in the unfinished crawlspace area they run through, as they are thicker and sturdier.If you aren't running them through such treacherous terrain, save a couple bucks and get the Mediabridge ones, they work just as well.  While they are a bit thinner they are still quite sturdy.

Reviews.Title: Great HDMI cable
Reviews.Author: Jay
Reviews.Content: this is a great HDMI cable it works well and the packaging wasn't difficult to open. and this cable is a lot cheaper than some of the other cables I've seen and the picture quality is great.

Reviews.Title: Great HDMI Cables
Reviews.Author: CB
Reviews.Content: The price on these was fantastic.  You can find a lot of overpriced cables that work no better than these.

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: Michael A. Garcia
Reviews.Content: Great picture, good price. Does everything I need it to do. I have it connected to my xbox and TV. No problems.

Reviews.Title: Crazy
Reviews.Author: Brandon Collins
Reviews.Content: I've used this cable for a long time. I also unplug it and switch devices all the time. And the fact that it supports 4k means I can still use it when I get a ps4. Will definitely buy these if I need more.

Reviews.Title: HDMI Cable
Reviews.Author: D. Watson
Reviews.Content: Don't buy HDMI cables in stores - they're overpriced and they crap out on you. I've had no complaints with this one - it's the perfect length for what I'm using it for, it makes my Xbox games look incredible, and playing Steam games on the big screen is awesome. 10/10 would purchase again.

Reviews.Title: Why would you want to pay more?
Reviews.Author: seraphimblade
Reviews.Content: Digital cable is digital cable. Ultra-gold-platinum-unobtainium-plated digital cables don't give you a "better" digital signal.I was initially a bit leery of this one's price, though, because in my experience, very low-priced cables don't tend to last. But for the price, it was worth trying.I'm pleasantly surprised to have been proved wrong. I've been using this cable to connect my laptop to my external monitor for over two years now, and it hasn't received the gentlest treatment. But never a single problem. The fit is still nice and snug, but easy to plug or unplug, and I've not once seen any video or sound artifacts or glitches.So why spend more? This one will do you just fine, and apparently, it will do it for some time.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: M. Thompson "Dyson Diva"
Reviews.Content: I really like the price of these.  I remember buying mon$ter cables in the past. These work just as well

Reviews.Title: Gets the Job Done
Reviews.Author: Nick Banz
Reviews.Content: This cable is awesome!  An HDMI cable, three feet long that costs only $5, why would you not choose it.  I purchased with my Roku 3 and I have had it plugged in since I got both the cable and Roku in the mail with no issue and picture quality is flawless.  I would definitely recommend this product to anyone, especially if the price stays as low as it was when I purchased.

Reviews.Title: Best HDMI Cable I've Purchased
Reviews.Author: Deven G
Reviews.Content: These AmazonBasics High-Speed HDMI Cables are hands down the best HDMI cables I've ever bought.Some Details:These cables support full HD 1080p, and future 4K, video as well as 3D video! Also, they have built in ethernet connection so two devices can share one main connection!Pros-* At 15', they are long enough for almost any setup.* They work with all HDMI devices including PS3s, XBOX360s, Wii U, BluRay players, and even most new computers.* The cables are very rigid and tough, which helps prevent any kinks or tears.* They deliver crystal clear audio and HD video.* They work perfectly!* I love the packaging they come in, so little waste and easy to open!Cons- NONE FOR ME! :DI use these to connect my HDTV, soundbar, PS3, Xbox 360, and my Computer too! When the PS4 and Xbox One come out, I'll have them set up, too!Buy yourself a couple of these guys, and while your at it, get some as gifts too!

Reviews.Title: Sturdy, works well, excellent value
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I was hesitant to purchase the longer HDMI cables due to concerns over signal loss. The very competitive price gave me pause. Would the cable be of sufficient quality?I have had the cables for almost a year and they work very well.  I do not see evidence of any signal or functional loss.The end connectors attach to the HDMI ports tightly and are easy to grip.In addition, the cables do not appear to pick up any cross signal interference from other cables, including power cables, which can happen with less well constructed/shielded cables.

Reviews.Title: No flaws, does the job
Reviews.Author: Dominic Stroh
Reviews.Content: Bought this to replace a DVI to HDMI connection from my desktop to my monitor, which was loose and giving some graphical bugs that caused darker colors to look strange.I tried to find a cheap HDMI cable, and this fit that description for me. I got it quickly, plugged it in, and it worked great. Had some slight errors with my monitor, but that was not due to the cable.Cable is still functioning well after a few months with no signs of any damage. Great and reliable product that performs as expected.

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly five years later
Reviews.Author: B. Cravens "Loves a good story"
Reviews.Content: I picked up two of these 5-6 years ago as a freshman in college. Though one of them decided to crap out after 3ish years, the other one is still working on my Xbox as it did when I first urged it in. These are an amazing value -- don't let them scam you at Best Buy.

Reviews.Title: BEST CABLE FOR THE PRICE
Reviews.Author: 3.14159 "KC"
Reviews.Content: Don't get suckered into blowing $49 on a "Rocketfish" cable from Best Buy. There is NO difference between this cable and those, other than the Big Box store overhead. This is a winner product. I tested it with the Best Buy expensive cable, and we couldn't tell a difference on streaming video from my computer to my tv, from my DVD player to my tv, or my Roku to my tv.

Reviews.Title: Works As Expected
Reviews.Author: nBee1
Reviews.Content: I bought an HDMI cable for a cheap price and got full functionality of it. I connected it to a Samsung flat screen television, using a Dell laptop and it worked perfectly. The picture was crisp and the audio went through to the television as well. As for the audio quality I can't say since the television's speakers aren't the best.

Reviews.Title: High quality cable at a reasonable price
Reviews.Author: SoundGuy
Reviews.Content: I was having problems with my Blu-Ray player 'blacking out' occasionally, and was about to send it back to Sony under warranty when I read that one of the most common causes of that problem was poor cables.  So I replaced my Home Depot cable with this one, and haven't had a problem since.  Helps to have it not too long as well, just enough to get there.

Reviews.Title: Good cable for the price
Reviews.Author: William E Gilthorpe
Reviews.Content: There may be better cables out there, but why pay 3 times the price of this one.  I have used this with no issue for quite a while now.  I doubt that one would be able to see or hear the difference anyway.  I definitely recommend this cable.

Reviews.Title: Dont know what to expect
Reviews.Author: Francois
Reviews.Content: Dont really know how to rate this but it does what it suppose to do. it is build tough and i think it will last a long time

Reviews.Title: Videos and Pictures Full HD
Reviews.Author: Oscar V.
Reviews.Content: I plugged my video card with a TV led Samsung and provides a full HD image, This is one of the better qualities High Speed HDMI. It communicates ethernet, 3D, audio, and 1080p. It's a nice touch and makes the cables look much more expensive that they really are

Reviews.Title: they work
Reviews.Author: Brian Hodges
Reviews.Content: I don't know what else you need to know. These are HDMI cables. They work. Yea! Purchase these if you need HDMI.

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted
Reviews.Author: Archie Mcdowall "Scotty"
Reviews.Content: I use my laptop with HDMI output a (2) nursing homes and needed a longer cable for one and this was good quality and excellent price. It has provided a useful tool to bring enjoyment into those in the Nursing Home community as I do video's and PowerPoint's once a month

Reviews.Title: it works so far
Reviews.Author: Stroker Don
Reviews.Content: No complaints from me. I've had it a week and it still works.  It connects the Sony Brava flat screen to a switchbox

Reviews.Title: No need to buy any other HDMI
Reviews.Author: Dan Santamaria
Reviews.Content: This will get the job done. I did not buy into all of the hype of more expensive cables supposedly being "superior" for quality. I recommend saving your money and just going with this cable. The construction quality is more than good enough.

Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: Jordan
Reviews.Content: i have ordered several of these and all work great, and of course $5 is an unbeatable price.. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Works
Reviews.Author: MamaC "Clarice Pena"
Reviews.Content: I have nothing good or bad to say about this product. It works and I haven't had any problems with it.

Reviews.Title: Works great; nice strain reliefs, good price
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "m20kpilot"
Reviews.Content: As advertised, good price, works great.  Strain reliefs are nice and allow the plugs to fit into narrow spaces on the television.

Reviews.Title: gaget nut
Reviews.Author: Dale J. Cardany
Reviews.Content: I bought this along with the Apple Lighning Digital Av Adapter to use for watching movies I downloaded on my iPad, and it works great.  Now I can view everything from my iPad on through my TV

Reviews.Title: Simple and Effective
Reviews.Author: P. Kiripolsky "Informed buyer"
Reviews.Content: I needed a HDMI cord to connect my laptop to my television and this cord fit the bill.  Nothing fancy here however, IT GETS THE JOB DONE!  It works just like I expected it to.

Reviews.Title: Full product expectations.
Reviews.Author: Juan Zamorano
Reviews.Content: Excellent product worked well, really recommend is a good product an unbeatable price, I am happy for this purchase realy if needed would buy another product equal.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Christopher Arrington
Reviews.Content: Got it in the mail 3-4 days after I ordered. Works perfectly. I can plug my laptop into my T.V. Also works great to play Xbox in HD.

Reviews.Title: Cheap. Works. What more do you need.
Reviews.Author: Anthony Bush
Reviews.Content: I can't tell the difference between this cable and one I paid $25 for last year. I'm using it with a gaming system and have no complaints.

Reviews.Title: Works well with Apple TV 3
Reviews.Author: YS Sheu "ss"
Reviews.Content: The HDMI cable is a must-have if you plan to connect an Apple TV to a HD TV, because it is not included in the Apple TV box.  The length (6.5 feet) is more than plenty for home use and it has been working really well for 4 months without any problem.  It is also pretty cheap compares to other brands.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: J W Bfield "JWB"
Reviews.Content: When hooking up two HDMI outputs, you need two equal length lines or there is likely to be distortion.  This did the trick for me, and now my system is GTG.

Reviews.Title: as described and works as it is supposed to
Reviews.Author: Constantin Schmekel "constantine"
Reviews.Content: as described and works as it is supposed to, what else to say? Would buy it again, did buy it again. Recommended!

Reviews.Title: unreliable connection
Reviews.Author: kusmoeb
Reviews.Content: Looks like most people have no problem with these inexpensive cables. Mine has the same problem as the rest of the minority group - intermittent signal loss between my Bluray player and TV. Screen goes black and loses sound, even though I can see on the player that the movie is still running. Jiggling the cable where it connects in the back gets the signal back. Time to buy some better quality ones...

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Deadmenkil "Artistry in everything I do."
Reviews.Content: great cable that delivers crystal clear audio and video. i bought this for a friend and he loves it so im happy. if i ever get a new tv ill get one as well.

Reviews.Title: This item does the job. It is a standard HDMI cable for a decent price. I would buy this product again.
Reviews.Author: Jerry
Reviews.Content: This item does the job. It is a standard HDMI cable for a decent price. I would buy this product again.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: CaT
Reviews.Content: I bought it with Apple TV, That has high speed and can show high Resolution in my TV, good for my last one

Reviews.Title: Exactly as it says
Reviews.Author: Sherri Haughton
Reviews.Content: This is just your basic HDMI cable, nothing special, but it's the same thing that a box store like Wal-Mart or Best Buy is going to be charging you AT LEAST three times as much for. I'll go with Amazon every time, thanks!

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: Bill B
Reviews.Content: It's a 2-meter HDMI cable, the price was more than fair, and it works.  What else is there to say?

Reviews.Title: It does a lot
Reviews.Author: Richard Van Horn
Reviews.Content: Easy installation.  Fewer cables.  Excellent value and it makes the TV set up a snap. I would recommend it for anyone.

Reviews.Title: Works Exactly as expected: AmazonBasics High-Speed HDMI Cable (9.8 Feet/3.0 Meters) - Supports...
Reviews.Author: Franco Mundaraín
Reviews.Content: Really Big tough cable, very flexible though. Freakishly Long just as i needed it. Audio, image & video transmission is just Flawless; no flickering so long, handles pretty good the quality of all elements required.

Reviews.Title: Works as required
Reviews.Author: AM
Reviews.Content: This is a fine HDMI capable.  Much less expensive than those I found in retail stores.  Don't pay more as additional money does not equal additional performance.

Reviews.Title: As advertised. works awesome
Reviews.Author: rjlightner
Reviews.Content: Does the job! It works as described.Don't pay "Best Buy" price for the same product.It really is pretty basic, you are not going to get a better cord for more money.You will just get a more expensive one.

Reviews.Title: Perfect HDMI Cable!
Reviews.Author: Harry Arianas
Reviews.Content: A perfect cable to connect your PC or Mac to your HDMI television to watch or stream media.  Considerably less expensive than Radio Shack or other electronics' specialty stores.

Reviews.Title: Great Price, Great Cable
Reviews.Author: Wrzos
Reviews.Content: Received the cable on Saturday, hooked it up straight to my TV and HD cable box, and it works like a charm. Other stores wanted $15+ for the same cable. As of now, I see no difference in quality between this and the other cables that I have purchased from other places.

Reviews.Title: Good Quality HDMI Cables
Reviews.Author: Rohit Jaryal
Reviews.Content: I am using these for last 6 months with my Apple TV. I had no problem with this so far

Reviews.Title: Gets the job done
Reviews.Author: Eric J. Spencley "Eric Spencley"
Reviews.Content: First off, you can't really mess up a HDMI cable; it either works or it doesn't. I'm not going to get into the argument that Monster cables are the same as every other cable (just google "CNET why hdmi cables are all the same" if you want to know why)This is not the first cable I've bought. I've purchased about 5 of these abs they're simply amazing! They're equally as good as a high priced hdmi cable. If you want proof, google why hdmi cables don't matter on cnet and they have a compelling article about how and hdmi cable, regardless of supposed features, are all the same quality. There is no reason to buy a monster cable or any of that crap.Now onto the product, first of all the packaging is very simple. Just a cord in a bag. While this isn't the most aesthetically appealing, it lowers production cost thus making it cheaper for you and me. There cord is thick which makes it feel sturdy and able to hold up over time.As for this cable, it is a RIDICULOUSLY low price for a great quality cable! Not only does this cable FEEL great, it LOOKS great too. It's one of those products that just makes the user feel like it's the perfect product to own. As an owner of a lot of these cables, they are one of the products that you just put a lot of trust in and it gives you ease of mind knowing that you have a great quality cable. I have since replaced all HDMI cables with these in my house.

Reviews.Title: Digital age magic
Reviews.Author: Aaron Pierson
Reviews.Content: I was amazed at the ability to move moving pictures to a flat screen of glass through a series of copper wires.  It almost made my life have meaning again.  Almost.

Reviews.Title: Connector Housing Was Broken
Reviews.Author: Richard Rininger
Reviews.Content: It works fine, but when I received it I noticed that the plastic connector housing was separating.  Not the best build quality, but it gets the job done for cheap.

Reviews.Title: Gotta love Amazon with this product
Reviews.Author: mw
Reviews.Content: Ok, so I needed two 15 foot hdmi cables to do in wall wiring for our home components. Went down to RadioShack and Bestbuys and they wanted $59 for one, which would have meant $120 for both (yes, I know I can add). So instead I order this on Amazon at a price of $24 for both. A savings of almost $100. These hdmi cables are extremely sturdy and well built. Be warned that the cables themselves are quite broad and one would definitely not classify these as lightweight. I'm impressed with the quality and the savings.

Reviews.Title: Does what it is supposed to do
Reviews.Author: Bruce A. DeFrang
Reviews.Content: I bought this to hook up a computer to a big screen tv, and  I needed a longer cable than you would otherwise need for home theatre.  Plus, it had to be high-speed so it could support 3d.This cable did the job.  The cable also appears to be very durable.  It looks more like a vacuum cleaner cord than an electronic cable.

Reviews.Title: Great size
Reviews.Author: Orville "Books"
Reviews.Content: Great size.. easy to install.. very satisfied with overall preformance. No extra cable to hide.. perfect fit from TV to DVD

Reviews.Title: Its a cable
Reviews.Author: Pig
Reviews.Content: Its a cable.  Works like a cable.  Plugs into things and what not.  Cable Cable.  It was part of a gift package with a ROKU player.  Get the ROKU player - those things are great!  I have an apple tv and a roku.  Money!

Reviews.Title: These are Very High Quality!
Reviews.Author: Edna F. George
Reviews.Content: The cords are better than I can find anywhere else! The cords give the best quality picture! I have used many other brands but these are the best i can find and they are very cheap! DO NOT WASTE YOU MONEY ON $50 HDMIS! THESE ARE SO MUCH BETTER!! Would recommend to anyone wanting the best quality picture at a very cheap price! The cords are thicker than the more expensive HDMIs and are made very well! I have order 6 and they are all the exact same!

Reviews.Title: Why spend more?
Reviews.Author: Josh
Reviews.Content: I have always bought high-end Monster Cables. I have this running with a Sony ES receiver and Samsung LED 3D TV. I can't tell the difference between this and other Monster cables I have running with the same equipment.

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive and it does it's job
Reviews.Author: Andy Lynch
Reviews.Content: People can easily get led astray and spend unfathomable amounts of money on a premium HDMI cable.  99% percent of us out there, however, don't want or need that level of quality.  We want a cable that transfers our data, allows us to watch our TV, and doesn't fail.  Beyond that, we don't really care, do we?This cable accomplishes all that and at a wondefully affordable price as well.  Unless you require inordinate amounts of shielding on your HDMI cable and you aren't abusive with it, this will work perfectly fine compared with the same type of cable you will find in the store for 3x the price of this.Note that the pictures for this item are accurate and it is gold plated.

Reviews.Title: Great Price, Great Device!
Reviews.Author: Rev Casey "Rev Casey"
Reviews.Content: Needed a short HDMI cable to run from my laptop to my HD TV.  This is perfect!  Price was nice.  I've used it to play DVD's and regularly watch Netflix off my laptop onto my HD TV (the Wii is hooked up in the kids' play area).

Reviews.Title: All HDMI cables are the same
Reviews.Author: MrGator
Reviews.Content: They work fine. I read on CNET that all hdmi cables are the same, dont spend more money on "fancy" cables.

Reviews.Title: thick and sturdy
Reviews.Author: S. Mills
Reviews.Content: This cable is thick and sturdy. I was extremely surprised to see such a high quality cable sold so cheaply. Thank you amazon!

Reviews.Title: Very thick strong cable!
Reviews.Author: J. D. I
Reviews.Content: The cable is very thick and heavy, but I guess that may mean good quality.  I do notice a short lag when connecting a MBP to an HDTV, but I dont know if that has to do with the computer or the cable itself.  Perfectly packed and great value for the money.

Reviews.Title: HDMI is HDMI
Reviews.Author: D.M. "Cheer4IL"
Reviews.Content: With more than (20) years of audiophile experience, I've long accepted my anxiety over cables.  I've been a disciple of Nordost since the mid-1990's, so it was nearly impossible for me to believe a $4 HDMI cable could rival offerings from high end brands.  The truth is, HDMI is HDMI.  Period.  No need to spend more than the minimum, no matter what anyone says.  This is actually a relief, because fussing over the nuances of audio interconnects can be a full time job :-)

Reviews.Title: Great price and great quality
Reviews.Author: Brian Unangst
Reviews.Content: I'll never buy a cable in the store again.  These are much cheaper and work just as well.  I hate when stores gouge you on cables.

Reviews.Title: Work just fine
Reviews.Author: J. Moore
Reviews.Content: These cables are just fine, and cost a third of what WalMart's HDMI cables do.  People should realize that since HDMI signal is digital, so-called "premium" cables won't provide a better picture.  The only room for improvement would theoretically be in a more durable cable, but I see no such room in this product.

Reviews.Title: Great Cable
Reviews.Author: Dustin
Reviews.Content: Have gotten cheap $10 hdmi cables before but never to this quality and none that are this long. This is a great cable for the price. The cable itself is thick and well protected. Length is great to reach from my TV to my computer.

Reviews.Title: Good Buy
Reviews.Author: Violet J. Berry "university history major and...
Reviews.Content: The price was good and I bought it with another purchase. These cables are good to have on hand anytime.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Jason Hudym
Reviews.Content: HDMI cables come in all sorts of lengths with all sorts of promises, but reality is after all the research I did, they are all about the same, so when I got these, and added them to all my TVs and components, these are fantastic, and for the price cannot be beat.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: This cable's high quality construction is on par with that of many of the name brand cables. A high quality cable at a great (reasonable) price - it's a no-brainer!

Reviews.Title: Recommend
Reviews.Author: J. Greene
Reviews.Content: They are cables.They support new standards (3D, CEC).They have nifty little plastic caps protecting the connectors at the ends.They work.If you need them....get them.

Reviews.Title: Xbox 360 - Looks great
Reviews.Author: That Guy "Sam P"
Reviews.Content: There is NO difference between this and the $70 "gold" cable you can buy at Best Buy, Target, etc. The expensive ones, and the cheap ones carry the SAME quality signal.

Reviews.Title: Great value on a fairly necessary product
Reviews.Author: Peter Faden "robilar5500"
Reviews.Content: I say fairly necessary because without an HDMI cable, I dont get the benefit of 1080p from all my various devices (Roku, Xbox360, PS3, Blu-ray player, etc....). The price is stellar at around $6, and I havent noticed any issues whatsoever stemming from the cables. They do what they are supposed to and are completely inexpensive. I'm not sure why you would want to buy brand name or otherwise more expensive HDMI cables when these do the job perfectly.

Reviews.Title: AmazonBasics w Ethernet  assorted lenghts
Reviews.Author: Mike Calimari
Reviews.Content: You can go to Big Box Best-mart and buy a blister pack HDMI cable or to Amazon and get a quality cable for less than half the price. Even sweeter if you combine enough items to qualify for free shipping or belong to Prime.I bought several of these cables from 3ft/1m to 15ft/4.5m.  They are well built but be aware the longer cables are quite thick in order to pass a high quality HDMI signal and Ethernet information. This might be a problem if space behind your HDMI device is limited. Pay attention to how you route and bend the cable so it doesn't stress the HDMI connectors on your device.If routing the cable through tight spaces might be a problem, other manufacturers make a flex series of cables that might better suit your needs.I use these cables to connect ROKU boxes, DVD players, and computers to HDTVs all work well and deliver a good clear picture.FYI: Until I upgraded to HDMI capable graphic cards I used DVI to HDMI adapters along with these cables. Contrary to what some might tell you newer graphic card DVI connectors will support HDMI audio, check with your vendor.This is a combined review because Amazon hasn't got their product directory squared away, this was written for a 3ft cable purchased some time ago but the website thinks it's for the recent purchase of the 15ft cable.

Reviews.Title: Worked perfectly, great video and sound
Reviews.Author: AmeliaAT "Apostrophistica"
Reviews.Content: Hooked up an Asus laptop running Windows 7 to a Sanyo TV and instantly my laptop monitor was cloned to the TV, no jumping through hoops, changing settings, or even telling the laptop that I wanted it to clone. All I had to do was use the TV's input button on the TV's remote to make sure it was looking at the right hdmi port. Worked perfectly in no more time than it took to plug one end into my laptop and one end into the side of the TV. I then streamed a movie from Amazon's instant video, and again, no hitches at all and the picture was great.The product doesn't feel cheap. Since I'm using it with a laptop rather than a stationary video player, I'll be plugging it in and unplugging it each time I use it. The cable is hefty enough that it doesn't feel as though it will kink and break with use.I definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a high-speed hdmi cable.

Reviews.Title: Great basic cord, good for gaming
Reviews.Author: Ryger22
Reviews.Content: This is a great cord that I would recommend to anyone who has an HDMI output on their television. It is above average quality, and is less than 1/10th the price of the expensive Monster brand cables. Unless you are building a theater room in your home, it is not worth paying more for essentially the same cord. It is a great basic cord worthy of purchase for those who want HDMI output.

Reviews.Title: Don't be suckered into paying $50 for an HDMI cable
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: This cable is the perfect length and functionality for setting up devices in an entertainment center. It matches all the current specifications and even supports 3D. I found the cable to be high quality and it didn't kink when being wrapped, routed, or bent. It was able to reach the different devices in my entertainment center without having too much bulk left over.

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: Works great!  I've been trying to link my laptop display with by 54" TV through WiFi, but it never worked the way I wanted it to even after buying the adapters from HP and Sharp.  I got this cable and it's perfect.  Still have to have my laptop on and navigate to sites from there, but I can just close the screen (after I set it not to sleep or shutdown) afterwards and it's all good. I was going to buy a Roku for my HBOGO and Epix accounts, but now I don't have to.  I had to set my TV to scan for new inputs, but after it picked up my laptop everything was great.

Reviews.Title: Basic and Simple, works!
Reviews.Author: Nishant Agarwal
Reviews.Content: Works as expected. Connected PS3 to 3D Plasma TV. Played blu-ray, 3D blu ray, and usual other media. Picture quality was as expected, sound as expected. For the price, Amazon Basics product line delivers definitely. Also note that my hookup goes through a Onkyo home theater, so that also worked as expected.

Reviews.Title: monster competition
Reviews.Author: SRA Mouhammed Awadallah
Reviews.Content: i bought two monster cables at their highest ratings and their great! but amazon cables are the cheaper little brothers if you want something for your xbox and roku or to give to friends who suffer with composites.

Reviews.Title: Great cable
Reviews.Author: stylus
Reviews.Content: Love this cable it fits perfect for the back of my tv. They are good sturdy construction and I would recommend them to anyone buying computer cable.

Reviews.Title: Nice HDMI cable
Reviews.Author: Self Review
Reviews.Content: I bought it along with the Apple TV.  This cable is best and the price is awesome.  Performing as promised by Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised
Reviews.Author: Frequent Amazon Shopper
Reviews.Content: Can't beat the price.  Quality is the same as any other HDMI cable.  No reason to look any further for cables!

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: SRQknight
Reviews.Content: works great, price is right. no need for name brand hdmi cables. use on my apple tv and the picture/sound is great.

Reviews.Title: If you are looking for economical, reliable cables, stop right here
Reviews.Author: Harish "Engineer, Photographer and Electr...
Reviews.Content: HDMI has come a long way now and it is inconceivable to think that a 6-ft cable will stutter and fail. If you are looking for simply 1080P with deep-color, this will fit your needs very well. I haven't had a chance to test the other areas (audio return and ethernet) because my other devices do not support it. There is a wealth of information on blue jeans cable and they recommend their tartan cable (cheapest) for shorter hops. They only recommend a 26 or 24 gauge cable for longer lengths (25ft or more). Dont waste your money on expensive cables with tall claims. HDMI is a standard and any good cable (from a company with a decent reputation) would have their cable certified for the distance. A monster cable ain't going to work any better than an AmazonBasics or Blue Jeans cable. Just get one of these cables, and you wont be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Great price for what you get
Reviews.Author: thecrowes
Reviews.Content: Great price, really long, way too thick if you want to use it in front of the TV.  The thickness also makes it unwieldy if you are running it around the living room to laptops and what not.

Reviews.Title: Don't pay big box prices
Reviews.Author: Jooky
Reviews.Content: Don't be fooled into thinking that you need a $40.00 cable for your HDMI needs.  This cable works perfectly and I recommend it to all of my friends and family.

Reviews.Title: Great product ata great price!
Reviews.Author: Bitten
Reviews.Content: Don't be fooled by the high cost of HDMI cables at your local electronics store as they mark up their products like hdmi cables by as much as 300%. This us a great cable, meets the current standards so why would you pay more?

Reviews.Title: Nice looking cable
Reviews.Author: Brandon H
Reviews.Content: The cable arrived in good shape, on time, and is working great so far! I do not have an internet enabled TV so I have not tried out the Ethernet capabilities, but everything else works.

Reviews.Title: Good Cheap Cable
Reviews.Author: Bryce J. Richardson "brrrrrrrrrrrryce"
Reviews.Content: If you need a "cheap" HDMI cable this is perfect. I got a better "cheap" HDMI cable at Movie Trading Company that was self-branded but they didn't have a lot of quantity.There can be some interference issues if you have a lot of other cables or are working with something like a Blackmagic ATEM and I would recommend upgrading to a shielded cable.

Reviews.Title: Great Cables !!
Reviews.Author: Omar S.
Reviews.Content: I don't know why some people pay a fortune for other HDMI cables when these Amazon cables work great . I use these cables to connect my xbox 360  and I get a excellent  1080p  image and great sound.

Reviews.Title: Much better visual quality.
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: I wanted a cost effective HDMI cable for my xbox 360, I had been just using the component cables, but wanted an upgrade. I didn't really know what to expect with an Amazon HDMI cable, but i can say without a doubt that this cable is worth it, Immediately i could notice that the picture and color were much sharper than before.

Reviews.Title: Not a techy, but this is perfect.
Reviews.Author: Samantha J. Oneill "NintendoFanGirl"
Reviews.Content: I came across Amazon's HDMI cables after telling my dad not to buy a $25 one at walmart, saying, "I'm SURE they're online for cheaper." True dat.I have a few of Amazon's cables now, and I use them for my xbox 360, ps3, and the AT&T; U-Verse cable box. They work just ass well as the ones that came with each package, and are offered in a large variety of lengths. The cables appear to be of high quality, and are in the same condition that they arrived in 6+ months ago.Like I mentioned in the title, I'm not a techy. I don't know much about how different metals increase speed or whatever, thus making some cables 'better'. What I do know is that the AmazonBasics HDMI cable is a high-quality cable that works perfectly for everything I need it for, and at the right price.

Reviews.Title: AmazonBasics HDMI Cable
Reviews.Author: Aeacus
Reviews.Content: Excellent quality cable at an extremely reasonable price.  The connection ends are much nicer than a lot of the other cheap HDMI cables out there.  Buy this brand and be satisfied...or...buy Monster and be ripped off.

Reviews.Title: Awesome HDMI cable
Reviews.Author: Chris Manns
Reviews.Content: Don't spend $50 on a HDMI cable !!!I upgraded my xbox component cable to this HDMI cable. It looks amazing. The picture quality is sharp and clear.Recommended...*11/28/2012Bought 3 more. Great product

Reviews.Title: Incredible Value
Reviews.Author: JohnMJ
Reviews.Content: While there isn't much to review, I still felt this warranted a review nonetheless, due to it's value.This HDMI cable offers an incredible signal, at a fraction of the cost of some other cables. Having used more expensive cables, in the past, I cannot find a difference in the signal quality at all. Given it's price, I find no reason to use other HDMI cables.Compare them yourself. Buy the more expensive ones, and these. Or, just take the word of the multiple reviews on here. I did, and I'm ecstatic.

Reviews.Title: Great Cable if it Fits Your TV
Reviews.Author: Rob
Reviews.Content: Two complaints. First off the cable is quite thick and difficult to straighten the coils out of. Secondly, the plastic plug surrounding the hdmi connector is so thick it would not plug into my TV as the plastic contacted the TVs back panel when it was less than half way inserted. If not for this issue I would give this cable five stars.My TCL LED TVs hdmi receptacles are on the left side of the screen so I solved the problem by using a 270 degree hdmi adapter Cable Matters Gold Plated HDMI Male to HDMI Female 270 Degree Adapter. This adapter is thin enough it plugs in fully and hides the cable behind the TV for a cleaner look. My upconverter DVD player combined with this cable and adapter now has great picture and sound quality.

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly, costs less
Reviews.Author: Chandler
Reviews.Content: Ive bought several Amazon Basics products over the years and typically they wind up working better than some items double the price. They are like a generic version of handy hardware that winds up actually working out better--unlike some generic grocery items.This HDMI cable works where you need a dependable cable. Great length, sturdy construction, excellent performance...no problems at all, and a product I'd buy again.

Reviews.Title: 1080p HD at a value price
Reviews.Author: D. Wortham
Reviews.Content: Perfect timing for this to become available, at no cost, on Vine for review. We just bought a 32-Inch 720p LCD HDTV worthy of an HDMI cable several weeks ago and had it hooked up with a coaxial cable.The picture difference is truly dramatic. Outstandingly dramatic. These cables can be quite expensive and this particular cable is a great way to save a little money over the pricey name brands and still get a stellar experience with your HDTV.The cable comes in Amazon's wonderful frustration free packaging so it is as easy as opening up the box and plugging it in. The cable is coiled and has tie-wraps. Currently our TV and satellite box are right on top of one another so I just released enough cable to plug them in and left the cable coiled with the ties. No muss no fuss.Although the Amazon description includes a nifty reason not to worry about version numbers, this cable is in fact HDMI version 1.4. You can google for HDMI version numbers to review what features are version specific. There isn't a very good reason to 'future proof' your purchase by buying a higher version than you really need unless you are upgrading your equipment soon. It is worth googling to find out what you need because you can save quite a bit of money on older versions on occasion.The new enhancements for version 1.4 includeHDMI Ethernet Channel, Audio Return Channel, 3D, 4K Support, Content Type, Additional Color Spaces, HDMI Micro Connector, Automotive Connection System.I'm very happy with the quality and value of this cable and I'd purchase one for our next HDTV.

Reviews.Title: Stiff Cable
Reviews.Author: cab
Reviews.Content: This cable works well with a clean signal; however, the braiding makes it quite inflexible, causing a bit of a problem when running the cable in a limited space behind a TV.

Reviews.Title: excellent quality at bargain price
Reviews.Author: C. Gardner
Reviews.Content: this cable was equal to the $20 top of the line HDMI cable available at Target Stores mwith gold contacts

Reviews.Title: Great cable, better price.
Reviews.Author: bt
Reviews.Content: This is third or fourth Amazon Basics cable that I have purchased. Contrary to the advertisements of other cable manufacturers, fancy gold-plated connectors and so forth don't actually improve the quality of your sound or picture. It's nice how Amazon has several inexpensive options in various lengths. Spend your money more wisely on the things you are connecting rather than the connectors themselves.  Thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Works Fine - Product was as described.
Reviews.Author: Harry A. Prillaman "Harry A. Prillaman"
Reviews.Content: The cable has good ends. IT appears to be good quality cable with high quality terminations. Works as described with no issues.

Reviews.Title: does what it promises
Reviews.Author: gaedfly
Reviews.Content: I have so many devices hooked up via HDMI that I use an HDMI switch. Most of my cables are this one. The price is great, they work fine, never an issue. When I need another HDMI cable, I'll order this one again.

Reviews.Title: Exceptional Value. Great Product.
Reviews.Author: C. Binder
Reviews.Content: I have friends who work in the electronics industry, and they recommended that I come to Amazon to purchase cables for my new AV products. I could not ask for a better value. The cable works excellently and it is not flimsy like some other cheap knock-offs that I have bought in the past. The price I paid for this cable could be $10 more and I would still buy it. $60 Monster brand cables work exactly the same. There is no visual difference. No plastic clamshells to open. No hassle. Buy this cable. It will keep some of that money in your pocket (or on your card) and you can put it towards a nicer Blu-Ray Player or HDTV. Trust me.

Reviews.Title: No need to pay more
Reviews.Author: K. Morris
Reviews.Content: This is my 2nd purchase of this HDMI cable, and I've been using mine for 2 years with absolutely no problems.  My mother just got a HD television last month, and I bought the same cable for her.  There is simply no need to pay more when this product simply does the job for MUCH less.  No problems with connections or quality--thanks Amazon Basics.

Reviews.Title: Good HDMI Cabel
Reviews.Author: Reviewer_1_2_3
Reviews.Content: This cable performs great and is inexpensive.  While I haven't demanded too difficult of data transmissions through it (I have only used it to link my iPad to my TV (for non-1080 viewing)), it has worked flawlessly.  Overall it seems to be a great value.

Reviews.Title: Sweet
Reviews.Author: The Architect
Reviews.Content: Works like a champ. Way better than paying $25-30 for the same thing at a retailer. I'm happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great HDMI cable
Reviews.Author: ParrotPunch "dollardaze"
Reviews.Content: I bought this AmazonBasics High-Speed HDMI Cable to connect my laptop to my tv for big screen viewing.  The cable works flawlessly.  Forget the big names and higher prices.  Recently, I purchased another for a friend.

Reviews.Title: Cheap, Basic, High Quality Cables
Reviews.Author: kmallory
Reviews.Content: These cables were cheaper than any I could find at local electronics stores. The packaging was simple, no extra instructions manual (which should be obvious), and the cable quality is great. The Connectors are solid and the cable has enough flex and give that setting them up in my home entertainment system was easy.

Reviews.Title: A great hdmi cable at the amazon basics price.
Reviews.Author: okiedan "Pro Bono Publico"
Reviews.Content: My previous experience with the great quality of amazon basics cables brought me to these.  They are sturdy in construction.  They do not come covered in plastic shrink wrap so they are ready to go from the box.  That is one of the things I like about amazon basics cables...... no waste.  just my product.........

Reviews.Title: Why Pay More?
Reviews.Author: Logan Lewis
Reviews.Content: I have purchased nearly a dozen of Amazon's High-Speed HDMI cables in different lengths and they have all performed flawlessly.  I can't find a single reason to pay a big-box store $20-$30 for an HDMI cable when the Amazon house brand does everything you could ask for so much less.  Unless you need a length Amazon doesn't stock, I'd go with these.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I was looking for
Reviews.Author: Biker2012
Reviews.Content: Awesome, great for low price.  Save a lot rather than buying from best buy.  Well built, does everything its meant to do.

Reviews.Title: Great quality, great price
Reviews.Author: PT Cruiser
Reviews.Content: I purchased this cable for connecting a Blu-Ray player to a receiver. This cable worked as well as any high priced one from a big box electronics store. The quality is excellent and does what it's supposed to do. No sense spending a gazillion dollars when you can get these cables on Amazon. I like the 6.5 length because I have so many cords going all over the place in my home theater system, all feeding through a hole in the back of the TV cabinet/stand that the TV sits on. This gives me that little extra length where I need to wind around things.  I've always been happy with Amazon Basics products and use them whenever I can.

Reviews.Title: It works perfectly
Reviews.Author: Popisgirl06
