Reviews.Content: I bought expensive hdmi cables and they were replace recently with this brand, I have to say that I'll never again buy expensive hdmi cables again because I wasn't able to really see the difference in quality or use. They are awesome and the price is great!

Reviews.Title: Great cable; great price & free shipping - sounds good to me!
Reviews.Author: Suzanne
Reviews.Content: This is another one of those products where it seems like you just can't beat Amazon's price.  I recently purchased a Roku HD Streaming Player and a Sony DVPSR510H DVD Player (Upscaling) to use with my (relatively new) HD TV in the bedroom; I really don't watch a lot of TV, nor do I play video games, so was not necessarily looking for highest quality cables.  Not that I would even know the difference!  Anyway,  I checked around at our local stores, and was none too pleased at having to cough up a minimum of $15.99 or more just for a cable to connect a box to my TV. I saw that Amazon was offering it for $5.50 (plus free shipping), and felt that I couldn't go wrong with a price like that.  The cable seems durable and well-made; I found it easy enough to hook up both the Roku and DVD players with no problems, and picture quality seems great.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Deal
Reviews.Author: J_Say
Reviews.Content: This cable works wonderfully with my Vizio 3D TV for a much lower price than those available at local retailers. It seems durable as well. 100% satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for the price!
Reviews.Author: Andre Choquette "BorderBuyer"
Reviews.Content: Have to say, don't ever remember giving something a five star but here it goes!For under $10 bucks a dvi cable that is high definition, clear signal and easy packaging.... Have I gone to cable heaven?Quite simply, for the money hands down this is a perfect solution - only wish I knew they were available before I bought that other dvi cable for $55 from the Audio/Video store when I bought my TV.... Don't think they will take back the return after 8 months.....

Reviews.Title: HDMI Quality
Reviews.Author: Dusty
Reviews.Content: I bought a Rouku. I thought the HDMI cables were included but, they were not. So I found these. Not only were they the perfect match but, the quality was unmatched. I would recommend these to everyone!

Reviews.Title: It works + good price + free super saver shipping = hooray
Reviews.Author: meredith
Reviews.Content: I use this to hookup my Xbox/Kinect to a Samsung HD 3D TV. (Note: I have not tried the 3-D functionality, so I cannot comment on that).As I said in the title: it works + good price + free super saver shipping = hooray -- what more could I want?!

Reviews.Title: DOES WHAT IT SHOULD
Reviews.Author: Juanmi
Reviews.Content: Excellent, great price, exactly what I was looking for.In my country they sell this totally overpriced... awful. This is an excellent choice, and does exactly what it should do.

Reviews.Title: Great cable for a great price
Reviews.Author: Kristin
Reviews.Content: I have been using Amazon Basics cables alongside the super expensive Monster cables and these are no different from the Monster cables.The packaging is easy to open, and use for storage of unused cables.They are awesome!!!

Reviews.Title: Works great - fabulous price.
Reviews.Author: J. Earley
Reviews.Content: We use this to connect a laptop to a flat screen TV for classes using Skype.  It works great.  Haven't had a problem.  We really appreciated the price. Thanks Amazon.

Reviews.Title: High Quality
Reviews.Author: Star
Reviews.Content: Hi Quality cable for a fraction of the cost of bricks and mortar retailers. Works perfect to connect my new HDTV to the DVR.

Reviews.Title: worth every penny
Reviews.Author: MR.Rich
Reviews.Content: I'm late to technology when it comes to HDMI cables. i just finally bought a lcd flat screen TV, so i decided to use HDMI cables to replace the old red, white, and yellow's.walking in best buy and all they could point to are like $70-80 name brand HDMI cords im like "i refuse". so seeing these at first i was a little skeptical seeing the price and footage i could get on a cord. seeing that i knew nothing about these the info listed below helped alot and made me understand it was actually different ones and  decided to give Amazons cord a try . let me say without this cord, the new TV i bought would be crappy. when i plugged it up it turned the TV into this very clear crisp just piece of glass. it's so ridiculously good even if you bought one and months from now its bad, for the price you honestly cant go wrong

Reviews.Title: Cables that Work!
Reviews.Author: James Carlson
Reviews.Content: Don't bother with paying $$$ for cables that advertise improvement. These cables are cheap and work wonderfully! Unless you are a videophile go the route that commonsense dictates!

Reviews.Title: works like a charm
Reviews.Author: chewbottger
Reviews.Content: this cable gives me a crystal clear picture for my Xbox. I was unsure about the quality due to the low price, but i now love the amazon basics products

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: Wayne
Reviews.Content: I ordered this HDMI cable so I could connect my iPad to my TV. So far it works well and I have had no issue. The image quality is good when using this HDMI cable. I would buy this cable again if needed.

Reviews.Title: Works Perfectly For Us--Great Bargain!
Reviews.Author: One Reviewer
Reviews.Content: I purchased this to hook up to my laptop to our TV so our family could sit together to watch some of our favorite podcasts, and it works perfectly for us. In the past, we have spent way more on high-speed HDMI cables when we should have just bought the AmazonBasics ones instead, because this one is just as good as the $20-$25 ones! I have had no problems with this at all and couldn't be more pleased with the quality or the price. It's AmazonBasics for us from now on, I highly recommend this!

Reviews.Title: Heavy Duty HDMI
Reviews.Author: Bill Stockstill ""Bill""
Reviews.Content: This cord has all the capacity to run the most advanced equipment feeds. I am using it with a Netbook to my main TV to watch college football games on ESPN3. Its high quality and ships in hassle free packaging.

Reviews.Title: Great quality, great price
Reviews.Author: Juniorverse1
Reviews.Content: This cable works well with my newer devices that support 3D and ethernet via HDMI, but it also works just fine as a basic HDMI cable.  Once I upgrade more of my devices to support these features, I will definitely purchase more of these cables.

Reviews.Title: Why spend more?
Reviews.Author: James K. Butler
Reviews.Content: This 'basic' product works.  I haven't compared it side by side with more expensive items but it looks as good or better than my lap top screen when I use it to view my lap top screen on my tv.  Mostly I use it for NetFlix.  Why spend more? - Keith

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: M. Beck "Grayson's Mommy"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this to connect my second roku to my tv. It works great! With my first roku I bought an hdmi cable that was shorter from radio shack for $25. This is such a better value, and came fast!

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: Angela
Reviews.Content: This item was priced below what the cable company wanted. I needed an HDMI cable to attach my cable box  to my new 32" flat screen Magnavox TV. I'm glad I thought of amazon and that I didn't have to buy a sound bar.

Reviews.Title: A good value
Reviews.Author: Ed O "Semper Gumby"
Reviews.Content: Bought this just in case I needed an extra one.  Used it to connect an XBOX 360 to a new 46" LCD TV.  Works well and certainly a value.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: David "Foxboy"
Reviews.Content: These are light, but well made HDMI cables that work to the newest HDMI standard.  They plug in and stay in, work well, and are light weight.  I call that perfect, do not be afraid to order this item.

Reviews.Title: Save Money, Buy This
Reviews.Author: Luke the 4th "May the 4th be With You"
Reviews.Content: This cable will function just as well as very expensive versions.  The only time you need to buy a higher quality cable is if you need it to go a long distance, say 20 ft or more.  Other than that the cheap cables work just as good as the expensive ones.

Reviews.Title: works just fine
Reviews.Author: Just Me
Reviews.Content: I like the Amazon Basics products I've tried in the past.  (The paper shredder is great!)  Price is nice and the products work just fine, which sometimes even pricey products don't.  This cable is no exception to the Amazon Basics line and I would get more cables from Amazon Basics.

Reviews.Title: Does what it is supposed to do!
Reviews.Author: CCGal "MyReviews"
Reviews.Content: I needed a short cable to connect my Google TV box so that it would pass through my DirecTV signal, and this fit the bill perfectly!  These cables are just as good as the expensive cables you buy at a B&M; store, and they perform just as well (if not better).  The connections look solid, the cable itself is as "beefy" as any other cable I have used.I do not have a 3D tv setup, so I cannot comment on how well it passes through the 3D signal.  I also do not use this for Ethernet.

Reviews.Title: No Problems With Product
Reviews.Author: Neil
Reviews.Content: The cable works as intended. Have had no issues with it. This is all I needed as it is a digital signal.

Reviews.Title: This HDMI cord is perfect
Reviews.Author: silhouette_of_enchantment "zenfully awake."
Reviews.Content: I always like Amazon Basic's products, and this HDMI cord was also, not a disappointment. It fits my computer's HDMI port perfectly, and can stream movies and videos faster on my machine. The cord is a bit long, but in my house, it's a necessity. I'm very satisfied with this product.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I needed and wanted
Reviews.Author: bcb
Reviews.Content: I bought this HDMI cable to connect a Roku 2 XS streaming devise to my television.  It works flawlessly and is well worth its inexpensive price.  I would have preferred a shorter cable, but apparently shorter cables don't exist unless custom-made.

Reviews.Title: HDMI Cable works like it is suppose to
Reviews.Author: Rob Tanner / milenko "Rob Tanner"
Reviews.Content: This item works just like a HDMI cable. Quality is top notch. However what makes this item awesome is the price is right. I worked at BestBuy last year and the employees price was a little higher then the $5.49 I paid for it with Amazon. Heck, I buy good deals all the time, just to have them on backup if needed. Amazon is doing you right with the price and quality of this HDMI. I also purchased, at the same time AmazonBasics Digital Optical Audio Toslink Cable, 6 Feet . I love me a good deal. Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Works fine, but so sturdy you can hardly bend it.
Reviews.Author: Two kids mom "scienceteachermom"
Reviews.Content: No problems using with a Sony TV, an Epson projector a LG blu ray, Sony blu ray and Magnavox DVD player.  However, the cable is very, very stiff.  This makes it hard to feed through the holes in my entertainment center.  I would think this is a function of what it supports, but I have a Bluerigger that is the same length but a little thinner and a LOT more flexible.  This Amazon version reminds me of a garden hose!  It does feel very sturdy, so if you do not have to snake it through furniture to get it where it needs to be, this is a good choice.

Reviews.Title: Super Cable!
Reviews.Author: Wendy & Jeff S
Reviews.Content: This is just about the most serious cable I've ever seen. Thick and sturdy and quality made.While I haven't gotten around to testing the advanced 1.3 features (such as audio return path, 3D, and ethernet) it works perfectly for normal applications and is an impressive product. Only thing to note is that being a heavy duty cable, it might be a little harder to tuck behind trim or run through a crowded cable conduit.

Reviews.Title: A Genuine Bargain in an HDMI Cable
Reviews.Author: Lawrence H. Bulk "Lawrence H. Bulk"
Reviews.Content: There is a famous and ubiquitous "Big Box" electronics and appliance store, the initials of its name, coincidentally, being the same as "Big Box."This store sells HDMI cables. Now this week, they have a number of approximately 3-foot HDMI cables "on sale" - their sale prices ranging from $15.00 to $50.00(!).Take a look at this AmazonBasics High-Speed HDMI Cable (3 Feet/0.9 Meter) - Supports Ethernet, 3D, and Audio Return [Newest Standard]. Its current price is only $4.99.Is it as good as the ones sold at the "Big Box" store? Let me just say that an HDMI cable is an HDMI cable. Some of them "look" much fancier than others but what counts is the construction and the performance.With an HDMI cable, there is no "it mostly works." It either works or it doesn't work.This AmazonBasics one works perfectly.As a matter of fact, AmazonBasics' other HDMI cables (I have a few of varying lengths) ALL work perfectly. And they are all constructed to a very high standard. I have never had ANY AmazonBasics cable fail.Thus I can confidently state that AmazonBasics HDMI cables in general and this one in particular are as good as they get.Now, if you choose to buy from the "Big Box" store, you will have "instant gratification."If you order from Amazon, you may have to wait a couple of days or so.$15.00 up to $50.00 for "instant gratification" or $5.00 with a bit of waiting?The quality is the same. The only difference is the price.It's your choice. It ought to be obvious what MY choice is!I highly recommend this HDMI cable.Thank you for reading this.

Reviews.Title: WOW!
Reviews.Author: shaxper
Reviews.Content: I was expecting a catch.  This 15' HDMI cable is offered at a fifth of the price of what I paid for my first HDMI cables, and yet it works just as well.  I truly don't see a difference when using it to connect my blu ray player to my 43" HD TV.  The picture is just as brilliant.I truly have no idea why you WOULDN'T purchase this cable as compared to similar products offered by competitors at a significantly higher price.

Reviews.Title: No Problems Here
Reviews.Author: David J. Riebe "lxluthr"
Reviews.Content: These Amazon Basic HDMI cables sure do the job, I use them for my xbox 360, my satellite tv and my Blu Ray player. I have 3 of these so far and I will always get these if I need more.UPDATE:Just got myself another set of these, simply amazing, especially for the price. I really cant believe people go out and spend 30-60 bux for hdmi cables. these are great!!!

Reviews.Title: Amazon Basics HDMI cable
Reviews.Author: James L. Lawrence
Reviews.Content: Excellent cable for the price.  Seems the price range for this type cable can run from $60.00 to $5.00.  This cable does everything I need it to do for a great price.  Why pay more?

Reviews.Title: you get more than you pay for
Reviews.Author: someDUDE
Reviews.Content: what can i say you get more than you pay for it does its job and well it is a great deal

Reviews.Title: HDMI cable great deal
Reviews.Author: ShopHappy
Reviews.Content: This cable came in handy to hook-up our new Roku to our HD tv. I was unsure of the quality due to the price but it has turned out to be a great deal for price and quality. I will definately buy another one if i have another need for this type of cable.

Reviews.Title: Great product, great price!
Reviews.Author: Shannon M.
Reviews.Content: This HDMI cable is as good, if not better than you can buy in the big box stores.  Much better price!  Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Good product/Great Price
Reviews.Author: A. Kabani
Reviews.Content: Ordered this item with Apple TV.  After being "robbed" by the big box companies for cables, I was pleasantly surprised with this cable.  Works as described and is well priced.  The two ends say amazon.com, but who cares.  No one sees what brand the cables are.  And I am hopeful Amazon stands by their private brands.

Reviews.Title: Best buy for the money
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: All HDMI cables are the same.  Don't believe any of the hype regarding the very expensive ones.  Digital communicates in binary, therefore either the receiving device gets the 0, 1 or it does not.  Amazon cables are the best prices that you can find.  If you need an HDMI cable these are the ones. I purchased an Apple TV and this cable.  It works great.  I have purchased several for family and saved them between 25-35 per cable.  Most cables at best buy are $29.99 - $39.99.

Reviews.Title: 1 Bad Cable Out Of 4
Reviews.Author: Oregonian
Reviews.Content: I ordered four of these cables. Upon receipt three of them work fine and one did not. I tried swapping cables around with no success. One of the four is definitely bad. The picture between my cable box and TV goes on and off with this cable. All others work OK.Overall, these appear to be nice quality cables and I have requested a replacement (rather than refund) for the defective one as they do seem to be pretty good quality.Even with this issue, I would still recommend these cables as they seem to be good value for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great cables and good price
Reviews.Author: Jaime Szigethi
Reviews.Content: HDMI cables that works. Image quality is great, packaging is simple (takes less than 10 seconds to get the cable to the TV) and its cheap... what else could you want?

Reviews.Title: Excellent Inexpensive Cable - Plain 2 Meter Version
Reviews.Author: C. Medlin
Reviews.Content: The Good:+ Inexpensive+ Excellent quality video & sound+ Latest standard, so you shouldn't have to replace it for a whileThe Bad: none so far.I bought a couple of these to hook up everything to my receiver and TV.  They will work with the latest technology, supporting ethernet, 3D, and audio return (i.e. you shouldn't have to replace them for a while).  Even if you don't need all of those things it is still a great inexpensive cable and will be able to deal with any new technology you buy in the near future.The plain (non-braided) version that I bought is not very stiff and pretty easy to maneuver.

Reviews.Title: excellent, but consider the 2 pack
Reviews.Author: Michael Eade
Reviews.Content: These are excellent hdmi cables, however, the 2 pack hdmi cables are the same except they have colored bands on the ends.  This helps to distinguish them when you're setting up a home theater, and eliminates the trial and error.  Because of this simple addition, and because the 2-pack is cheaper than buying 2 of these, my recommendation goes to the 2 pack.

Reviews.Title: Works with no problems
Reviews.Author: Sam G
Reviews.Content: I received this item quickly, and it works fine. Don't over-spend on high priced HDMI cables. After reading the CNET article on why all cables are basically the same, I bought this one. Works without a hitch!

Reviews.Title: Cables
Reviews.Author: OnlineGuru31
Reviews.Content: I needed HDMI cables and these fit the bill.  Easy to order and good price.  Much better than any store.  I'm not saying they are the cheapest as I have heard about some other deals online but they are well priced and very useful to anyone with an HD device.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Price for a Perfect Cable.
Reviews.Author: TheKioskZone
Reviews.Content: I just got an Apple TV2 and needed some HDMI cables. I went to my local store (B*** B**) only because of how I wanted the cable now rather then wait 2 days for it from here. I know how much of a mark up the price is on basic cables like these though I didn't realize how much of a mark up it truly is.These cables are perfect HDMI cables and you can't go wrong. The packaging is simple and the cable is easy to work with. I couldn't be happier.

Reviews.Title: Read the top reviews - expensive HDMI cables are a waste
Reviews.Author: Inspiring Insomnia
Reviews.Content: Last year, I purchased my first HDTV and Blu-ray player.  (Yes, I am WAY behind the times!)  I did a little research on HDMI cables and I read through some of the Amazon reviews which convinced me that expensive HDMI cables are a waste. I purchased three of the AmazonBascs cables, and they have functioned perfectly.  Thanks to the reviewers who took the time to explain these things and for helping those who are less technologically-inclined to save some money!

Reviews.Title: Best bargain around
Reviews.Author: CEG
Reviews.Content: I've bought this and several other AmazonBasics HDMI cables. They work great, are solidly built and at a no frills price.  If you think you are getting a better cable from a brand that costs $100, I suggest you try these, compare the two and you'll realize the scam.

Reviews.Title: pretty good cables
Reviews.Author: Bill C
Reviews.Content: pretty good cables, good price seemed to work well even with Blue Ray player, which demands high speed cables, the extra length is a must if your wall mounting a tv at eye level and inside wall running your cables

Reviews.Title: Works As Expected...
Reviews.Author: JP "J.P."
Reviews.Content: It would be simple to just say that this cable works and transmits signal great, but it is also very durable. I use this cable to connect a tablet to my TV so I move and bend this cable frequently. Over the 6 months I have had it this cable has not degraded or shown any signs of stress.

Reviews.Title: Excellent cables!!
Reviews.Author: M. Amores "manny.amores"
Reviews.Content: I used to buy expensive Monster Cables and swore that anything less than MC were for amateurs. After reading plenty of reviews that recommended not wasting money on expensive cables I decided to give them a chance. Afterall, at the price Amazon offers them, even if they didnt turn out to be what I expected, it would have been a small price to pay for a lesson learned. The real lesson I learned was how much money I had thrown away in expensive cables. This is my third set of Amazon cables and I highly recommend them to anyone. Great job!

Reviews.Title: Simple, sturdy, and a great deal
Reviews.Author: J. Christensen
Reviews.Content: Exactly what it should be: a cable that gets the job done at a great price point. The cable has a nice thick sheathing with well-constructed ends. It comes with nice little caps on the end as well, is double-boxed in Amazon's "frustration free" packaging, and is slightly more generous in length than advertised (see my user photos). If you need a standard HDMI cable, look no further.

Reviews.Title: So fast.
Reviews.Author: fastbutt
Reviews.Content: Ordered on Friday and the package was on my doorstep Sunday. Amazing turn-around time. It was exactly what I needed.

Reviews.Title: Great value and works just as expected
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Perkster"
Reviews.Content: I'm not sure what else you can say about wires except that they work just as I'd hope they would. They're a great value and I can't tell any difference between these and the more expensive ones we've bought.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Price and Cable
Reviews.Author: Jeremy C. Smith
Reviews.Content: Just let me start out by saying that despite what some higher end companies want you to think, HDMI cables are all pretty much the same (the only difference being the "standards" version of the cable as new cables send extra information such as 3D).  With that being said, these cables have worked flawlessly since being hooked up to our brand new Panasonic LED TV.  This will be the second set of Amazon Basic HDMI cables we've purchased over the years (the others were for a bedroom tv) and we've been very happy with them both times.  Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Keri
Reviews.Content: I bought this cable cause I needed a HDMI cable to connect my PS3 to my TV (not sure if the PS3 came with one but if it did I lost it around the house). I've been using it every day for a few weeks now and still works. I use it mainly to watch movies and tv shows through the PS3 with scarce use for gaming.***Update***I have now been using this cable every day for over a year and it still works perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Works like it should.
Reviews.Author: Patrick Copeland
Reviews.Content: This $5.49 cable works just as good as the heinously overpriced HDMI cables found in stores. There's no reason to pay more than $10 for a 6ft cable. I'd gladly buy another Amazon Basics cable than go for anything sold in stores, those prices are just plain ridiculous.

Reviews.Title: Solid Cord!
Reviews.Author: UPS GUY "JJ"
Reviews.Content: Ok first off, I am definitely NOT an expert on HDMI cables. I have just as many questions as the next as to why some cords are 5 bucks and others are 100 bucks. Naturally, I wanted to buy the best of everything so I was and still am tempted to buy a Monster cable. They have one for sale that has 17.2 transfer speeds for 34 bucks. BUT I read a bunch of online forums about this stuff and ALMOST everybody said that they all did the same thing. Some people said that the higher end cables are made out of real gold and they will last longer but all of them do the EXACT same thing. That is what made me buy this AmazonBasics cord. This is def a solid cord and should last quite a while. It's not like it's going to go through any abuse or anything like that so I see no reason why I should have problems with it going bad.I know there is someone out there that is smarter than me about these cables and I would LOVE someone's input about these. It doesn't show the transfer rate or whatever on this cord. Like the Monster's used to be 15 point something and now they are 17 point something. What is the advantage of that??? Please comment!This cord will most def do the job that you need it to do! It's an AmazonBasic so you know it's good quality and will last a while. Overall, 5 stars!!!

Reviews.Title: Best Quality BEst VALUE!!!
Reviews.Author: M. V. Ygana "Reyna*Ria"
Reviews.Content: When I bought a samsung Led hd 3d tv here in amazon I made sure I got an Hdmi for the best picture... I was debating to get the monster cables best buy has but decided to try this one instead. I bought 2 of these and My husband and I were so amazed of the clarity it provides... You can compare this with the expensive cables they sell in bestbuy. I have one from best buy and there is no difference.. It is gold plated and is just the perfect length.. I hooked up our ps3, on the other one we got. Its a must buy for every tv purchase in amazon... It shipped free with my purchase but I recieved it separately from the tv.

Reviews.Title: Buying HDMI cables
Reviews.Author: 58K
Reviews.Content: When I first started replacing the tube-type TV's in my home with HD, I was taken in with the sales people telling me about "gold plated contacts" and higher transmission rates.  Fortunately, it didn't sound quite right, so I took a little time to look into it.  The short answer is, with a couple of minor notable exceptions, HDMI is digital; you're getting 0's and 1's, not what you used to get with an antennae.  If you get a good picture with a $6.00 HDMI cable, the picture won't be any better with a $60.00 one.  If you have your cable provider come in to do any kind of new connections and they provide an HDMI cable (mine did), it most definitely isn't with a $40 gold plated brand name with assorted bells and whistles one.The exceptions are with cables that run inside a wall, and that's a building code issue that has to do with shielding, not data transmission.  The other possible exception (note the term "possible") is on longer cable runs (30' or more) where impedance might (note the term "might") be an issue.I bought two of these Amazon Basics ver. 1.4 (ethernet capable) cables for my brand new (2012 model) 46", 240 hz, 3D, WiFi TV and for my brand new WiFi Blu-Ray player.  Regardless of what the salesperson tries to tell you, all signals come to the TV 60 hertz.  The 120 or 240 hz conversion happens inside the TV, once the 0's and 1's get there.  3D is also just 0's and 1's.  It all happens inside the TV, not as a result of the HDMI cable.  The TV and the Blu-Ray work fine.  Including shipping, I paid less for these 2 cables than what 1 would have cost at the retailer I bought the TV from.Amazon, is by the way, shipping these in cardboard boxes now, not the PIA plastic clamshells.  If you spend more than what these are selling for, you're wasting your money.

Reviews.Title: Good quality
Reviews.Author: Carlos Cantu
Reviews.Content: The connectors are though, the transmited signal doesn't show loss, it works great when viewing hd or regular images from my ipad or iphone.

Reviews.Title: Good quality but
Reviews.Author: Derek Lowe "twerking the jalopy"
Reviews.Content: This is a good quality cord, but I have not noticed much of a difference between this and another I bought on here for 2.50 US Dollars, I probably won't spend the exta money again on this for basic home use

Reviews.Title: Better than Monster Cables
Reviews.Author: Will Burgess
Reviews.Content: I purchased several of these cables for different uses, and have to say that I am very happy with the quality of them.  I do multimedia troubleshooting, and have used these cables to replace some that were 5x more expensive (I'm looking at you, Monster).  Any time anyone needs a HDMI cable, I point them to these.

Reviews.Title: Good cables
Reviews.Author: J. Learned "jlear"
Reviews.Content: These cables work well.  I have them connected to a Vizio TV and my XBOX 360, Blu-ray player, and ATT UVERSE box.  One cable was deffective, but Amazon sent a replacement.

Reviews.Title: Cheap But Cheaply Made
Reviews.Author: T. Kelly "Accident"
Reviews.Content: This cable is very inexpensive but you get what you pay for with this. The audio/video signal was fine while the cable was working. However, the connector broke off the end of the cable very easily, exposing and crushing the individual pins.Update:Amazon replaced the cable and it has been working great.  The first one was just a bad apple but the speed and willingness of Amazon to make things right made up for the inconvenience.

Reviews.Title: Save yourself some money
Reviews.Author: SCinMT
Reviews.Content: I work in electetronics for a living when it comes to HDMI cablesThere is NO difference between the 7 dollar ones and one that is 100Dollars great product for 7 bucks highly recommend!!

Reviews.Title: not the best, but it works
Reviews.Author: Sidney5101
Reviews.Content: This cord is no where near the best, but then again, why do you really need it?  all of the HDMI cords do essentially the same thing, my only gripe is that this cord feels a little stiff, and Doesn't turn very well around corners, but can easily be managed.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Gregory Watts
Reviews.Content: Bought it for the PS3. Really nice quality cable. Don't waste your cash on other expensive cables, this does the job.

Reviews.Title: Cheap and effective
Reviews.Author: Justin Fahmie
Reviews.Content: Save some money and skip buying an HDMI cable locally...this one works just fine! Cheap and effective HDMI cable with no troubles

Reviews.Title: Stop wasting money at Best Buy
Reviews.Author: Mark Downing Heese "MDH"
Reviews.Content: Others have said it better and with more words but this really is just a basic cable with a solid price. You can find cheaper ones and WAY more expensive ones if you look around. It's nice to have Amazons name on it, which means you know you'll have their superb support and backing if anything is wrong with the cable early on.

Reviews.Title: HDMI out the box
Reviews.Author: Pete
Reviews.Content: Great product. Just plugged it into the back of my TV to my Mac Mini and Mac Mini detected it. Great picture and sound.

Reviews.Title: Does EXACTLY what my Monster HDMI Cord Does!
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: For the price this can't be beat! I bought this because I needed another HDMI cord and I didn't want to have to pay the Monster Brand price, and I am glad I chose this! This cord does the exact same thing with the exact same quality as any expensive HDMI cord such as Monster. The only difference between my Monster cable and this one is that my Monster cord is a thicker gauge cord but the picture quality is exactly the same! If I ever need another HDMI cable I will be buying another AmazonBasics branded one.

Reviews.Title: Why pay more
Reviews.Author: rc
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical of the quality due to the price. They work great, no issues.  Go ahead and buy these hdmi cables

Reviews.Title: works as advertised
Reviews.Author: Cory
Reviews.Content: I'm not a big AV guy so this review will be very short and to the point.  I have one of these cables connected to a PS3 and one connected to a Roku and both work well.  HD looks great but understand that I don't really have anything to compare it to.  The price is great and I believe that you will be satisfied with this product.

Reviews.Title: A good sturdy cable at a good price and it works perfectly with my new XBOX 360
Reviews.Author: Shalandra Sharma
Reviews.Content: I ordered this cable to hook in my new XBOX 360 system to my TV (Samsung) and Home-Theater System (Sony Blu-ray 3d). The picture and sound quality delivered is very nice. The installation was easy (of course you just have to plug in the cable). As the cable is braided it has a very sturdy feel to it and is slightly difficult to maneuver. I have used it only for couple of days but it feels like it should last long. I will update the review if that does not happen. Amazon frustration-free packaging was good too, it's really frustration-free :). Overall a good buy for the price.

Reviews.Title: HDMI cable
Reviews.Author: Breathe "Breathe"
Reviews.Content: Bought this in error because I thought I needed it to connect my sound bar to my new TV - wrong.  Also bought a ROKU at a store without buying a connector for that.  Got home and realized that the HDMI works with the ROKU.  Comedy of errors turned out for the best.

Reviews.Title: excellent cables for a cheap price
Reviews.Author: James P. Morgan "jp49"
Reviews.Content: These cables were excellent quality and the price was very reasonable. The cables were heavy duty and provided excellent signal quality.

Reviews.Title: Workd
Reviews.Author: Aaron
Reviews.Content: Works as advertised. I use with cable box and xbox 360. I plug and unplug a few times a week and have yet to experience problems. Have only owned product for 2 months.

Reviews.Title: Better than insignia
Reviews.Author: Longster
Reviews.Content: I replaced the cable from Insignia (Best Buy) to Amazon's HDMI and you can tell the difference right away.  The screen picture has much better clarity and the motion is much better than I expected.  Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: good quality, good price
Reviews.Author: thefunny1
Reviews.Content: These cables are pretty good so far. They are solid quality at an economical price. Love Amazon Basic's products. I plan to order more for other devices to connect to my tv.

Reviews.Title: Good cable at a good price
Reviews.Author: Michael J. Edelman
Reviews.Content: It's not widely known among most consumers, but not every HDMI-labeled cable meets the full HDMI standard. This caused me a lot of head-scratching with my first Roku box, which would mysteriously blank out the video (but continue to stream audio!) after it had been streaming for a few hours. Turned out my TV set wasn't getting the right signals, assumed there was no video, and was going into screen-saver mode. It took me a fair bit of searching the web to figure this out.You'll have no such problems with this cable. It meets the latest HDMI 1.4 standards, and should work fine with any HDMI compliant video device- and at a very attractive price, too.

Reviews.Title: You can't go wrong with this!
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: The Amazon Basics line of HDMI cables is a superb value. With these you'll get a cable that supports the latest standards (Ethernet, Audio Return, 3D, etc...) for a heck of a good price. $10 for basically 10 feet of cable. I have this, as well as about 7 of the 2 meter cables, and they have all been flawless. Having the non-braided version is a really nice option when you need flexibility to route these around corners and things like that. The braided cables are much stiffer and can be a real pain to get where you need them to be. For most installations these HDMI cables are absolutely perfect.I currently have these on 3 DirecTV receivers, 3 televisions, 2 Blu-ray players, 2 HD DVD players and an Onkyo A/V receiver and have had absolutely zero problems with any of them. There are no synching issues and have never had a handshake issue.All in all I'd say these are about as close to perfect as you'll get for a basic, yet "up to date" HDMI connector. Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Xbox 360 usage
Reviews.Author: TX Reviewer
Reviews.Content: Using this cable for my xbox360-LCD tv hookup. No issues. Good price. Good quality.  Buy it! Recommend it to all

Reviews.Title: high quality product
Reviews.Author: Fanazon
Reviews.Content: Just as I have come to expect from Amazon. This is the highest quality HDMI cord I have purchased. amazon comes through for me again!

Reviews.Title: High Quality Gold Plated HDMI Cable
Reviews.Author: K. R. Merryman
Reviews.Content: I purchased (4) of the AmazonBasics High-Speed HDMI Cable (6.5 Feet/2.0 Meters) - Supports Ethernet, 3D, and Audio Return [Newest Standard]. The cables are high quality and will handle all your latest digital needs. The gold plated cable ends are very securely attached to the durable cable wires. The cable plugged into the HDMI outlets very securely without any loose wiggle or sloppiness! I use the cables for a Gaming Computer, PS3 Console and Surround Sound System. The cost of this cable was 1/4th the cost (or less)of cables at the box stores! You can't do better than this cable and the "less than $8.00" price is icing on the cake!

Reviews.Title: great for the price
Reviews.Author: Graham Torrey
Reviews.Content: Great product for the price...  You would pay 3 X this amount at best buy.  The shipping was fast.  The only word of caution is that the product is pretty stiff and hard to bend.

Reviews.Title: Best HDMI value out there!
Reviews.Author: G. Stiller
Reviews.Content: I don't honestly know why anyone would pay $40 or more for a HDMI cable when you can have this one for under $10. Folks, a DIGITAL signal cannot be corrupted or improved upon, despite the MONSTER hyperbole. You may get better quality packaging around the connectors, etc. but if you are like most people where you simply connect and forget about your cables, don't waste your hard earned ca$h on anything else.

Reviews.Title: Can't be beat for the Price
Reviews.Author: S. Farrell
Reviews.Content: They work great with my Apple TV. My buddy paid $25.00 for a cable. As far as I can see absolutely no difference in performance or quality. I highly recommend if your looking for a basic cable.

Reviews.Title: IT Works
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: Not much to say here.It arrived on time it was packaged as well as a HDMI cable can be. And it works!

Reviews.Title: AmazonBasics High Speed HDMI Cable
Reviews.Author: David J. Harju
Reviews.Content: Good quality cable that connected my television to my digital cable box with high quality 1080 video and sound. The cable connected without any problems and the feel and the look of the cable seems to be of higher quality than other HDMI cables that I have used in the past.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy!
Reviews.Author: A. Phillips "coffee monster"
Reviews.Content: Seriously, you have to have the best high-end equipment to notice any difference (if at all) to warrant purchase of Monster (or similar) cables.  These work great, and I haven't noticed in deficiencies or poor manufacturing.  Currently used to connect PS3 to Sony Bravia HDTV.  Easy buy, so save your money by bypassing the overhyped costlier products (you can always return these if you like).  Strongly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Using with a PS3, and it's perfection
Reviews.Author: Shane Windham "Shane Windham, author"
Reviews.Content: I have no complaints. This was easy to install, everything fit the way it should and worked the way that it should. I would buy this product again and will recommend it to any friend when they go looking for one.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Adam
Reviews.Content: I do not see any difference in picture quality vs Monster cables.... but there is huge difference in the price...

Reviews.Title: great price
Reviews.Author: Keith Edward Brewster
Reviews.Content: i ordered the cable and got it very quick and at a great price. would recommend this to my friends

Reviews.Title: As advertised
Reviews.Author: Y Elvis "yelvis"
Reviews.Content: Gotta love Amazon these days for their rock bottom cable prices while still keeping good quality.  These cables are no exceptions - solid, well-built products with good picture quality. Simply amazing how well-priced they are.

Reviews.Title: Great budget cables
Reviews.Author: Giantsfan510
Reviews.Content: DO NOT SPEND OVER $10 FOR ANY HDMI!!! It bothers me that so many big box stores sell "high end" monster cables and other brands for 3-10 times the price of these cables, with NO advantage at all. There is no way you could tell a difference from these cables and an expensive, overpriced cable. These things work perfect and I have had no issues, and thats after buying over 6 of these cables, all with no issues and super nice and high quality images. Highly recommend these.

Reviews.Title: Great cable
Reviews.Author: MaxPayne
Reviews.Content: Great cable.  Works as advertised.  I used it to connect sony speakers to Sony tv.  needed 1.4 specs for ARC.

Reviews.Title: So Far So Good
Reviews.Author: K. Conklin
Reviews.Content: When selecting Panasonic blu-ray player to go with my new Panasonic 3D plasma, amazon suggested this cable and I went with it. Why? Last year when I purchased it to connect my soundbar to another Panasonic plasma it did NOT work and caused me a great deal of dismay and confusion and time wasted on telephone with Panasonic technical help. Of course Amazon refunded after return and I used another vendor at lesser price and had no problems. Because I was getting other things from amazon it made sense to me to give them a try again on this cable. I can tell you that I do not like reading technical specs nor following instructions in pamphlets. This cable worked out of the box. Connected to blu-ray player and then the appropriate hdmi slot on the television -- and Magic. Instant talking to each other - went to Viera Link instead of trying to follow instructions that came with the blu-ray player - Magic Wand recognition. Not one instant of problem or hesitation. The flexibility of the cord and length of cord - all very good! I will update this review later if the cable fails as I have not tried to view anything 3D yet, and I did read the one star reviews from people who say it doesn't last. I surely hope I do not become one of that group and can remain in the majority of folks who are satisfied with the cable. I am happy camper right now!

Reviews.Title: Great, cheap
Reviews.Author: Thumpah
Reviews.Content: HDMI cords are ridiculously over-priced in stores. Amazon's basic HDMI cords are great as far as the cheap price and quality. With amazon student I got the cord with free 2 day shipping so it came out to less than half of what BestBuy wanted for their cheapest HDMI cord. Buy it, it's worth it.

Reviews.Title: Works well for my PS3
Reviews.Author: Allan Leon
Reviews.Content: Needed another HDMI for my PS3.This seems to do the job just fine. Image is crisp and have had no issues with the image fading in and out. Had for about a week or so with no problems hopefully it holds up

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Louis Edelman
Reviews.Content: This is a beautiful looking, braided HDMI cable.  It is built with quality materials and holds together well.  The braided cable prevents it form tangling and the quality of the data is as good as a $30 cable.

Reviews.Title: They're HDMI cables.. what do you say ?
Reviews.Author: Gary W. Boore
Reviews.Content: Price was much better then any shops around here,, actually about half of what they were at Walmart.  They work find and I have no complaints.  They arrived timely and were packed very well.

Reviews.Title: Surprised at the quality
Reviews.Author: Sheetal R Jain
Reviews.Content: I was expecting something of a lower quality but this is a high quality braided design and quite thick too! Doesn't twist as easily as the other cable I had previously but definitely a good quality cable.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: HG
Reviews.Content: it works perfectly and thats all i can ask for... good buy... i encourage anyone and everyone to buy from here.. because i know i would shop here again!

Reviews.Title: Just what I was looking for !
Reviews.Author: yankees1520
Reviews.Content: I bought these HDMI cables for my sons 21 inch samsung high defination television. Hooked them up to the TV than to the cable box and we were done, excellent picture at a great price. No need to spend big cash at PC Richards or Best Buy on HDMI cables. Delivered right to the door out of the box and hooked up in 3 minutes.

Reviews.Title: Strong Durable cable
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: The product is strong and durable (which is what I wanted); but didn't realize how strong this cable was. It doesn't turn very well and isn't so good if you are reaching short distances.However, the quality of the video and audio signal is absolutely outstanding. I'd definitely like to try the non braided cable.

Reviews.Title: God bless Amazon!
Reviews.Author: Eduarrdo Nietzsche
Reviews.Content: This no-nonsense HDMI cable works beautifully and is a fraction of how much the big box stores will gouge you for alleged "quality" or "premium" cables, the Monster brand ones in particular (which are of equal if not lesser quality).  Just to amuse myself, I took it over to my neighbor's house and changed it out with his $40 Monster HDMI cable...exactly as I expected, identical performance.Also love the environmentally friendly and easy-opening cardboard box packaging it came in, instead of the usual sealed plastic monstrosity that you practically need a blowtorch to open up which most audio/visual cables come in!

Reviews.Title: Great cable, no complaints.
Reviews.Author: Brigitte H
Reviews.Content: "AmazonBasics" may sound like a store-brand name that is of lesser quality, but that simply is not true! This is a great product at an even better price.Blu-ray worked great, 3D worked great, sound and everything else worked great! Can't beat $8 for an HDMI cable that does all that.

Reviews.Title: Amazon HDMI 1.4 cable
Reviews.Author: H. Tanuwidjaja
Reviews.Content: v1.4 HDMI cable for this price? Speechless, GREAT build quality, kinda heavy compared to other cheapo brand, it comes with simple amazon cardboard box and each end of the HDMI is covered with plastic. get 2 meters is already enough if youre going to hook up your laptop to a bigger screen, otherwise get a longer one, in case you dont want to be risky. Get this, i recommend this!

Reviews.Title: Do the job
Reviews.Author: Frank
Reviews.Content: New installation; decided to go for more expensive braided cables to ensure best possible outcome.  They work just fine.  No comparison to any other cables because this is my first use of HDMI cables.These cables are quite bulky and have a turning radius of about 4-5 inches.  Don't expect to be able to wrap them tighy around anything smaller.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Michigan Mom
Reviews.Content: I purchased 2 of these and they work perfectly. These cables do their job at half the price of those in stores!

Reviews.Title: Great cable and great price!!!
Reviews.Author: Gael
Reviews.Content: Great value and great price for this HDMI cable.  Better off getting this than spending $40 or $50 on one.

Reviews.Title: It is an HDMI world now
Reviews.Author: digitalman "digitalman"
Reviews.Content: Having worked for  a consumer electronics store while in college, I am well aware of the fact that most wires are more profitable then the device you will be plugging it into. It is for this reason that places like best buy sells HDMI cables for $180. That is a rip off.These cables are far more affordable and do the exact same thing that the overpriced ones. The only thing that they don't do is cost more. I have several of these cables and have had excellent results. They are even capably of 3d and ethernet over HDMI. A great value.

Reviews.Title: Superb
Reviews.Author: achao
Reviews.Content: Much better price than those outlandish brand names, but works just as advertised from my HD cable box to DLP HDTV.

Reviews.Title: Work great with 3D
Reviews.Author: A Kiesler
Reviews.Content: I use these on my cable boxes, Bluray player and Playstation 3 to my TV's. They work great for 3D as well as regular HD. Great cables, great price. Need I say more?? :)

Reviews.Title: Great Quality
Reviews.Author: Pinky
Reviews.Content: This is the first time buying Amazon brand item.  To be honest, did not expect the product quality and it's absolutely great price.  I will more look into Amazon brand for future.

Reviews.Title: Compared to a more Expensive HDMI cord
Reviews.Author: Jai
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased a Playstation 3 InFAMOUS 2 320GB system bundle from Walmart. As you all know, the PS3's do not come with HDMI cords so I decided to buy one from Walmart. It was a Sony HDMI cable. Very nice looking, very durable and top of the line quality. However, it was a whopping $34 and some change. I got it knowing I was going to return it since my Amazonbasics HDMI cable was on the way in the mail. (No Patience) In the end when mine finally arrived, it gave the same performance as the "elite" Sony HDMI cable. VERY same. Sound was the same and so was the image quality on my 60HDz LCD LG 42" 1080p flatscreen. Get this one! You won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Economical yet great performance.
Reviews.Author: Krish
Reviews.Content: I bought the HDMI Cable for my LG 3D TV. The output is great... Before buying this, I bought an expensive HDMI cable from a local electronics (National Chain) store. I didn¡¦t see any difference in the audio and/or video quality. Hence I returned the expensive one. If it's for regular use such as DVD/BR ³ TV, it¡¦s the best bet¡K

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: g-muni
Reviews.Content: I probably didn't need a cable this long, but I think the shorter ones were almost the same price, but thought that maybe in the future I will need the extra length. The braiding seems to be a plus as far as providing a longer life and it doesn't get tangled up on itself or with other cables.I hate all wires and cables as a rule.Why doesn't someone invent Broadcast Power? Come on all you neo-Teslas out there!

Reviews.Title: Great price
Reviews.Author: Eric in CT
Reviews.Content: Does what it should at a great price!  Don't bother with the crazy prices at best buy or other electronics stores.

Reviews.Title: Great cables.
Reviews.Author: M. Trembley
Reviews.Content: The cables have all been working great for me.  I *love* the packaging they come in -- good job Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Quality
Reviews.Author: Tim
Reviews.Content: I've bought other HDMI cords because they could be had for cheaper. Well, there's a reason for that. All of my other cords have broken at the connection, have trouble staying in, etc. I've had one of these longer than all the others and it still works perfectly. Quality brings loyalty, not to mention that their price is still very low too, and that's why when I needed a new cord this time, I came straight back to this one. Works perfectly, thanks Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Quality Braided Product - use if you are mounting your TV
Reviews.Author: E. Plautz
Reviews.Content: This cable supports 1.4 capabilities but most importantly, the cable itself is braided, making it more resistant to friction and damage.The braiding, along with the ~10ft. length makes this item particularly useful if you are going to mount the television and snake the cable behind your drywall down to your receiver.  Other non-braided cables could become damaged as they are pulled through the drywall.

Reviews.Title: Why would you buy something more expensive?
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: Someone please...please tell me why...why would you spend $170 on the same length HDMI cable, that ALSO supports ethernet and 3D and feels sturdy and high quality? As a matter of fact, if this isn't long enough for you, get a $40 HDMI Extender over CAT5 Network cable and $8 worth of 100 foot network cable, all available on Amazon, and be happier that your setup is cooler and less expensive than the Monster Cable that's as thick as 7-Eleven Big Bite and set you back $170. This is a simple choice for me. What do you think?

Reviews.Title: Affordable and Well-made HDMI Cable
Reviews.Author: Dr. Bojan Tunguz
Reviews.Content: I got this HDMI cable to connect my LG BD630 Blu-ray Player  to Toshiba HDTV. HDMI cables have become a de-facto standard for high-definition video and audio, replacing a whole host of cables with one simple interface. One other great advantage of using HDMI cables is that they are highly tolerant of different material quality standards. In other words, you don't need to get a "high end" HDMI cable in order to get a perfect picture. This cable worked just fine right out of the box, and the image quality was as good as the TV allowed. It's a relatively short cable, so you couldn't use it to stream content from one room to another. However, for local setups it provides you with more than adequate length.Overall, this cable works exactly as advertised, and it's a great value for the money. There are a few cables on Amazon that are even cheaper than this one, but in terms of overall quality of product this one is well ahead of those.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Lisa H
Reviews.Content: I purchased this cable for about $8.  I'm just using it to connect my Blu-Ray player to my receiver - it seems to work just as well as the $35 cable that I purchased at WalMart.  Wish I had found it sooner!

Reviews.Title: Don't spend more than you have to!!!
Reviews.Author: Chris M.
Reviews.Content: Summary: This product performs just as well as the >$50 cables. I work in this industry and even reviewers with the most trained eyes will not be able to tell the difference between this HDMI cable and the more expensive brands like Monster.Pros: Great HD quality cable, LATEST STANDARD (as of 6/29/11), performs as well (if not better) as my older Monster cables.Cons: None yet. Only time will tell if the quality is up to par.

Reviews.Title: Does the job and a good price!
Reviews.Author: J.L.
Reviews.Content: I got he Amazon HDMI cable and it works great for connecting laptops, game consoles, etc. It does the job and was a better price than what you would pay for over-priced Monster Cables or any other brand-name HDMI cables for that matter.

Reviews.Title: Perfect price for the perfect part
Reviews.Author: Trvlngmn
Reviews.Content: I searched several places, the walk in stores are ridiculously expensive. I shopped around on line and found many sites higher priced and few lower priced. I liked the reviews for this one so I placed the order. The order was confirmed, shipped and received in 4 days. ( west coast, USA ) No extra chargeThe cable works perfect as I expected it to. The picture quality is great and I will buy from the dealer again for other needs.

Reviews.Title: Exccccccccellent product!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Sandy
Reviews.Content: I will begin and end this review by mentioning just this.....DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY BY GOING FOR $80, $90 OR $150 HDMI CABLES, THIS WILL DO JUST FINE............LIKE LIKE SUPERLIKE THIS CABLE

Reviews.Title: Wow: Thanks Amazon
Reviews.Author: Keeper™
Reviews.Content: Mesh jacket on outershell, well constructed, snug fit and seems really durable yet flexible enough to move around the corners.You can really feel the quality by holding it along with the wt it carries.Love it ..I am not using the ethernet part but since I was buying one thought will "try to" future proof my investment by adding few dollars.Happy to answer any questions, if anyregardsPBG

Reviews.Title: HDMI cable
Reviews.Author: Wayne
Reviews.Content: I can't understand why anyone is spending more money on other cables. I bought my first cable from B.B. for $39.00. This one works just as well. I would never know the difference between the two of them.

Reviews.Title: very happy customer
Reviews.Author: S.D.A
Reviews.Content: I decided to buy these after seeing the price difference compared to name brands such as Sony or Monster and because of Amazon being a name brand itself. I cannot be happier, the cables work great and provide excellent quality. I would buy these any time over the cheaper no-name brands that seem to have quality issues.

Reviews.Title: good price and good quality
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: I can not tell a difference with various brand name HDMI cables. This one actually looks like a good quality cable even though there is no name brand.

Reviews.Title: Just what I was looking for
Reviews.Author: ftldaddybear
Reviews.Content: Just what I was hoping it was going to be. Could not ask for better and the price was great!

Reviews.Title: No issues, great picture!
Reviews.Author: D. Ripp "madredr1"
Reviews.Content: I ordered three of these with my new receiver.  Despite the scary negative reviews, I thought I would give them a try.  They work great.  I have them connected from an XBOX360 and a PS3 into my new Yamaha receiver, then one going from the receiver to the TV.  No problems at all.  I would recommend these cables, and have to a few of my friends.  Great product!

Reviews.Title: More than you pay for!
Reviews.Author: Out of state fan
Reviews.Content: Cable works well!  No need to buy more pricey HDMI cables.  Thanks for a quality product at an affordable cost.

Reviews.Title: I am a believer
Reviews.Author: David Stapleton
Reviews.Content: This is my second HDMI cable from the AmazonBasics set, both have been quality products, providing tight connection and seemingly great data throughput (the picture is there and wonderfully sharp, what more could you want?). This version is a bit thicker due to the HDMI 1.4 standard capability (not tested by my configuration).Overall, the price beats those overpriced Monster cables from the local electronics superstore and is just as good for my uses (1080p TV, Blu-ray, XBox).

Reviews.Title: hdmi cable
Reviews.Author: me
Reviews.Content: good cable, its works fine with the roku that i bought it for.it is kind of stiff and needed some "bending" to keep it from fliping the roku over.i would buy it agin

Reviews.Title: hdmi
Reviews.Author: D. lopaus "washashore"
Reviews.Content: revieved the cable the next day.  packaged well.  works fine with my new lg 3d tv and 3d stereo surround sound. would recommend.  cape guy

Reviews.Title: 1 worked, 1 didn't
Reviews.Author: E. Britt
Reviews.Content: The first cable I tried did not work well. Everything was skipping. I plugged in the other one and everything worked fine. Both cables looked very well constructed. I sent the faulty back and was credited very quickly. Amazon has the best return service I have encountered.

Reviews.Title: Backward Compatible?
Reviews.Author: Brad D. Stetson
Reviews.Content: I don't have the best eyes to tell the difference in quality between different HDMI cables. I have purchased some of the higher end ones and the bottom of the barrel, and don't really notice a difference between them. The reason I wanted to post this review was due to make others aware that "backwards compatible" to earlier versions of HDMI (earlier than 1.4) may not work quite as you intend.I purchased an HDMI switch that supports HDMI 1.3b. I assumed these wires would be fine, since they were backward compatible. However, they were not. The switch worked fine when I used actual 1.3 wires, but did not work using these 1.4 wires.My advice is to make sure your device(s) can actually support 1.4 before purchasing.

Reviews.Title: Does the Job.  :D
Reviews.Author: Liolania "In2Jesus"
Reviews.Content: I am not an audio/visual person, though my husband is, and he is always excited to try new AV things.  :)  I like how Amazon packages these, they come in no frills packaging, no having to cut a plastic package, just a nice little fold-close cardboard box, which is better for the environment as well.  :D  The cable worked, the video came in well, just as good as it did with the other cable we all ready had and the audio worked just dandy, no issues there.  So, would I recommend it, sure!  Its not a bad price and it is a quality product and you're not going to get too much cheaper, if at all, for a cable of its kind, so you really cannot go wrong!  :D  God Bless ~Amy

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Cable But Be Aware of HDMI Compatibility Issue
Reviews.Author: Carpe Diem!
Reviews.Content: I am impressed with the quality of the cable and its packaging. HDMI stands for High-Definition Multimedia Interface.The cable's HDMI version 1.4 is the present "cutting edge" technology already designed for future functionality.BUT, be aware that there may be some compatibility issues if you use it for connecting old hardware, or equipment with old software.In my case, it did not work with my new Vizio TV connected to the two year old cable box of Verizon FIOS.I had to switch back to my older version HDMI cable. I bought 3 cables. 2 work fine on my Blu-ray and other TV. I will keep the 3rd one for future use.

Reviews.Title: Not Monster, Thank Goodness...
Reviews.Author: Nathaniel Allen
Reviews.Content: Me, welcome me to the simplicity of digital! I'm so happy to be done with the angst of analog cables and Monster Cables' aggressive marketing ploys and way overpriced cables.I'm running these cables from a Samsung BD-D6700 3D Blu-ray Disc Player through a Denon AVR-3311CI HDMI 1.4a Receiver to a Samsung PN59D8000 59-Inch 3D Plasma and the picture quality is excellent, with vivid colors, no stutter or sync problems, zero visible interference and great, clean audio.The 6' cables are long for closely stacked component to component connections (I'd be in the market for an 18" or even a 12" version), but looping the excess cable and securing it isn't an issue.My only issue was that I bought three of these open box, and one was definitely NOT this newest version that supports Ethernet. Decals on the connector and on the cable jacket itself indicated as much. I noticed this outside of the Amazon 30 day return window, but explained the situation to customer service and they authorized the return.Each cable is individually boxed -- yes, boxed -- in Amazon's "Frustration Free Packaging." Frankly, it's a bit silly that they didn't just put these in baggies and mail them in a padded envelope, but that's a whole 'nother matter, isn't it?Highly recommended HDMI 1.4a compatible cable!

Reviews.Title: High Quality - Low Price
Reviews.Author: Spingrinder
Reviews.Content: Great HDMI 1.4 connectivity at a fraction of the price of what they will try to sell you in the big box stores.  Even if you have to wait for a couple of days to get these from Amazon it is well worth the wait as opposed to what BB or others will try to charge you for comparable cables.Mine have been error free and provide great signal and picture quality.  I don't have 3D capability yet, but now I have cables that will provide for it if needed.

Reviews.Title: AmazonBasics HDMI Cable
Reviews.Author: Okie Dokie
Reviews.Content: Doesn't it make you wonder how stupid they think we are?  After walking the Mall through Best Buy, Radio Shack, and then the strip centers with Office Max, Office Depot, etc., looking for a fair price on HDMI cable I began to realize how effective marketing can be in encouraging us to spend money we don't need to spend.  Reading the hype on the packaging you would think that there is a direct correlation between quality, speed, and dollars spent....  Wrong!  Bought the reasonably priced HDMI cables on Amazon, they got here as promised, work great, and for the difference in what I paid I ordered a new web cam.

Reviews.Title: No frills, does the job nicely.
Reviews.Author: bread
Reviews.Content: EXCITING!  It's an HDMI cable.  It works perfectly well.  Do you have an HDTV, perhaps a BluRay player?  Hey, buy this!  Hook it up!  Kick back and relax.Don't be an idiot and fall for that snake-oil hocus pocus bullcrap that Monster is trying to cram down your throat.  You don't need to drop [...] on a cable.  Buy this cable for under [...] bucks, hook up your electronics, and pocket the [...] that those Monster thieves are trying to scam off you.

Reviews.Title: BAD-A#@
Reviews.Author: Kold
Reviews.Content: AWESOME CABLE, i couldn't believe the quality for the price, it was just outstanding!--pros---High speed-3D-gold plated-high gage wire-shielded (no interference)-supports audio as wellWhen it comes to HDMI cables, you wanna make sure your getting the right one that can do everything an HDMI cable should do, but you also want it at a low pricewithout the worries of losing some type of "Feature" that this cable has or doesn't have.with all of these HDMI cable "types" floating around, "this one does this...This one does that" you can rest assured knowing that this cable does it all!its backed up by amazon, its certified, and i know that i have nothing to worry about.The best part is...its ten bucks and with amazon prime trial...shipping is 2 days and its free. XD--Cons---Cable is very thick, almost the type of cable you would expect to see running through your wall.-hard to bend, for those tight places if you have an enclosed entertainment center.-Bad-A@# looking, makes all your other cables jealous.(a jealous cable is a slow cable)

Reviews.Title: Cheapest and works great!
Reviews.Author: Lillyanni
Reviews.Content: I actually bought this as a gift for my brother and he had actually bought one from walmart about $$40. I was like woah!! Like the turtle from Nemo lol. But yea I found this and I was surprised they actually had something like this online that cheap by amazon. I had to get it. And my brother finally received it, and it actually worked alot better than that $40. So he returned that one and is now using this one and its great. The tv picture is really good especially the movie Nemo which is one of my Favorites. I would definately recommend this cord, great price, can't pass this up.

Reviews.Title: Fixed my PS3 problem
Reviews.Author: Carlos O Otero Reyes
Reviews.Content: I had other "High speed cables" but my ps3 was having problems with 1080p and 3d content, screen would go black and content would blink, snow screen ...many problemsamazon cables arrived and problem solved looks so much clear now so crisp and no more problems at all ...1080p looks like it should without issues and i even saw an increase in the audio quality of my Surround sound system

Reviews.Title: Why would you buy anything else?
Reviews.Author: Sameer Pai
Reviews.Content: I bought three of these cables after seeing the sticker shock at many retail stores on the prices of their HDMI cables.  In order to see what the difference is, I ran a comparison between this one and a Monster Cable HDMI cable that I bought at a popular retail chain.  The Monster Cable HDMI cable set me back around $70 for a 6ft cable and this one set me back about $10.  After plugging them both in from my Sony Blu Ray player to my Samsung TV (same ports, same components), I could not tell any difference whatsoever.  The colors, clarity, interference, etc were all the same.  I promptly returned the Monster Cable back to the store and kept this one, actually I bought two more after that too.With that said, this is the benchmark for an HDMI cable at this point when you bring price into the equation.  I'm sure that the Monster Cable with super duper THX triple certification is better in some miniscule way, but not for 7 to 15 times the price of this one.There is no reason anyone should ever buy anything but this and as usual, Amazon had perfect shipping with my Prime membership.  Oh and to put the cherry on top, the frustration free packaging was a wonderful surprise.  I didn't have to break out the hedge trimmers to open up the blister packaging while trying to avoid cutting a gash in my hand from the shards of plastic.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought a few of these for my 3D television, 3D Blue Ray player, Xbox 360, and HD Cable Box and they work great! Why anyone would spend the money to buy what they sell at the store is beyond me. I had a friend who bought a TV a couple days after me, and was told they had to buy the high end cables to make all their devices work correctly, and they spent another $360 on cables...I tried to tell them to return them and buy these instead, but they already threw out the packaging...

Reviews.Title: great cable at great price
Reviews.Author: casti1219
Reviews.Content: Before purchasing this cable I all saw was high priced cables at big dpt stores wich I preety sure have the same function as this one. The amazon basic cable is great, picture looks nice and that's the important part. Kind of surpizing that such a cable is at that price, but let's just amazon is showing some economic concern on their cust. The price is just rite makes you feel like you spent you money on the right stuff. Because in the end that's I how I feel, already looking into more amazon basic cables....

Reviews.Title: No brainer
Reviews.Author: notaezwin
Reviews.Content: I've purchased numerous HDMI cables and returned the expenses one as the price didn't translate into quality.Best deal period!!!

Reviews.Title: So much better gaming experience
Reviews.Author: D. Nguyen "Billy"
Reviews.Content: Increased dramatically my xbox gaming experience and picture quality on my Hisense 22" HD TV. I used the cables that were included with the xbox but now with this HDMI cable the pictures are like 10X better and you can see every little details while playing Call of Duty. Best $10 spent ever!!! Seriously!

Reviews.Title: Good product at a great price!
Reviews.Author: OneBetter
Reviews.Content: Read various reviews stating not to purchase HDMI cables in the average store since they were priced so high.  Order two from Amazon (one as a backup) and I am not disappointed.  Ordering the Amazon Basics allowed me to get two for the price of one with the cord being longer than 6".

Reviews.Title: Great value!
Reviews.Author: Javier
Reviews.Content: If you're looking for a hdmi cable then look no further. There isn't a difference in quality just because it's cheaper. I would strongly reccomend this to anyone who needs one. Don't spend 100 bucks on a cable that has the same quality.

Reviews.Title: It's about time
Reviews.Author: C. J. Moody "Visionary"
Reviews.Content: At last Amazon has thier own line of High Speed HDMI cables with ethernet (1.4).  Got to say I'm well pleased.  These cables are quality.  Purchased to go with my new Yamaha RX-V667 7.2 Surround sound a/v receiver.  Running everything with these cables (3 6.6' length, and 3 9.8') to accomodate all my HDMI peripherals.  These are also 3D cables should a person upgrade.  But the value and the quality are there.  You won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Very  Nice Quality Cable
Reviews.Author: James Rose
Reviews.Content: Wow, I still cannot believe I got cable this good for that price.  I've bought cheap cables in the past and while they have always got the job done, none came close to the quality feel and construction of this cable.  Add to that the assurance from Amazon that this cable meets the latest standards and it makes for a very good deal.

Reviews.Title: Great Cord Great Price
Reviews.Author: Eddie Chaney "J- Stielo"
Reviews.Content: This is a great cord. Amazon did it in... Honestly I have a monster cord that get 17 Mbps and I can Barely tell the difference in wires. I have this cord hooked up to my PS3 and the monster to my 3D Blu Ray player. Great cord for a great buy.Would recommend to any who has any type of HDMI hookup for any device... i will be getting one more for my normal DVD player in my bedroom hooked to a 52 " HDTV.

Reviews.Title: Great cable @ a great price
Reviews.Author: kevin
Reviews.Content: Have purchased two of these recently.  They have performed well even after having to be moved a few times.  It was worth the wait for shipping time to get the great price.  I have and will continue to recommend these cables to friends and family.

Reviews.Title: High Speed HDMI Cable
Reviews.Author: UK Blue
Reviews.Content: This cable improved the performance of my Sony 52 inch LCD/LED 240Hz TV as much as I thought it would.  The only cables I will buy from now on.

Reviews.Title: faulty cable Three times now.
Reviews.Author: fdare
Reviews.Content: I have ordered and returned three of these cables. Each time, the product looks as though it may well work. Then, after between a few hours and a few weeks, the picture on my screen begins to flash to black intermittently between once every ten seconds to about once per second. It is definitely the cable as all trouble shooting suggestions have been attempted. I am disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Why pay more?
Reviews.Author: J. Ard
Reviews.Content: I think my title says it all. The cables are quality built, Amazon's guarantee is good, I've had zero issues. Will never buy monster or any other over-priced audio/video cable again.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic HDMI cable
Reviews.Author: Kelvin Fong "Absolute Zero"
Reviews.Content: I take my electronics very seriously so I wasn't sure what to expect when I ordered an AmazonBasics branded HDMI cable but this product exceeded all of my expectations. First off, it's fairly priced. It isn't the cheapest HDMI cable you can find on the market but it's close enough. The video quality is fantastic and I guarantee that you won't be able to see any difference in picture using this cable compared to a $50 Monster cable. The design of this cable is also notable. The wire casing is compact and flexible in contrast to my bulky and stiff first generation HDMI cable. The locking mechanism is also substantially better. At the date of this review, this cable also uses the most up-to-date HDMI standards.Pros:Great video qualityNicely designedUpdated standardFrustration-free packagingInexpensiveCons:NoneBottom line: A fantastic, high quality HDMI cable that is a must for any HD setup.

Reviews.Title: Works well with PS3
Reviews.Author: J. Ofalla "Jonno"
Reviews.Content: I got this HDMI cable to connect my PS3 to my Samsung LCD TV.  Great quality for the price.

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised
Reviews.Author: AmazonBuyer "VVK"
Reviews.Content: This HDMI cable is a great value for money. Don't be fooled into buying cables that are up to 6 times as costly - this cable works just as well. It is also "future proof" as it supports Ethernet, 3D and an audio return channel. The "frustration-free packaging" was also great - just unbox the cable and start using it.

Reviews.Title: Great cable
Reviews.Author: R. Morgner
Reviews.Content: I purchased this cable to connect my new Panasonic Blu-ray player to my Panasonic 42" plasma TV purchased at the same time. The cable seems to function fine and the connections are a nice tight fit. It's my first cable of this kind and I'm glad I didn't spend more money for probably the same results. I believe these come recommended by Consumer Reports too.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Johnathan Bishop
Reviews.Content: After reading hundreds of reviews comparing cables like these with the ones that cost 5-6 times as much, I decided to be frugal.They work great, the length is perfect and they arrived quickly.100% Satisfied

Reviews.Title: Does a good job
Reviews.Author: drebbles
Reviews.Content: AmazonBasics High Speed HDMI Cable is a thick braided cable that is 6.5 feet long. You can use it to connect your HDTV to your cable box, satellite dish, various video game systems, Blue-Ray theater (or whatever home theater system you have), and much more. The cable features gold-plated connectors and it comes with Ethernet allowing you to share an internet connection among multiple devices.AmazonBasics High Speed HDMI Cable does an excellent job. Yes, it is a bit thick and can be hard to maneuver at times, but that wasn't really an issue for me as I have plenty of room behind my TV set for the cable. It was easy to install and I like having a single cable instead of the multiple cables I was using. The cable design - black, twisted, and thick - is sleek and fits easily into the décor of my living room. I have a relatively inexpensive home theater system and the HDMI cable does a good job of enhancing the picture.AmazonBasics High Speed HDMI Cable is inexpensive but does a good job.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Positive Reviewer
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased a PlayStation 3 system with Move.  When I originally set up the system I used the standard composite video/audio cable that came with the system.  At that time I thought that the graphics on the PS3 were great and I had no complaints.  However, I wanted to get the upgraded capability and see the difference.  After looking in Walmart and other places for an HDMI cable I became discouraged due to the $40-50 it was going to cost to get one.  However, my wife found this cable on Amazon.com and I was thrilled!  I received it in a very short amount of time and upon receiving it I was absolutely blown away at the clarity that it provided on the games and movies.  There were details in my games and movies that I had no idea existed. I have had the cable now for about a month with no problems.  I will suggest this to anyone I know!

Reviews.Title: A cable is a cable
Reviews.Author: Michael V
Reviews.Content: This AmazonBasic HDMI Cable is a very simple and cheap solution to connect HDMI devices. There is no need to spend extra amounts of money on a HDMI cable. They all basically work the same and carry both sound and digital signals. My friend has a Monster "High Quality" HDMI cable and it has the same exact function as this Amazon cable. There is just no difference at all and he wasted a bunch of money on that cable. So I advise a potential buyer to buy the cheapest HDMI cable they can find or just get this Amazon one for a pretty good price.Great cable, decent length, and connectors are made very well and are sleek.Recommended.

Reviews.Title: Why pay more??
Reviews.Author: 808Superstar
Reviews.Content: We had purchased one of those high dollar HDMI from Best Buy and also these.  I had to try this myself to believe it.  We used the Best Buy cord until this one came in the mail and then switched them to see if we could tell a difference.  To much of our surprise, we couldn't!  In fact, we think we had a better picture while watching sports and playing the ps3 (we bought 3 hdmis).  We have a 55" LCD by Samsung.  Don't waste your money on high dollar HDMI cords, this one is the best!

Reviews.Title: HDMI High Speed Cable
Reviews.Content: Great price for this high quality cord.  It seems to deliver great speed.  I placed it on my Samsung 32" 240mhz TV for my Wii system.

Reviews.Title: works great with 3D system
Reviews.Author: egdeleon
