Reviews.Content: I bought a new toshiba 3d system from Amazon in Dec 2010.  I also bought a sony 3d dvd  surround sound theater player from Samsclub.  I bought vizio cables from samsclub because I forgot to order the 1.4 cables from Amazon.  I updated the sony dvd player from suggestion of reviews and did not feel the 3d was very good.  I thought it was the compatibility between sony and toshiba.  It finally dawned on me to purchase the cables that everyone liked from Amazon.  I didn't really think it was going to make a difference other that the bottom line for my pocket.  When the cables arrived I placed them in line.  Lo and Behold! Yes, there is a 3D difference.  I was going to send my 3D back player and TV back ... but It was the cable.  for the reasonable price it saved me some trouble and my wife telling me (nagging me)  to send the whole system  back!!!!

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Value
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Siegel
Reviews.Content: Delighted that this cable delivers as promised and costs sooooooo much less than cables for sale in brick and mortar stores in my area.  Plugged it into my laptop and flat screen TV last night. The length is perfect to get from my TV to my bedside table. Configured my TV as a sound device on my laptop, selected the HDMI input on my TV, and enjoyed an instant play Netflix movie with crystal clear image. So happy I did not spend more than I had to; this cable is an outstanding value.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Andrew Logan Alarcon
Reviews.Content: i just came out of best buy looking for an hdmi cable for my new ps3 they wanted to charge me 45 dollars for the cheapest one. it was ridiculous i came onto amazon like every savvy customer does and found a way cheaper one with great quality. i received it plugged it in and my ps3 hasn't looked crisper.

Reviews.Title: It works...
Reviews.Author: Corbin
Reviews.Content: Not sure how to review and HDMI cable.  Works great, didn't need the lenght, but better safe than sorry.  Good price and speedy delivery.

Reviews.Title: Why pay more?
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: The cables worked as I expected.  There is no reason to pay more for essentially the same product simply branded differently.  Buy these, and you will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Why pay more?
Reviews.Author: grandpaparazzi
Reviews.Content: The missing link in setting up my new blu-ray player was the HDMI cable. After reviewing many,I made my selection. Performance has been better than what I perceived it might be based on cost. I am glad I didn't waste money on the top dollar cables because the picture and audio are 'as good as the tv is capable of producing'. I have had no problems with connectors and they hold securely. I can buy several dvd's with the money saved!

Reviews.Title: Low Price, Great Quality
Reviews.Author: Luis Santander
Reviews.Content: Using it for my PS3 linking it to my Sony Bravia, works like a charm.. The Amazon Frustration Free Packaging is a Plus, sadly it's a cardboard a bit too heavy, and since I imported this cable to my country, they charge me by the grams, it's a low point. That's the only bad thing for me.. :(The cable is extremely light and much thinner than other generic brands, but that's a plus for me, since I don't want a bulky HDMI cable hanging from the side.Overall, still, a great value cable!

Reviews.Title: quality HDMI, awesome price
Reviews.Author: derek
Reviews.Content: There is no need to pay premium prices for HDMI cables.  This cable is a reasonable price with great quality.  Don't be fooled by the expensive cables at big box retailers.  This one shows no sign of signal loss or interference that the Monster cables say they protect against.  Comparing them head to head the only difference I can tell is in my wallet.

Reviews.Title: Works good for me.
Reviews.Author: Martin Podjski "martin"
Reviews.Content: I use it from my video card to my TV to watch online tv shows, and it works just fine.  It was one of the cheapest ones I could find but works great, no problems.

Reviews.Title: It does what it is suppose to do only less expensive..
Reviews.Author: Taz007
Reviews.Content: Honestly, I have not had much experience with many different brands but all I know is my HDTV 1080p and Sony Blu-ray player work well with NO cable problems. The cables look(feel)strong and stay in place and do what they are suppose to do........WORK! They came nicely packaged with easy open box..very simple and to the point no frills just good cables at a great price and delivered without delay what else do you need? I have had them a little over a month now. Hope this helps.

Reviews.Title: right price and great quality
Reviews.Author: M. Sennott
Reviews.Content: I bundled 4 of these, along with a power cord, CAT5 cable, and a USB extender up to my wall mounted television. No difference in picture quality from a much more expensive 6ft HDMI cable I purchased from Best Buy with the television. The fact that they run next to a power cable in the conduit and still doesn't pick up any noise is incredible.For all those bad reviews you read that blame these cables for their problem, keep in mind that a crummy TV will have problems no matter what cable you use. Consumer Reports is absolutely right when they say that you shouldn't pay a premium for HDMI cables - they are a ripoff compared to these Amazon Basics cables.

Reviews.Title: Cable
Reviews.Author: Cara Childs "Navy Wife"
Reviews.Content: Yeah. It's a cable. It works. Nothing fancy about it.The packaging seemed excessive. Small box that held the cable (box A) was inside of a box that was much too big (box B).

Reviews.Title: Hard to Beat the Quality and Price
Reviews.Author: Boone
Reviews.Content: Using this cable from my receiver to the HDTV.  Just calibrated everything using the Disney WOW blu-ray and everything looks great!  Hard to beat the quality and value on this HDMI cable from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Solid, highly functional, and not crazy expensive
Reviews.Author: Turtles all the Way Down™
Reviews.Content: I don't really understand the differences between the different kinds of HDMI cables, but I really liked the AmazonBasics High Speed HDMI Cable (6.5 Feet / 2.0 Meters) - Supports Ethernet, 3D, and Audio Return (Newest Standard).  The body of the cord is thick and solid, and the plugs insert with a snug authority.  I didn't try the 3D option, but I did hook up my computer to my TV and my cable box to my TV, and the results were crystal clear.  If you have a wireless keyboard and mouse, I do suggest using the cable to connect your video card to an HDMI input on your TV, then sit on the couch and surf, it's great.  NOTE: To get sound this way you MUST CONNECT THE internal SPDIF cable from the motherboard to the graphics card. This cable is solidly built, with the latest advancements, comes in a 10-foot (9.8 foot) version, and it's not crazy expensive like some HDMI cables (for heavens' sake do NOT go to Radio Shack for HDMI cable!) I definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent cable
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Even at this price, this is a great cable.  This is all around high quality from the connector which fits tight into HDMI ports to the thick braided cable itself.  The cable also includes a data channel for HDMI devices that support HDMI with Ethernet.This cable is a little stiff, but what I like about it is that it will maintain shape when flexed.  So you can curl it around things and not have to worry about it springing back into its original shape.  It's quite nice.  I think if you're willing to pay the extra money, you won't be disappointed.Being that it's 6.5 feet long, there's the issue of what to do with the extra cable.  It actually folds back on itself quite well for a cable this think.  However, it doesn't behave well when twisted so you'll have to be sure to wrap the cable prior to plugging in both ends or you'll risk tweaking the connector.All in all, a great cable at a reasonable price.  AmazonBasics packaging is supremely simple as well.

Reviews.Title: Superb Quality
Reviews.Author: J. Sullivan
Reviews.Content: This is one fine HDMI cable. It has a durable build and a rugged, yet sleek look. The Amazon emblem marks both its high speed capacity and Ethernet capability right on the connector heads - there will be no ambiguity while rummaging through my growing collection of HDMI cables as to what this one is qualified to handle.I'm highly impressed by the Amazon Basics brand. Quality construction partnered with great performance makes for an outstanding value.

Reviews.Title: monsterous cable
Reviews.Author: K. Lin "yesuaini99"
Reviews.Content: The cable is thick! It is a high gauge cable, it is almost like an electrical wire used by professionals.It is at least 3-4 times thicker than the other HDMI cables I have.I am watching blue ray with this cable.Despite the high quality feel and high gauge, I really can't say I see visible improvement of audio/video quality.But it really gives me a peace of mind that I know all of the picture qualities that can be transmitted are being faithfully transmitted without the cable degradation.It is just long enough from my player to TV.highly recommend it and the price is too good to be true vs the quality of the product.

Reviews.Title: Delivers clear picture and sound
Reviews.Author: Adebisi A. Ilori "beecee"
Reviews.Content: I wanted a cable that will give me the full benefits of my blu-ray player and HD Tv. i have had cables in the past that caused a drop in picture  and sound quality, not this one.When watching movies you want to see and hear things the way they are meant to be seen and heard. This cable does just that. The sound and visual is exceptional. You don't want more than that. Great Buy.

Reviews.Title: good quality cable
Reviews.Author: T. Gaston
Reviews.Content: This is a very good quality cable with many uses.  I was mostly interested in finding something of good quality that had a decent length, so the 6.5 feet more than fits the requirement.

Reviews.Title: Solid and durable cable
Reviews.Author: Juan C. Fernandez
Reviews.Content: The product fells very resistant and solid, not complain about that. the quality is really good, and you would get the latest technology in HDMI cables, this is a 1.4 version. Compared to the other makers, this is probably the cheapest one and the quality is great.

Reviews.Title: Good quality..recommended!
Reviews.Author: Ivan W. Ong
Reviews.Content: Very nice cable with robust cable coating (no cheap PVC used here). Construction is high end and it works very well. Connection is excellent and absolutely no complaints. Buy with confidence.

Reviews.Title: Super high-quality HDMI cable
Reviews.Author: Shelley Gammon "Geek"
Reviews.Content: If you want a very long-lasting and high-quality HDMI cable, you'd be hard-pressed to do better than this cable by AmazonBasics. The heavy braiding limits the flexibility - but that's a good thing. Repeated winding, taut pulling around sharp corners (as in an entertainment center) shorten the life of any cable. The tiny wires inside the insulation start to fray, degrading the quality of the signal going from device to device. The very heavy braiding keeps the cable from being overly stressed, preserving the integrity of the signal over time. The gold plated connectors provide the best quality signal for electronics.The price is amazingly affordable. Since HDMI came on the scene, there've been a range of cables ranging from cheap (and poor quality) to high range cables exceeding $100. This high quality cable is beyond competitively priced for its quality.

Reviews.Title: Quality HDMI cable from amazon.
Reviews.Author: Bearcat
Reviews.Content: Love the frustration free packaging.  The HDMI cord feels solid and well put together.  I have this hooked up to my Apple TV and the picture and audio is great.  Do not pay for a more expensive HDMI cable as you will NOT notice a difference.  Great product at a great price.

Reviews.Title: Worked as expected
Reviews.Author: Scott Anderson "Sharpsburg"
Reviews.Content: This product worked well right out of the box.  Frustration free packaging, easy to plug in and quality audio and picture is the result.I liked the heft and feel of the braided wire, and it was pretty easy to maneuver around and behind the TV into the Roku XD streaming video box.What more can be said, Amazon backed, Amazon quality and Amazon pricing.  It's an HDMI triple play, with a home-run tacked on.  Thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Title: High quality
Reviews.Author: GLENN LEVY "lover of fun"
Reviews.Content: Just unpacked my cable,it is really very high quality. I like how sturdy it feels, plugged it into my Cable HD DVR, works perfectly of course. The price of these cables are reasonable considering it's HDMI 1.4 with audio return, 3D, and Ethernet support. I would buy one of these even though I got this one free. Amazon Basic stuff really is high quality.

Reviews.Title: Great price , great quality and works as described.
Reviews.Author: J. Swanson "man4mopar"
Reviews.Content: Digital is digital and this cable works as described. Highly recomend the saving's buying this cable over the expensive Monster and other brands in outlet stores.

Reviews.Author: Carlos Chaves
Reviews.Content: Bought 2, one is working fine so far and the other one fails with video or audio or both, a shame this is not a reliable product as it has a fair price, I guess I should go with a well known manufacterer again and avoid this 50/50 chance to fail cable.------------Update 01/10/2012Second cable is failing now, and 2 new cables from another brand are on the way... stay away from these cables!

Reviews.Title: Stopped working
Reviews.Author: Alana R.
Reviews.Content: Worked beautifully for my PS3 until it went absolutely dead, roughly 3 weeks in to use.  I guess you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: hdmi cable
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: the only problem I had was in delivery. I paid extra from 2 day delivery that took 7 days.but the cable was a great buy, price was great,just won't pay extra for fast delivery again

Reviews.Title: Quality Cables
Reviews.Author: aznsensation_01
Reviews.Content: What can I say, quality cables from Amazon.  Just need to wait until there will be HDMI 1.4 compliant hardware....

Reviews.Title: Its Simply Awesome
Reviews.Author: Ramneek S. Sahota
Reviews.Content: Guys,Believe me its really good product for the amount you are paying.I just bought 3D TV and blue-ray 3D player and needed HDMI cables for the same. I wanted to have the latest and best available in market (HDMI 1.4 with blue-ray, 3D, ethernet and audio capability). The product which I landed to was this one. It is latest and adding to sweetness is that it is very reasonably priced.I don't believe on some brands like monster etc, who charge 4-5 times for HDMI cables. At the end of the day, they adhare to same standards and data transfer quality is same.This is a perfect example of pricy stuff is not always the best.Regards

Reviews.Title: Just as good as the more expensive brands.
Reviews.Author: AmazonLover
Reviews.Content: This HDMI cable works very well.  Simply plug it into your computer and then into your television for easy viewing.It is a nice thick cable too and has the same quality as any name brand I have ever bought.

Reviews.Title: Good cable great price - These cables are the "same" as the $60+ ones at best buy
Reviews.Author: Chuck Bittner "Disabled comedian & gamer!"
Reviews.Content: This Cable Is the Same As the $60 Cables You Would Find at Best Buy Monster Cables Are No Better! If you bought one of those expensive cables return it and buy this.If you're reading this you probably got an HDMI capable television and need to plug your PS3/cable box/blue Ray player into it. If so by this cable. I'm not really sure about the networking ethernet sharing that this has and how it works?? It was kind of hard to search on the Internet. I mean if I have to the cables one plugged into my HD DVD player one plug in my PlayStation and both connected to my TV can I share the HD DVDs Internet connection between both? Amazon's original post as to these features with this cable are not very explicit. If I can find more information I will update this post. A friend of mine told me that I play my PS3 too much and need to get outside more so to shut him up I move my PlayStation outside, problem solved!I'm Chuck Bittner from AskACapper dot com and I approved this message LOL!

Reviews.Title: No problems here
Reviews.Author: Tracy Foote "College Savings Plan Author, Pho...
Reviews.Content: This is a basic cable at a good price. I didn't need anything fancy, diameter wasn't a concern, etc. so the functionality and price worked fine for me.

Reviews.Title: Works as expected
Reviews.Author: Danny Boy "Danny Boy"
Reviews.Content: This product works as expected. The main reason I needed this type of HDMI cord is because I wanted to connect my laptop to my TV. So I had needed a long cord to easily connect it to the TV and it worked great.I wish I had a HDMI 1.4 port on my computer to try out the Ethernet feature, but when I get one I will certainly be using this cord.

Reviews.Title: horrible
Reviews.Author: Jermaine M. Rollins
Reviews.Content: stoped working with in 20 min of first use...... it was only 4 bucks so i guess you get what  you pay for...

Reviews.Title: Intermittent signal drops
Reviews.Author: vcooley
Reviews.Content: I bought one AmazonBasics and one MediaBridge HDMI cable about a year ago. I rarely use the devices I have attached via the Amazon cable but I noticed that when I did use them, I had random signal drops from my Bluray player to the TV. I blamed it on everything but the cable. Come on, it's just a cable after all. Finally I swapped the MediaBridge in place of the Amazon and now have a solid signal. What a relief, it's not my devices. Judging by the reviews of this cable it looks like you are rolling the dice on getting a good one vs a bad cable. The company that makes these cables needs to tighten their quality control. So beware if you are planning on buying this brand. Don't assume your HDMI connected devices are causing the problem. Have a spare cable ready to go for verification of video/audio signal problems.

Reviews.Title: Used once, didn't work after that
Reviews.Author: shmom42
Reviews.Content: I thought that buying something from Amazon would be a quality product....I used this cable for the first time since I bought it connecting it to my HDTV and a DVD player.  It worked the first time it was connected.  The next day, I put in a DVD and turned on the the TV and no sound came out of the TV, I put in a different DVD and the same thing happened, no sound.  I decided to use another HDMI cable and the sound was fine.  I concluded that the problem was with the Amazon branded HDMI cable which is now useless after using it one time.  What a waste of money!  Don't purchase this because you will be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy !!
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: I just upgraded my entire home theater system and decided it would be a good idea to change out my HDMI cables since they were original cables from when HDMI first came out.  I bought 10 of these AmazonBasics and will be returning them all.  I first hooked up a cable from the TV to the receiver for ARC use and the sound cut in and out.  Mostly out.  I tried 7 cables and all the same issue.  I thought it was my new TV.  So, I hooked up one of my old old HDMI cables(a generic one) and it worked fine 100% of the time.  I had the same issue with my Apple TV connection.  The receiver, a new Yamaha, did not recognize the Amazon cable, but the older one it did.Your experience may end up being different, but for me, these cables just plain suck.

Reviews.Title: bad product, terrible quality, image loses signal
Reviews.Author: Manvi Drona-Hidalgo
Reviews.Content: bad product, terrible quality, image loses signal. i would not recommend continuing to see this cable. waste of money and reflects negatively on amazon

Reviews.Title: Junk do not buy
Reviews.Author: ksmoga
Reviews.Content: This HDMI cable does not work.  If I use another one which I have on another TV it works fine but this one is no good.  Do not buy this cable it does not work

Reviews.Title: not suitable for tying up cats
Reviews.Author: Jan
Reviews.Content: would hold larger cats but kittens were able to slipp out very easily, would not recommend unless you have no shoe laces

Reviews.Title: Not a good choice for devices with negotiation problems
Reviews.Author: J. Reed
Reviews.Content: I've bought many AmazonBasics products over the years and been generally happy -- they're a good price, generic product.  I bought two of these HDMI cables and have been disappointed, however.  They work about 85% of the time.  And maybe they're great for some people, based on other reviews.  But if your devices are finicky (Panasonic Blu-Ray players are notoriously picky), then negotiation will fail about 15% of the time, and leave you fiddling with cables while you should be watching a movie.  It's definitely the cables, because other cables work fine.  And yet these AmazonBasics cables work fine for an LG Blu-Ray player, but not for a Panasonic or an Apple TV.  And other cables work fine on all 3 devices.

Reviews.Title: save money and still get top quality
Reviews.Author: </life> "Williferous"
Reviews.Content: i needed a new hdmi cable...so i went to where i thought i would be able to find the cheapest...the place rhymes with stallfart.boy was i wrong. they wanted 20 beans for a GE branded piece of crap that was 3'.so i bought it with the plan to order the amazon one and return said piece of crap.which is exactly what i did. the amazon one came quickly, and was packaged in a secure box with none of the maddening plastic packaging that you need a box cutter to get into. the cable was neatly spooled up and tied with twisties. perfect. i plugged each end to it's respective slot, and was FLOORED! what i was able to find here, was a GREAT quality cable...easy to open...that works FLAWLESSLY...and MUCH cheaper than that store who's name we must not speak.F that place...amazon is it!so yes, i returned the item i had purchased at that nasty store (groan away), and haven't looked back since. the amazon cable is used for hours each day and works brilliantly.thanks again amazon.once again, you have reinforced the need to never leave the house again. :D

Reviews.Title: Great for the most part.
Reviews.Author: DryvBy
Reviews.Content: Here's my setup:-52" Sharp 3D TV-HK AVR 2600 with latest firmware-Fluance 7.1 Surround Sound theater system-PlayStation 3 Slim (newer model)The cables do work, but I'm knocking off one star. Apparently, these cables have an issue with shutting off once a blue moon for a second and then turning back on. I've had the cables for a while and actually just got a new AVR 2600 receiver with the PS3 Slim. What happens is during a movie, the video and sound will stop for a second, the TV will display that it lost the source, and click back on. It happens once a day for me. This isn't just me. If you Google about HDMI cables doing this, it is a problem. I'm not going to say that ALL the cables you buy are going to suck. Just the ones I got did this and I've been dealing with it since April.I know it's not my TV due to it losing sound also, and it's not the PS3/receiver since I can use other cables and it doesn't do this.Otherwise, good cables and cheaper than any store.

Reviews.Title: Good but needs improvement (TOO THICK)
Reviews.Author: Chirag Shah "cshah"
Reviews.Content: I liked the resolution and robustness of this braided cable. But it's large diameter was bit of a turn-off for me frankly.It's hefty and long (yes even the 6.5' one) making it difficult to snake it around my TV to my console. Would like to have a 4' long version. I'd give a 5 on 5 if they can reduce the diameter or atleast make out of a material that's easier to bend it into a loop. Having said that, the Res improvement is outstanding on my games when i use this cable.

Reviews.Title: bad cable
Reviews.Author: Mr.Me
Reviews.Content: good cable... for a couple weeks! if you're gonna purchase this cable make sure its for something that you;re not gonna move often. I bought this cable for my ps3 and to connect my laptop to my tv but it quickly gave out and stopped working.

Reviews.Title: Works but not for what I need.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "D.T.M"
Reviews.Content: This cord was auto suggested for my purchase of a  * Samsung BD-C5500 1080p Blu-ray Disc Player *  - This cord couldn't register a signal for it, so I ended up buying one at best-buy to get the HDMI to work on the blu-ray.Other than that I loved the frustration free package, just nip a sticker off and good to go.

Reviews.Title: Why Pay More?
Reviews.Author: Alfonso Torres
Reviews.Content: This Cable Is Great!! It Works Perfectly Well With My PS3 and You Save Alot of money By Getting This Cable.

Reviews.Title: The longer cord givesyou more options
Reviews.Author: T. Lay
Reviews.Content: It works good. I have it plugged into my PS3 and plasma tv.  I switched it out from a 6 ft cable that was too short.

Reviews.Title: so what makes a good cable?
Reviews.Author: Soar
Reviews.Content: These are digital cables... ones and zeros.  Unless the cable is really long or mad horribly, you just aren't going to see a difference.  Not between the $50 one at best buy or the $5 cable you get off at the value site on the internet.There ARE differences between cables...  not enough to justify 10x the cost, but enough to differentiate purchasing one cable over the other.  One indicator I look at with cables is the quality of the ends of the cables (the terminators)... poor ends can literally fall apart (had one HDMI cable fall apart leaving the end in the device, I was not pleased).HOW IS THIS CABLE?  The terminators look high quality, one piece molded onto the cable.  The terminators are gold plated which is a bonus.Overall... this is a good cable at a value price.  Definitely recommended.

Reviews.Title: Low quality
Reviews.Author: A A
Reviews.Content: I tried these cables because comparably priced cables from monoprice were so thick they created issues fitting in my cabinet.  Long story short, these cables were not up to spec.  They created handshake issues between my PS3 and Marantz AV7005 and my HTPC and the Marantz AV7005.  I swapped the Amazon cables out and replaced them with Monoprice cables and suddenly, no issue.  I am a firm believer that cables should not cost an arm and a leg, but these were not manufactured to spec and could not handle the high demands of blu-ray and my high end graphics card.  I had high hopes but I was sorely dissapointed.

Reviews.Title: Perfection
Reviews.Author: Darrin Owens
Reviews.Content: Works perfectly for my Xbox and my laptop. I completely have no problem with this at all. A definite recommended item.

Reviews.Title: Used for second computer monitor
Reviews.Author: Ricardo De La Torre
Reviews.Content: Flawless use. I use it to connect my laptop to a second screen. The length is great because it allows me to work with both screens close together or to put more space between them if I need desk space. There is no problem in sending data. Everything, including videos, flows smoothly on the second screen. It's as good as it looks on my laptop itself.

Reviews.Title: hdmi cable

Reviews.Content: it was the perfect for the TV to connect to the computer and still use the computer to work on and the price was great

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: vondee605
Reviews.Content: The cable enable clear, crisp, vivid and beautiful pictures. The movies are really HD and they are so evident. I would recommend them to anyone.

Reviews.Title: good price

After doing a decent amount of research, you see often that people say there is not much difference in HDMI cables even though you find some that are $50-100. I felt confident with many suggestions online to just stick with the AmazonBasics HDMI and I have not been let down.Tip for length selection!!!I purchased several 3ft. Cables and a couple 6ft cables for an equipment rack. I thought the 3ft cable would be plenty of space to go from a few shelves up or down but they definitely don't leave much room. I would suggest going 6ft unless you are sure that 3ft will be plenty.

Reviews.Title: No different than the expensive ones in the store!

Reviews.Title: Looks nice & works fine

Reviews.Title: Excellent for the new televisions

Reviews.Content: I bought this cable originally for my new computer monitor, and ended up using it for the new television. It really has helped. I like the picture quality too. I recommend this product.  I need to get a few more.

Reviews.Title: PC to TV

Reviews.Content: Plugged it in, works great. Quick delivery, and I was impressed for how cheap it was, it is working better than a more expensive cable.

Reviews.Title: Amazon HDMI cable

Reviews.Content: All the cables I've purchased from Amazon "basics" have been quality products and have simply worked. resaonable prices and delivered on time without issue...no need to look elsewhere as long as that's going on. Good quality product.

Reviews.Title: Needed

Reviews.Title: No Longer Works
Reviews.Author: A. Sentell
Reviews.Content: It only lasted about a month before it only worked in certain positions. Not happy with the product. Sorry, Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Failed Right Out of the Box
Reviews.Author: Joseph Hogan
Reviews.Content: Ordered this cable to replace an 8 year old HDMI cable at the same time as I ordered a new Samsung TV.  Since it arrived 2 days after the TV, I set the TV up using the old HDMI cable and it worked fine.  When this new cable arrived I swapped it out and after a half hour the TV lost signal from the cable source.  Jiggling the connection helped but then it disconnected again and then wouldn't reconnect.  So...I reinstalled the old cable and it has been working just fine since.Frankly, I am disappointed with Amazon.  I have previously bought two Amazon brand usb cables for my Apple devices and they worked great, at a fair price.  Caveat Emptor.  Amazon should do more quality testing with whomever makes this for them.

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive and used with my Amazone Fire
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: I bought this to use with my Amazon fire.  It is the perfect length, and does what it needs to do.  My image is perfect.

So I decided to try the Amazon HDMI cable. I just needed something cheap and simple that would do the trick.  I had no issues with this cable. I have to say I have bought several Amazon brand chargers and cords and I have been satisfied with every purchase.

Reviews.Title: Works great

Reviews.Title: great cable at a great price

Reviews.Title: hdmi cable is an hdmi cable
Reviews.Author: Empiror22
Reviews.Content: I know marketing is key for products like these.  However, ALL HDMI cables are created very similar.  I laugh about this because i used to work at a big retailer and they would tell us therefore we tell customers that the more expensive ones are better.  Well I decided that i needed a degree in nuclear engineering and later one in physics.  I got these degrees not to learn about HDMI cables but as much technology as i could.  So i'm trying to say that for the most part the cheaper cables are just as good as those more expensive ones.... now the only down side is some times you get bad ones, well i hate that.... it almost never happens, but at the price i can buy 10 for the price of the big names ( just so i am clear i have about 30 hdmi cables at my house, i have only had one go bad in about 10 years)  i have the big name brands monster power (got them really cheap when i worked for big retailer, i have some cheap brands mono price (whom is the best company for cables in bulk).so buy them here , good price good product and works as well as any other cable on the market.

Reviews.Title: Ideal Choice For The Majority of Consumers
Reviews.Author: J. Rains
Reviews.Content: I've been pleased with the entire line of "Amazon Basics" cables- HDMI, Toslink, Ethernet, etc... The price is right and the quality is good for most consumers. I'm sure some high end "audiophile" users would insist on the more expensive options considering they are likely using very high end components-- and that's understandable: If I invested $20k+ in an A/V setup, I wouldn't want to risk any amount of possible interference or signal loss issues by using less than the very best cables as well. After all, the level of perfection is only as high as the weakest link in the chain. However, if you are not in that group, these cables are plenty sufficient for average consumer A/V components. So save yourself a little money and go with this line of cables.

Reviews.Title: WHY PAY MORE FOR HDMI
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: Not much you can say here other than these HDMI cables work as advertised and do so at an outstanding price point making the product an outstanding value. If your looking for a solid HDMI cable that provides for the lastest in digital quality and performance look no further. You won't get any better performance out of a more expensive competitor. That is just the nature of HDMI's digital signal. If the cable is rated for your application whether it be Deep Color, high speed, 3D, etc and your HDMI port(s) on your applicable devices are current to the standard of cable you have purchased your cables digital signal will provide the quality and rated performance you crave.That is just the nature of the digital signal HDMI provides. Unlike analog cables digital cables don't degrade the signal over the length of the normal run found in typical cable lengths. The basic rule of thumb with a digital signal is if your getting a signal your getting all of the signal. While there have been upgrades to the HDMI minimum standard of performance to provide for newer technologies such as 3D. Many manufactures far exceed the minimum standard of rated performance or specifically state the rated performance of the HDMI cable in a more easy to understand fashion by specifically naming the cables capabilities.Amazon Basic cables state their performance applications clearly and provide an outstanding value for their performance that provide excellent value in the industry at their price point. Buyer be ware if your still listening to the sales gimmicks that promote much more expensive HDMI cables that are largely marketed as better cables and a future proof value. While you cannot rightfully say the Amazon Basic cables are better performance wise you most definitely can't say they are not as good for at the end if the day HDMI is HDMI. The simple reason is a digital signal is either completely transmitted or none of the signal is transferred. The only concern you should ever consider when purchasing an HDMI cable is the rated performance of the cable either in terms of the HDMI standard or what the manufacture specifically recommends the cable is capable of providing in terms of technology. Therefore higher cost means absolutely nothing in terms of HDMI performance nor does a particular manufactures name but that popular name may negatively affect the price point significantly.To make the idea perhaps a little more simple to understand think of USB technology associated with your computer. USB originally started as being stated as a minimum standard of performance just like HDMI which was denoted as USB 1.1 and then became USB 2.0 and now USB 3.0. Each newer standard represents a higher minimum standard or performance. In the case of USB the speed of data transfer is the minimum standard of rated performance which has increased as the associated number of USB has risen from 1.1 to today's 3.0. Consider HDMI no different and therefore it is foolish to purchase a more expensive brand of HDMI cable over another competitor that provides the same minimum standard of rated performance. In fact as previously pointed out many HDMI cable manufactures actually exceed the HDMI minimum standard significantly with the cables they sell. Remember it's a minimum standard. Therefore as the HDMI standard for minimum performance is raised your cables may still be complaint but the nice thing about the low price of these Amazon Basic HDMI cables is you can always upgrade for peace of mind without spending a small fortune for a single cable if there is any question. Still yet if the cable performs to your specification it performs and the low price simply makes it better and the best choice.

Reviews.Title: Constant swapping leads to cable failure.

Reviews.Content: Product was fine up until last month.  Began cutting out and all I'd see was a black & red static like screen.  To be fair, my use of this product involves non typical use, in that I remove the cable and put it back in constantly.  At first I was worried it was the port on my television that was failing, however after a quick swap of cables I discovered that it is indeed the cable.  I imagine if you are looking for something that will rarely or never be unplugged, this will work well.  However if you have need for a cable that may get unplugged with any frequency I would have to recommend against this product.

I have a Xbox 360 hooked up to it with one of these and a PS3 hooked up to it with one of these. Our son has his Xbox 360 hooked up to our living room television with one. Our daughter's desktop PC is hooked up to her monitor with one and we keep one in the car in case we go anywhere and need to hook a laptop up to a television. They're that good. These cables should cost twice as much as they do, maybe three times as much, but I probably wouldn't have tried them if they were that high. Reviews.Title: If it works, it works.
Reviews.Author: IncredibleHat
Reviews.Content: Its digital. So if it works, it works. No point in spending a lot of money on something more expensive than this one. If you do, you just gave money to a hype engine ;-) I'm being serious here, cables by like Monster or otherwise, and selling you nothing better than a cheap cable. Its digital... not analog.The only things you can really rate these kinds of cables on are:Flexible or Stiff? - This cable is flexible enough to not be ornery or fight your attempts to route it.Overzealous plug? - This cable has a decent sized plug, good for grabbing, yet thin enough not to bump into equipment.Tight grip? - This cable has a snug enough grip when plugged into both the GPU and Monitor. So its doing its job well.

Reviews.Title: great price

Reviews.Title: Does a good job for an Amazon branded product
Reviews.Author: Olly2014

I got this to connect it to my desktop video card as an extension to my 2nd desktop monitor for video editing purposes (to make 3 monitors in total). The length was just enough to suit my needs and reach my tower. Now I can drag/open programs and review the results on the TV as a 3rd monitor while my other two monitors are still being used for additional editing work.I can also use the Samsung as a regular television hooked up to my DTV box or I can watch Internet TV or listen to Pandora through my connected tower while I work. The audio and video transfer quality seems to be crisp and clear. No delays/ghosting. For an Amazon product, not bad.

Reviews.Title: Eventually fails
Reviews.Author: KD
Reviews.Content: I keep buying this brand and getting burned. Whether its HDMI cables or cellphone cables, you are lucky to get a year out of these. My HDMI cables stopped transmitting the signal, so my TV didn't think it was connected to anything. The cellphone cables are nearly as bad. They eventually don't hold tightly into the jack on the phone or stop charging altogether. So disappointed.

Reviews.Title: High Value Cable
Reviews.Author: Ryan Vincent Macutay
Reviews.Content: I love Amazon Basics! This cable is a great value. The cable doesn't look or feel cheap and the quality is great.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: may
Reviews.Content: It's awesome. I wish it was longer but it's my fault for choosing the length of the HDMI cord. Totally worth it though. Highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Robert Griffith
Reviews.Content: Works with no problems, at a price much cheaper than elsewhere. Length seems just about right with my set up.

Reviews.Title: Good product at a good price.
Reviews.Author: Jason Brown
Reviews.Content: Good cable. Does what it says it will. Not much more to say above that. Not much more to say about it.

Reviews.Title: So Many to Choose From. So Glad I Picked this One!
Reviews.Author: Jus Sayin'
Reviews.Content: As with other electronic cords and cables, you'll find a dizzying array of choices and a wide range of prices for HDMI high speed cables. I found it challenging to figure out how they were different from each other, is there a reason to spend five times the price on one over another? How low can I go before I've wandered into "you get what you pay for" territory?This is the third or fourth Amazon cable I've purchased. The others were for an ipad, a computer, and a gaming console. Each of them has been really well made, and performed as well, or in one case, better, than the cables supplied by the devices' original manufacturers.I usually read a bunch of product, industry, and consumer reviews before buying something new, but I've been so satisfied with the workmanship, performance, and price of the Amazon electronic products I've bought, now when I need something like this, I first check to see if it's available in Amazon's own line. If Amazon makes one I just buy it without spending a lot of extra time checking it out. This cable was no different it's well made and works great, and when I can have it in my hands in a matter of days, with no shipping charge, through my Amazon Prime membership, it's an easy choice!

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Wynona Mayer "www.usegold4money.com"
Reviews.Content: Great fast service

Reviews.Title: HDMI cable

Reviews.Content: My sons friend had one & my son had to have one, because the quality of the picture while they are gaming was phenomenal. So very true. When I sneek on his PS3 to watch a movie, I love the clarity & sharpness that the HDMI cable gives it. Amazing, but don't tell my son.

I have 3 of these and haven't had a single problem with them. They are solid and top notch!

Reviews.Title: Great Value, Great Quality
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Originally (a few years ago), I had put off buying all these cords to be able to display my laptop on my HDTV. They were sort of pricey if I remember correctly. I was pleasantly surprised when I saw this deal. It's an Amazon-branded product so you know it's gonna be good. It IS good from what I've seen so far. The picture quality is great. It's incredibly easy to use, and there are no issues with it. I literally received this a few hours ago, and I just plugged it in and was testing it out. I'm a happy camper.Bottom line:Great picture quality, no issues at all.Can't beat the price.It's a nice looking cable, it doesn't look sketchy or poorly-made. It's very nice looking. It functions as well as it looks.Perfect size for my application length-wise. Do some measurements before you buy. I like how the heads are not too bulky or awkward.Overall, a great product that I am very happy that I purchased. I highly recommend this to anyone looking to display their laptop on their HDTV.

This time I ordered this WITH the Fire TV and therefore could hook it up right away. Worked perfectly!If you plan on purchasing the Amazon Fire TV, which is a GREAT item, buy this too!!!

Reviews.Title: A Little Stiff But Good
Reviews.Author: Veil_Lord
Reviews.Content: I really appreciate the Internet when it comes to cables.  The stuff you buy in a big box store or even a smaller one are so obnoxiously over priced it's ridiculous.  I mean I can recall one "good deal" I saw recently that was roughly 3x the cost of these, though you did get a two pack...assuming you needed a 2 pack it might have been worth it.  I didn't.I've seen some people online swear you need the highest cost cables and some store clerks have tried to sell me on that idea.  I've never seen anything where the picture was actually improved.  The only thing I can think of that might make a more expensive one worthwhile is if you were plugging it and unplugging it frequently.  Then the overall construction might prove to be worth it.  For me, these were just fine and do everything I needed.The only complaint I have, and it's a smallish one, is that the cable is pretty stiff.  It can be a little hard to angle it without bending it a bit.  Not a huge problem, but the one I'd had before was a bit more flexible and still seemed to work fine.

Reviews.Title: Work fine

Reviews.Content: What can you say -- it's a wire which plugs in just fine and does the job.  I have no way to judge better/worse quality, but it looks fine to me.

Reviews.Title: Cable Hell!!!
Reviews.Author: Daloo
Reviews.Content: I had recently mounted my 55" Samsung and put the wires in the wall. Unfortunately, with the articulating mount, I pulled the TV out to face the kitchen and WHAM! pulled the HDMI cable from the TV. whew....didn't ruin the tv, but did bend the usb part of the cable. :(I went to my cable provider for a longer cable, which they "convieniently?" didn't have. Nice customer service dude said go to Amazon and buy one for less than 10$.Well, turns out, perfect advice. This cable is extra long and works perfectly!!!  easy to lace through the wall and I was done!.  In case you're wondering, I did secure this cable onto my mount just in case for the future!!!Excellent product.

Reviews.Title: works fine

Reviews.Title: Just get this one.

Reviews.Title: High Speed HDMI CAble

Reviews.Title: Seems to work
Reviews.Author: In no sense guilty
Reviews.Content: Not fully test since it's just hooked up to my XBox 360 and the 5.1 amplifier and speaker and then to the TV.  The 3 foot length is about right for connecting items that sit near each other.  Just enough length to move any equipment, when needed, without disconnecting them but not too much excess to tuck away.  I replace a 6 foot 1.3 with this 3 foot 1.4a cable.  Signal appear to be just as clear as before but then an XBox 360 only puts out 720p or 1080i not 1080p or 4K and only minimal (power only) CEC signals and that TV (unlike the other one) has no ARC.

Reviews.Title: Possibly Just Bad Luck
Reviews.Author: J. Huhman
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these cables last year as back-up HDMI cables to just have handy when I might need them.  I did end up using both of them over the last several months, and they both worked great...for a while.  The second one has just died on me, after outlasting its brother by a couple of months.  I don't feel as though I am particularly hard on them; I actually think they see less abuse than most of my other HDMI cables (many of which frequently travel with me), but these are the only two HDMI cables I've ever had die on me like this.However, these are highly rated, reasonably priced cables with tons of reviews, so I may end up ordering more anyway; they can't possibly all go bad so quickly.

I also like how long this cable is.

We've used ours to connect DVD players, a Blu-Ray player, two Roku boxes and a FireTV.  Trouble-free and what a great price; most highly recommended for quality and value!

I'd get a message on my screen saying HDMI connected and the movie would then resume.  Swapping three different no-name cables didn't resolve the problem. I then tried the AmazaonBasics cable and whalla! no more audio/video blackouts.  Great quality for a great price.

Reviews.Title: As with almost all HDMI cables, the base sticks out too far and wears out
Reviews.Author: Acton Gorton
Reviews.Content: HDMI cables have some serious issues with wearing out; this one is no different. If you need a low-cost cable and NEVER move your equipment around, then this is a great buy.There really is no difference whatsoever in a low priced cable versus some Monster brand rip-off.Please, for the love of all that is Holy in this world, do not listen to someone that says otherwise... its a digital signal... eithers its there, or it isn't... it is not analog where there are varying degrees of strength and quality. There is literally absolutely no difference whatsoever.Now, I give this 3 stars because as all HDMI cables it is subject to the same problems: there are so many tiny connections at the plug that sharp bends will pull the internal wires loose from the connectors. Clearly nobody has figured out how to deal with this problem aside from either a 90 degree angle on the plug, or a very small plug that barely sticks out.If your TV is hanging against the wall, then you'll absolutely need a 90 degree plug. Yes, they cost more, but either buy it right the first time or buy it again.

They simply support anything and everything you could ever need, 4k included, and display quality is perfect. They plug in nicely and are flush with the ports on the tv and devices. Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: KT23
Reviews.Content: Amazon Basics products work great and come at a good price. We got this cord for the RV TV to connect to the Blu Ray. We have other Amazon Basics cords as well.

Reviews.Title: Repeat after me: Do not buy cables at retail... Do not buy cables at retail...
Reviews.Author: Fletcher Chambers Jr.
Reviews.Content: This cable works flawlessly, is well constructed, and comes at a very attractive price. There is no reason to pay retail prices for an HDMI cable. I used to work in retail... Cables are almost pure margin for the retailer (Why do you think they always try to sell you cables with everything you purchase?).A great deal on a very good cable!

Reviews.Title: My experience with this product!
Reviews.Author: Zak
Reviews.Content: i didn't see any improvement when I replaced my old HDMI cable with this one. It doesn't have a diagram nor did it contain a full description or show how it would improve my reception of signals. Is it too expensive to enclose what I'm complaing about???

Reviews.Title: great product! amazing deal!
Reviews.Author: Ray Torres
Reviews.Content: This item gave my xbox 360 slim a huge upgrade, the original cables i got for my 360 just did not cut it I was only able to get 480p but after purchasing these i was able to move up to 1080p with amazing clarity, Highly recommend these to anyone trying to upgrade. Price is very affordable as well, worth every penny!

Reviews.Title: Quality at the right price
Reviews.Author: Terra M. Johnson
Reviews.Content: Great cord, nothing exciting to write except that it's well made and I've had zero problems since buying it for my Apple TV.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: F. M. Green
Reviews.Content: I connected my laptop to my TV with the two sided male HDMI for the price I am amazed. In stores for a male to male HDMI you would be spending up to $80 for a 9 foot.I clarity and sound is crisp coming through the TV, why pay a lot of $$$ for cable tv when you can stream Netflix, CNN, and other programs on your TV.  I highly recommend AmazonBasics High-Speed HDMI, the price is definitely right.Make sure on your laptop you change the resolution.

Reviews.Title: AN EXCELLENT HDMI CABLE
Reviews.Author: Johnnie Needham "readsalot"
Reviews.Content: GOOD PRICE AND AN EXCELLIENT QUALITY CABLE.  YOU CANNOT BUY A BETTER QUALITY HDME CABLE ANYWHERE. DO NOT FORGET TO ORDER THIS WHEN YOU ORDER AMAZON FIRE TV.

Reviews.Title: Good cable
Reviews.Author: M & N "mnp"
Reviews.Content: No difference between this and the much more costly cables.  I would recommend this cable and would buy it again

Reviews.Title: HDMI Cable
Reviews.Author: Sefer
Reviews.Content: Well built and did the job as expected.  Good price too! No need to buy an expensive cable at this price.

Reviews.Title: How can you "love" a cable?
Reviews.Author: Susan Hayward "lady of leisure"
Reviews.Content: It was easy to connect, does what it's suppose to do and causes no trouble.  And the price was comparatively reasonable.  What more can you ask from this modern-day, ubiquitous commodity?

Reviews.Title: Works well at a good price
Reviews.Author: DONALD JOSEPH PIERCE
Reviews.Content: Cable works well and is reasonably priced.No problems with interference and I have lots of cables behind my television.I am pleased with the performance of this product.

Reviews.Title: It works...
Reviews.Author: Barbara Jean
Reviews.Content: It goes from my big smart flat TV to my small smart blu-ray player. Which is why I bought it. And it works as advertised. I've had it for a while now with no issues...

Reviews.Title: Equipment as advertized; at a great price
Reviews.Author: Richard E. Miller
Reviews.Content: HDMI cables were at a very good price. Installed them on new TV. Working great. Reccomend them to everyone looking for a good deal.

Reviews.Title: High-Speed HDMI
Reviews.Author: Red Moon Dust "Mrs. Darden"
Reviews.Content: AmazonBasics High-Speed HDMI Cable (6.5 Feet/2.0 Meters) is as pictured and was easy to plug and use.  I purchased two and they work well on my Blu-ray Player. Picture clarity and sound are better with these cables. HDMI cable and input pieces are of good quality material and are very durable.

Reviews.Title: What I ecpected
Reviews.Author: Samuel J White
Reviews.Content: The cables were what I expected and that is a good thing.  Great cables and they arrived on time, that made things even better.

Reviews.Title: very good for the price
Reviews.Author: cycling gourmet
Reviews.Content: i never thought that an hdmi cable at this price will be very good for my needs. i highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great cable, great price
Reviews.Author: K. Capon
Reviews.Content: This cable works as expected and was a great price through amazon.  I have no complaints!  I've recommended it to others.

Reviews.Title: Standard
Reviews.Author: Greg
Reviews.Content: standard cable, nothing special other than you save money not buying it in a box store where they will charge you $80

Reviews.Title: great hdmi
Reviews.Author: golfer
Reviews.Content: love it and the price , very well made, i recommend it and it worked perfectly, solid construction great value

Reviews.Title: Best HDMI for the money
Reviews.Author: Sivart
Reviews.Content: I have bought the expensive Monster HDMI cables and for the money the Amazon Basics ones are just as good or better than the Monster brand cables.  With Monster cables you are really just paying for the name on the cable.

Reviews.Title: Held up really well for about 2 years
Reviews.Author: Staci Lolan
Reviews.Content: After about two years of being switched back and forth from different inputs, this cable is beginning to have trouble connecting/maintaining a connection. It has to be positioned very carefully and then stabilized, otherwise it won't connect. It used to work flawlessly, though, so I think I got my money's worth.

Reviews.Title: Quality
Reviews.Author: Dustin Cross
Reviews.Content: I have never had a cable send such an awesome picture and audio  to my tv. Just wow! Just easy!

Reviews.Title: Works great at a low price...
Reviews.Author: Julie&Chip "chipjulie_centralnj"
Reviews.Content: First I went to my local equipment store to pick one up then viewed the price, I'm glad I went and checked with Amazon.  Low price and prime item, couldn't ask for anything better.  It met my needs perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Solid... blown away by the quality
Reviews.Author: Tia Elwood
Reviews.Content: If you compare the length of this with the thickness of the cord to ones at best buy.... You should fork out another $70.00BAR NONE THE BEST HDMI CORD FOR THE MONEY!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Amazon Product
Reviews.Author: William J. Petrosky
Reviews.Content: AmazonBasics products have not yet disappointed me.  Strong and durable cord, I could not be happier with my purchase. Order this over other cord brands.

Reviews.Title: Fit Right
Reviews.Author: Allen
Reviews.Content: These were a replacement for another set of HDMI cables I had which were very easy to dislodge from the device they were connected to.  These stay connected so I no longer have to be concerned when I need to move any of my devices - like when I need to clean them (or clean around them).

Reviews.Title: great cable
Reviews.Author: T. Stone
Reviews.Content: I needed this cable to hook up a second monitor to my laptop.  It is a good quality cable.  would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Sweet and Simple
Reviews.Author: Christian
Reviews.Content: No complaints here. I've ordered a few of these cables for use with HTPC's. No issues to date. At this price, I'll be ordering more as I need them.

Reviews.Title: What I needed
Reviews.Author: Bonnie Jo "febsnow47"
Reviews.Content: needed this to hook up tv it is working very well. ws pleased with quick arrival of my order. Amazon comes thru.

Reviews.Title: hdmi cable
Reviews.Author: William
Reviews.Content: My first component cables cost me $70 apiece.  This hdmi cable was a lot less expensive and works just great.  One doesn't need to spend a fortune on cables.

Reviews.Title: Excellent HDMI Cable
Reviews.Author: BDE "BrickyardBrad"
Reviews.Content: For the price and the build quality, why would anyone ever buy an overpriced HDMI cable in a store? I actually feel sorry for the folks that get nailed with outrageously overpriced cables in stores when they buy new TV's and other devices. A little preparation can save significant money sometimes.

Reviews.Title: Standard HDMI cable
Reviews.Author: seaybl
Reviews.Content: Works great, I'd recommend the next one up from the 3 foot one. Luckly for me they work (TV and receiver are on a stand not wall mounted).

Reviews.Title: Great Cable, Price and Quality
Reviews.Author: Julian Moore
Reviews.Content: Great cable but occasional cut out of sound not enough to really notice. May notice if you are very picky.

Reviews.Title: Thanks Cable
Reviews.Author: J. Luis Pedraza "J. Luis Pedraza"
Reviews.Content: I should get two wires are necessary to connect the internet to TV and TV to cable box guess didn't notice that they did recommend to buy two  in amazon I had to order the other oneLuis

Reviews.Title: Fantastic HDMI cable
Reviews.Author: Johnny
Reviews.Content: Amazing cable at an extremely low price. Highly recommend to anyone lookin for an hdmi cable; you can't go wrong with this one.

Reviews.Title: This is an HDMI cable.
Reviews.Author: Christopher
Reviews.Content: Shipped to my house within 2 days with no extra charge. No defects, It works well and is the length it says it is.

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: Chuck H. "Chuck"
Reviews.Content: I've had it 2 months. Works fine, perfect length to go from my Apple TV to my tv. Not too long.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Magic Mikey
Reviews.Content: This cord is awesome! I purchased it recently and wow, I have to say that it's amazing! I plugged it in with my new PS4 and the graphics look awesome! Even with my regular TV and XBox 360 it looks great! This cord is absolutely incredible for its price too! I strongly recommend it if you're looking for awesome quality in the things I mentioned above! Try it!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Imran
Reviews.Content: it works great, best for the price needed it for my TV and it is easy to hook up. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Cable
Reviews.Author: V
Reviews.Content: It's a cable that works as it is intended, it's kind of the unsung hero of the component world.  Without it your stuff doesn't work.

Reviews.Title: Good HDMI Cable
Reviews.Author: jirobinson13
Reviews.Content: It's a basic HDMI cable that has been working fine for me. Big expensive HDMI cables do not present any advantages over using generic cheap cables. It's all digital format, it will either work or it won't.

Reviews.Title: So much cheaper...
Reviews.Author: S. Cohen
Reviews.Content: ...than going to the store or wasting money on some high dollar brand that all the A/V reviewers will tell you no better.

Reviews.Title: get it
Reviews.Author: Caleb De La Rosa
Reviews.Content: does what it needs to do and so far after a few months i haven't had any problems what so ever

Reviews.Title: HDMI cable
Reviews.Author: Heather Graf
Reviews.Content: Go ahead & order this with your Amazon Fire TV because you will need it. Amazon Fire TV is very affordable & very versatile in its applications provided.

Reviews.Title: Cheap-- works great
Reviews.Author: B. Kilpatrick
Reviews.Content: I have this cable connecting an Apple TV to my TV. I have not had any issues at all! The picture quality is great. Highly recommended. Why spend more?

Reviews.Title: This Cable is AWESOME
Reviews.Author: Chad
Reviews.Content: You can't beat the value in this cable. It is long enough to plug my computer into the tv from the coffee table. Just what I was looking for. I have had this product for over 5 months now and its working like a champ still!

Reviews.Title: It works.
Reviews.Author: DaHunk
Reviews.Content: What can you say about a HDMI cable? The sucker does what it is supposed to do. I bought it for my Roku device, and everything works fine.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Michael Malik
Reviews.Content: They work great and they are at a price you can't beat! I would highly recommend to anyone on the fence.

Reviews.Title: Great price and quality
Reviews.Author: SandieMI
Reviews.Content: I returned the one I bought for $37, and was super glad to find a gold connection one for only $6.00.  Can't beat that!

Reviews.Title: Excellent price, works well
Reviews.Author: Susanne "Susanne"
Reviews.Content: I got this cable because I have a Dell MS Home computer that I wanted to connect to my TV and a HDMI cable fit the bill. Initially, I had two different cables running--one for the picture and one for the audio, but the HDMI did both and solved the aspect ratio issue I had with the screen. Recommend!

Reviews.Title: You can't go wrong with these....
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Looped"
Reviews.Content: Don't overpay for HDMI cables. They simply all do the exact same thing whether it's Monster or another high-end audio branded cable.There is no loss of picture or sound quality.These are perfect!

Reviews.Title: works well, great price
Reviews.Author: anonymous
Reviews.Content: needed a cable that would stretch a long way, but not be outrageously expensive. I am very happy that I made this purchase. It works perfectly for my needs.

Reviews.Title: High quality
Reviews.Author: Black Cat 27
Reviews.Content: Get this cable with your Fire TV for a hastle-free installation.  You know it's going to work, it's made for this specific purpose.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I needed
Reviews.Author: Moises cruz
Reviews.Content: This was exactly what I needed. I should you go to  a store and buy an expensive HDMI cable. The price of this HDMI cable is perfect for my budget.

Reviews.Title: Worth the price.
Reviews.Author: Elaine N
Reviews.Content: Purchased a 2nd one when I got Apple TV. It is very affordably priced.  Can't go wrong with this one. Would buy even a 3rd time, if I needed one.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Jordan S.
Reviews.Content: This is a Great price!! It Works perfect too!! The length is perfect for the use we need it. It was cheaper than Home Depot.

Reviews.Title: Couldn't ask for more for thie price.
Reviews.Author: EJaros
Reviews.Content: Couldn't ask for more for thie price.  Saw many other HDMI cables at twice the price, I thought I would try this one first.  Connected to a new Magnavox HDMI player and a new LG High Def TV.  Works Great.

Reviews.Title: Quick and easy
Reviews.Author: cooler joe
Reviews.Content: Low cost cable that works flawlessly.  This cable length is well suited for keeping wires tidy behind your entertainment center.

Reviews.Title: Perfect cables
Reviews.Author: France C
Reviews.Content: It is exactly what the promo says it is and does what it says it will do. No need to spend a fortune for the same cables.

Reviews.Title: Great Cables
Reviews.Author: Bryan M.
Reviews.Content: Do not waste your money buying more expensive cables. These work great for all applications. I highly recommend them. At this price, you can buy extras, just because...

Reviews.Title: A cable, solidly made and with a good connector
Reviews.Author: Constantinople
Reviews.Content: I like electronics, and I have lots and lots of opportunities to play with cables and connectors of all kinds and qualities. This cable is solid, but flexible, and the cable connectors are of good quality. I buy almost all of my cables from amazon basic now. It comes in a super easy to open box, unlike the clamshells of old.

Reviews.Title: AmazonBasics High-Speed HDMI Cable (6.5 Feet/2.0 Meters
Reviews.Author: Grizz "GRIZZ ADAMS"
Reviews.Content: It does what they are supposed to do so I don't know what else to say. Thank you very much.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Romantic
Reviews.Content: Very good HDMI cable I really like it I pick this type because of it's gold head I think it's very good connector for high definition movies

Reviews.Title: It's an hdmi cable so yeah
Reviews.Author: kevin hance
Reviews.Content: I am not going to write an insane long review about an hdmi cable because I am not an insane person. I will say it works, but it is a little overpriced for what it is.

Reviews.Title: Great HDMI Cable
Reviews.Author: Spike462
Reviews.Content: I use this cable as an extra to connect my laptop to my Onkyo Receiver.  It works very well and the HD picture looks fantastic.  Don't get scammed into paying for a more expensive cable because all you are paying extra for is their marketing...I would buy this again.

Reviews.Title: Cables either pass or fail: this one passes
Reviews.Author: Seth Warren
Reviews.Content: One plug of the cable connected to a jack on the television and the other connected to the jack on my Roku 3 player.  The signal from the Roku to the TV was then transmitted with no issue.  Not much more to say; a cable either works or it doesn't.  I suppose I could comment that the black of the cable matches the back of the TV, but that just seems silly.

Reviews.Title: Works great between my Apple TV and Samsung TV as well as my Cable box and TV
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: I have several of these cords. I have never  had any problem with them. I use these cables between my DVR box and TVs in two rooms as well as between my Apple TV and Television in another room. They all work as expected.

Reviews.Title: It does what it is supposed to
Reviews.Author: Heidi Richmond
Reviews.Content: This was the correct length and works great! The quality of the picture was more than satisfactory.  If I need another HDMI cable, I will get another one of these.

Reviews.Title: Amazon HDMI Cable
Reviews.Author: Shadow
Reviews.Content: Good picture and sound quality.After 9 months of constant use, cables are still in great condition.May not be the most durable for a portable system, but is more than enough for an entertainment center.

Reviews.Title: Annoyingly thick cords
Reviews.Author: Spencer Tichenor
Reviews.Content: These are cheap and work fine but the cord is SUPER thick.  Annoying if you are trying to move your computer around while it's plugged in to the TV.

Reviews.Title: Functions as advertised
Reviews.Author: BMUR
Reviews.Content: Purchased for my new HDTV and the picture is vibrant, clear, and everything one would expect from an HDMI cable. As I am moving from the standard 3-cable, I cannot comment how it compares to other HDMI's that are out there. The picture quality compared to the 3-cable is night and day and I would recommend.

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: Margie
Reviews.Content: What can you really say about an HDMI cable besides that it works?  It arrived on time and I was able to use it right away.

Reviews.Title: The best quality I've ever seen on an hdmi cable.
Reviews.Author: J. Cervantes
Reviews.Content: First off the gold plated tips are nice & to this day no signs of wear on the tips(not worried about tips getting corroded).I've used this cable for a Laptop running Linux & a Windows 7 Laptop, which worked flawlessly on both.This cable is very thick! (which is good thing quality-wise) so I don't worry at all that it tear on the insulation.The biggest pro about this cable is simply the great price amazon is selling these. So much cheaper than others.Highly recommend buying the AmazonBasics hdmi cable if youre looking for to buy an hdmi. You wont regret it

Reviews.Title: DOES THE JOB
Reviews.Author: DOG LOVER
Reviews.Content: I bought this to use with my recently purchased Roku. It was reasonable priced and an appropriate length. The installation was easy and I have no complaints

Reviews.Title: good cable
Reviews.Author: Robert Ryan
Reviews.Content: Good  cable for a good price. Its an HDMI Cable what more can be said. It worked perfect and had a good price.

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: Thomas L. Reingold
Reviews.Content: No complaints. Does the job, and the price is excellent. I've learned that no name cables are often not a good bet, but maybe if Amazon puts their name on it, it's trustworthy.

Reviews.Title: good value
Reviews.Author: Larry Kneisel
Reviews.Content: I needed an HDMI for my bluray and needed it right away. i recommend it for any head unit.  6 feet is always the right amount

Reviews.Title: Great cables
Reviews.Author: Nicholas Macke
Reviews.Content: Simple and easy to use with quick standard shipping.  And these cable can obviously be used on a number of devices!

Reviews.Title: It's an HDMI cable, and it works
Reviews.Author: David B.
Reviews.Content: This will probably be the simplest review I've ever written. HDMI is digital, so the cables either work, or they don't. This cable works, and it seems to be sturdy enough. Stores always want to charge ridiculous prices for these cables, so just order this one and you're good to go!

Reviews.Title: good cable
Reviews.Author: Alice Xenia
Reviews.Content: Does exactly what it says for way less than the brick and mortar stores I visited. Yay Amazon thanks for the inexpensive high quality cables !!!

Reviews.Title: Great solution
Reviews.Author: MucBeah54 "Cloudwoman"
Reviews.Content: HDMI Cable Supports Ethernet, 3D and Audio --Works fine--use to connect laptop to HDTV to watch Netflix.  No problems!  Highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Nice quality
Reviews.Author: Melissa Conatser "Dark Diva Reviews"
Reviews.Content: This cable seems to be made very well and was a good price for the quality. Just hooked up my new FireTV with it, and the picture is fantastic.

Reviews.Title: Cheap, works
Reviews.Author: Andrew
Reviews.Content: Good cable and it's really hard to beat the Amazon Basics price. Perfect length for coming out of my laptop and wrapping around to an external monitor without any extra cable left over to tie up.

Reviews.Title: Good, but a bit short
Reviews.Author: Leandro
Reviews.Content: I am using to connect my laptop to my tv.The picture and sound is working fine, but was a little short.

Reviews.Title: HIGH SPEED HDMI CABLE
Reviews.Author: chris hamilton
Reviews.Content: USED RIGHT AWAY TO CONNECT MY COMPUTER TO MY TV SO THAT I COULD USE THE TV AS A MONITOR FOR MOVIE'S.Very fast, great picture. Make sure you purchase the right length cable. (longer is better) Great price even after shipping

Reviews.Title: Nice idea but has problems
Reviews.Author: T. R. Baker
Reviews.Content: I like the idea of streaming video, primarily Amazon Prime and HuluPlus, but this unit has issues.First is the moderately frequent reboots that occur in the middle of watching.  It varies from once a week to once a day but when it happens you get to quit watching for about 5 minutes while it reboots and you re-access whatever you were watching.Second is the time delay to using the remote. You hit pause and it will sometimes take 30 seconds to several minutes for it to respond.  So of course you get frustrated and punch the button a couple more times and then all of those actions go through with the video starting again then pausing then starting.  Very annoying.From what I've read online, I'd avoid this particular model. It seems prone to problems.

Reviews.Title: Great Cable
Reviews.Author: Brian Pearce
Reviews.Content: It is a well made HDMI cable.  You do not need to speed more than 10 dollars for an hdmi cable.  They are all regulated based on universal guidelines.  Hooked it up to a 65 inch Samsung tv and the picture is perfect.  Go with this cable!

Reviews.Title: Works flawlessly!
Reviews.Author: J. Pagliuca III "Whitestar19"
Reviews.Content: I've bought 10 of these AmazonBasics HDMI cables and they all work perfectly with great sound and picture and I pay a fraction of what you would pay for a monster cable. These are all you need. High quality, cheap, and they work flawlessly. Don't buy anything else.

Reviews.Title: hdmi cable
Reviews.Author: James Matthews
Reviews.Content: It has been working great and my whole lounge at college has been using it all the time. For blue ray, Xbox and our computers.

Reviews.Title: Compares to Others Costing Much More
Reviews.Author: charles w lennon
Reviews.Content: I picked this up to show cartoons to my grandson from my laptop. I am certainly not a anal computer geek but the quality over this cable is certainly satisfactory for me at 30 % of price you will pay elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: Does it job.
Reviews.Author: Michael Jeffords
Reviews.Content: Work great. No problems. I this is a cheap, high quality product. Perfect for my setup. I love them. :D

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Lexi Lucy
Reviews.Content: I've already been using this item. It's great to be able to go on Amazon.com and buy a quality item for cheap when I would have to spend twice as much in Best Buy, Walmart, or Target for the same (or cheaper-quality) product.The length is a great length; I can leave my laptop on my desk and the cord will plug in effortlessly with my TV.I've watched several movies already. Very little lag-time for the projection of my laptop screen. I would recommend this product!

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: Bruce Murray On Travel "Murray On Travel"
Reviews.Content: This is a high quality cable that works fine.  I don't have any way to evaluate the electronic aspects of this cable, but both of the cables I purchased are working as expected.  Nice solid quality.  My understanding is that this is about as long as you want to go with an standard, un-amplified cable.I would buy this cable again if needed.

Reviews.Title: Great!!!
Reviews.Author: D. Soto
Reviews.Content: Best HDMI cable ever. Great price. A must buy. I recommend this product because it does the same job as those expensive brands.

Reviews.Title: good HDMI cable
Reviews.Author: Ryan C. Mercer
Reviews.Content: Normally I buy my cables from an online retailer that specializes in just cables due to their great qualtity and price, however the free prime shipping on this AmazonBasics HDMI cable got my business here.They work. I had a HDMI cable that had been giving me some trouble regularly causing an HDMI error message to appar on the television and the picture to go out. It was the cheap piece of junk that came with the television, I replaced it with this cable and problem solved (and my picture is much more vibrant).All in all great cable and a great price.

Reviews.Title: Lame
Reviews.Author: A. Crebbin "science class"
Reviews.Content: purchased this cable along with our new Sony DVD player. 3 months later had to replace the cord with a new one. Cheap price, cheap product. I should have known better. You get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: High Quality Product
Reviews.Author: K. Brandeis "domestic engineer"
Reviews.Content: I was searching for an HDMI cord to replace one that I suspected was causing my TV to flash on and off.  This was a cheaper alternative for the test.  My TV still flashes, but not as often.  I suspect it to be my Internet Provider.  This is a nicely built item, firm and solid.  It is not flimsy in anyway.  I am willing to bet it will last a long time.  Plus it has a sleek look to it!

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: Nathan Best
Reviews.Content: I ended up running short on HDMI cables and had to pick another one up.  Amazon's High-Speed HDMI cable foot the bill perfectly, and the price was perfect!

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Jacqueline Klueh
Reviews.Content: I ordered this HDMI cable to attach an electronic device to my TV. Cable is as described and works perfectly fine. I needed a longer than normal cable and this fit the bill. Happy in Indiana.

Reviews.Title: should have come with the player
Reviews.Author: Kate M.
Reviews.Content: We bought two Sony blu-ray players for Christmas. It seems that a required cable would come with the player. Duh. I was grateful that reviewers mentioned the need to order these separately, or my kids would have been bummed when they tried to hook up. They work and the price wasn't god-awful, so it's all good.

Reviews.Title: no issues
Reviews.Author: tjshops4kids
Reviews.Content: Seems to be a good quality cable.  Works fine with my Sony equipment including our BluRay player.  Good price point as well.

Reviews.Title: Great value, good length.
Reviews.Author: B. Moynahan
Reviews.Content: This is the perfect length for giving you some room to arrange your laptop and projector, without having a ridiculous amount of extra material ensnaring presenters.

Reviews.Title: Good product for great price
Reviews.Author: Big K
Reviews.Content: I bought this in february of this year. Wasn't sure if it was going to perform like a more expensive one. But after 2 months it has worked perfectly. I love it. If it does happen to fail I will definately update. But as for now I am extremely pleased. The price is unbelievable compared to retail store prices.

Reviews.Title: Good Quality Cable
Reviews.Author: DeeWhit
Reviews.Content: I am impressed with the AmazonBasics lines of cables. I have bought several audio and video cables. They all seem really well made and accomplish the task without any noticeable signal loss (at least to the average user like me). Connectors are always a good fit and firmly connected to the cable (unlike many other cheep cables).

Reviews.Title: A must have
Reviews.Author: Paul Mojica
Reviews.Content: I have been looking for something like this for quite sometime and didn't want to spend the world on one. So Amazon it was.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Marc52
Reviews.Content: Does the job just as well as the thirty to fifty dollar ones. Longevity,.............can't speak to that yet, but I feel it will hold up well.

Reviews.Title: Don't Pay retail!
Reviews.Author: Nicholas Shilling
Reviews.Content: This is just as good or better than the 20$ "highspeed" Hdmi cable they try to sell you in the store.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Christopher A. Leal
Reviews.Content: The Cable worked as expected.  What more could you want? It's a video cable! Again its a cable!...there, i think that's enough words, is that good enough for you Amazon?

Reviews.Title: It is what it says
Reviews.Author: Nick
