Reviews.Title: Great HDMI cable at a reasonable price
Reviews.Author: Ven M.
Reviews.Content: This is a 6.5 foot HDMI cable that fits into the standard HDMI port of a computer, television, etc. If you want to connect your computer to a display device using an HDMI cable, you cannot go wrong by ordering this cable. It ships quickly and is backed by Amazon. It is also priced fairly.  Do not buy over-priced HDMI cables at big-box retailers like Best Buy or even Target. There is nothing special about "gold-plated" or "diamond-crusted" HDMI cables that cost 5x-20x the price of this cable.  HDMI is a digital standard, so you either get a signal or you don't. If you plug this cable in and get a signal (which you will, unless you were accidentally shipped a faulty cable), then your picture will be just as good as what you would get from buying a $75 rip-off cable from Best Buy.Another bonus: This cable comes in easy-to-open packaging so you are only one minute away from receiving the cable to using it.I use this on a daily basis to connect my laptop to my HDTV and have not had any issues with the cable.

Reviews.Content: Super fast shipping and they work great. I bought these for the kids to hook their tablet to their new tv and they work great.

Reviews.Title: Works for my blu ray
Reviews.Author: Sean
Reviews.Content: What I like about this is that it does what I need it to do without any unneeded bells and whistles.  It isn't so long that I have to wrap it around itself and shove it behind my entertainment center.  It is the perfect length for players nad televisions that are close together.  The price was also amazing.

Reviews.Title: Functional, Cheap, and better than anything you buy instore.
Reviews.Author: Tyler "Aharain"
Reviews.Content: Worth every penny. Too many places overcharge on HDMI cables, no reason to purchase them when this is perfectly fine for all of your HDMI needs.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING
Reviews.Author: Nichole Scott
Reviews.Content: Most places try to charge so much for just a cable. I am so impressed with how Amazon is coming out with their own line of things. If you need an HDMI cable, then this is it!

Reviews.Title: Just right
Reviews.Author: W Eric Whittington
Reviews.Content: This cable was just the right size for my needs.  There is no way I could justify spending what retailers are asking for this item, but the right price here.

Reviews.Title: It does the trick!
Reviews.Author: M. J. Field
Reviews.Content: I have two of these now, one on the Mac Mini in the den and one on the Roku in the bedroom.  They are well made and work with no flaws that we can notice.  Thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Title: It works.
Reviews.Author: Keith Johnson "odd dude"
Reviews.Content: A good solid HDMI cable.  Don't waste money on more expensive cables.  'Premium cables' don't do the job any better than this.

Reviews.Title: No Problems here
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: Works great! No issues of latency. Great picture transmission. Regardless of price, it acts like a top of the line HDMI cord, which is 5-6 times less then a "top of the line" cable.  Amazon basics is my new best friend.

Reviews.Title: Simple, inexpensive, recommended
Reviews.Author: J. Hansen "Human"
Reviews.Content: It's hard to say much more than what I expressed in the title. HDMI cables are all the same and this one works fantastically. No need to pay more than this.

Reviews.Title: A good product.  Works great.
Reviews.Author: harry m. johnson
Reviews.Content: A good product at a good price.  Needed the cable to connect a tablet to a Samsung screen to be able to watch streaming media.  Needed to be longer to meet our needs.  Is working great with no issues.

Reviews.Title: Works great, super price, fast delivery
Reviews.Author: chop66 "chop66"
Reviews.Content: Once again, Amazon is making commodites like HDMI cables a much simpler and certainly less expensive.  Checked the price at one of the big box stores in town and price was nearly triple.  The simple packaging is also appreciated.  A simple quick tear plastic bag and voila, cable is ready to go.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: DC101
Reviews.Content: Works exactly as advertised. I could not be happier. I hooked it up and it delivered a very clear picture. I couldn't ask for more.

Reviews.Title: Does The Trick
Reviews.Author: Christopher Koch "Chris"
Reviews.Content: Does what it says it will.  Great sound and picture. Excellent quality.  I am really tired of Amazon's minimum word requirement.  This may be my last review.

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: Jim S.
Reviews.Content: Works great, and was much cheaper than most other cables.  I would purchase this item again if Im in the market again.

Reviews.Title: Great HDMI cables and at a great price
Reviews.Author: Mendy
Reviews.Content: This HDMI cable arrived on time and in good condition.  I only use it to watch my DVD's, but knowing it can support Ethernet is good to know and have.  The 2.0 meter size is just perfect for my entertainment center.  I ordered 2, but plan on purchasing another 2 just in case.  I gave away the 2 standard HDMI cables I had been using to a friend who needed HDMI cables for his DVD players he had just gotten.  I rate this 5 stars because of its value and great picture quality.  I recommend purchasing this product.

Reviews.Title: Great Cable
Reviews.Author: Michael G Strand
Reviews.Content: Great cable that works incredibly well at a fraction of the cost of other cables. I use this to connect my receiver to my projector and haven't had any issues with it, doing blu rays, apple tv, dvds and video games. Works great and would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: No frills, low cost, just what an HDMI cable should be.
Reviews.Author: Chris A.
Reviews.Content: Do not spend tons of money on HDMI cables, or any cable for that matter.  As almost any technical review will tell you cheep cables perform as well or better than the ones for 10 times the money.  I've gotten a few AmazonBasics cable and they never disappoint.

Reviews.Title: works well and looks good
Reviews.Author: ka
Reviews.Content: why pay more, amazon makes good stuff. im happy with this product, i may need to get 1-2 more and convert some old component cables over

Reviews.Title: we have picture
Reviews.Author: The Brad
Reviews.Content: Perfect length for my roku players which are mounted on back side of TV. Great Picture and sturdy cable!Great $ too

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly
Reviews.Author: JAMES PANGRAZIO
Reviews.Content: I buy all my cables from amazon basics.  They work great, good quality construction and they make them in lengths you can't get from the manufactor.  Redid my entire media room with AmazonBasics cables!

Reviews.Title: As Good or Better Than Gem-Studded Cable From Radio Shack
Reviews.Author: Mike Allen
Reviews.Content: We replaced an old TV that connected to the DirecTV box using the old style red-white-yellow plugs.  Went to Radio Shack to get an HDMI cable to bring everything up to date.  I refused to pay $20-something for their (must-have-been) gem studded model. Came home and bought this one from Amazon.  Problem solved, product does its job, shipping was great, couldn't be happier with the experience.

Reviews.Title: The cable works as it should
Reviews.Author: jasper60103
Reviews.Content: I hooked-up this cable between my HD TV and blueRay player.It replaced a composite cable.  What a difference in picture quality!No problems to report.

Reviews.Title: Great price and no problems
Reviews.Author: John Smith
Reviews.Content: Love the Amazon Basic line of products.  For an audio and videophile it does the job.  In terms of price it beats what you can find an any retail store by a lot.  Furthermore, paying more will not get you improved performance because it is a digital signal that is being sent across the wire, not analog such as in speakers.  Cable feels well built and I have not had problems with it for quite a while.

Reviews.Title: Execelent!
Reviews.Author: Flying Lady 76 "N2theBlue"
Reviews.Content: This is exactly what we were looking for.  Works exactly as described.  Best price anywhere and I am now able to hook my laptop to our 60" plasma and have all the entertainment imaginable right at our fingertips.

Reviews.Title: Great Cable & Inexpensive
Reviews.Author: Shawn Kristoferu
Reviews.Content: Great cable.  Have not had any issue with it even once.  Highly recommend it.  It auto detects all the connections.

Reviews.Title: Great stuff, works perfectly
Reviews.Author: Reggie H
Reviews.Content: I've been really satisfied with all my AmazonBasics purchases, and this has been no exception.  The cable fits snugly into my TV, it's sturdy but not overly stiff or heavy enough to stress the delicate HDMI port on the TV.  I have some more expensive HDMI cables, but the picture quality looks exactly the same.  It's only a 6.5 foot cable, so I can't comment on differences in high end/low end cables of extreme lengths, but this one is just fine.  My tv is happy with it, therefore I am happy.

Reviews.Title: works fine
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: I needed a cable for a friend, this one was a good price and it does the job. Buy it.

Reviews.Title: Works
Reviews.Author: Andrew Marlowe
Reviews.Content: Cheap.  Works.  Perfect!!! Don't waste money on wal mart crap when you can ship this to your door.  This is a win

Reviews.Title: Good Cable: Unbeatable Price
Reviews.Author: Joey D. Hackney
Reviews.Content: Cnet recommended these, so I took a chance. Given the price and Amazons’ return policy, I figured I couldn’t go wrong. Neither will you!

Reviews.Title: Standard hdmi
Reviews.Author: Alex Evans
Reviews.Content: It works to what it's stated to do so there's nothing much to not like other than the fact I needed it to use for my blu ray player.

Reviews.Title: Works great.
Reviews.Author: Brittany F.
Reviews.Content: I use this cable to hook my laptop up to my 55" TV. It works great. The cable is very thick and sturdy. I'm sure it will last for a while.

Reviews.Title: Well made HDMI cable
Reviews.Author: G. J. Baumbach
Reviews.Content: This is the fourth cable I've ordered from Amazon for HDMI purposes.  Works great, as have the rest of the others I've ordered.  Can't beat the price, and craftsmanship is great.

Reviews.Title: Works as expected
Reviews.Author: Rick Lanser
Reviews.Content: A trouble-free cable. What more can you expect? Works fine with the Kinivo HDMI switcher I also purchased to make my AV system easier to operate.

Reviews.Title: Cost Effective and Does the Job
Reviews.Author: Auswak "In USA"
Reviews.Content: There is definitely no need to spend a lot of money on a HDMI cable.This one more than adequately does the job and with quality for the price.

Reviews.Title: AmazonBasics High-Speed HDMI Cable (6.5 Feet/2.0 Meters)
Reviews.Author: David Geyer
Reviews.Content: This was the recommended cable for the DVD player that I purchased. I could have gotten maybe a more expensive cable set but I don't believe it would give a better picture than what I am getting with this cable set.

Reviews.Title: works well so far
Reviews.Author: Patrick C.
Reviews.Content: Haven't had the chance to try the three D yet but otherwise works well. Very thick cable and heavy cable.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic HDMI cable!
Reviews.Author: LeaR
Reviews.Content: I was amazed to find this HDMI cable! It long enough that that trying to tuck it around things and hide it was great! It gave me exceptional picture quality, especially with it being so long! No one would have any idea! I will definitely will recommend this to my friends and family! Getting this cable is so much better then trying to piece cables together! And as I said before, beautiful picture quality!

Reviews.Title: just alright
Reviews.Author: trista hahn
Reviews.Content: I got this cheaper cable foe my dds neotv, it has a lot of feedback when running through the tv, sounds like static. would recommend buying a better version of this for the static like sound that this produces

Reviews.Title: works as expected
Reviews.Author: Oak
Reviews.Content: I thought the cable would be longer, but the picture and sound quality are both very good.  Im pleased with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Good price- performs as expected.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I have only used it for standard HDMI with audio from a laptop- none of the new/advanced features tested. Works great- affordable.

Reviews.Title: Works fine
Reviews.Author: Fortuna Elarat "mike"
Reviews.Content: It works fine no complaints come on time.it is OK i will buy again.it is already a month and OK.

Reviews.Title: Great cable
Reviews.Author: Melba Toast
Reviews.Content: Just what I needed to connect my mac to my tv for larger screen streaming.  Perfect audio and video transfer.

Reviews.Title: How do you rate something like this?
Reviews.Author: Marye Harrison
Reviews.Content: This is, by far, the most amazing hdmi cable I have ever owned.. One glittering end slips effortlessly into the opening on the back of my awaiting cable box, and the other insinuates itself, ever so gently, into the modest orifice on my television. The data from my cable box surges - invisibly, almost magically - into my television, and a universe of entertainment presents itself.I've had many hours of pleasure from this cable. My naughty little secret? I have another identical cable, awaiting to delight me further when I "go the other way." Yes . . . I also have a dvd player with it's very own cable . . . sinuously awaiting the time when it, too, can join the dance.

Reviews.Title: Good cable at a good price
Reviews.Author: Michael L. Laughlin
Reviews.Content: This cable has gold plated ends which fit snugly in the device that it is being plugged into. The cable ends are also large enough that they can be gripped securely if you need to remove the cable. That could be a drawback if you intend to use the cable in a device that has the HDMI ports very close together. The wire is about medium in diameter for a HDMI cable and is about medium in flexibility. This cable performs just as well as the cables I have purchased in a big box store for 5 times as much.

Reviews.Title: Necessary for Rocu
Reviews.Author: Julie M. Ounanian ""Julzbooks""
Reviews.Content: Bought this to use with my new Roku.  Great price and necessary to operate the Roku system.  Glad it was offered and a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Quality cable
Reviews.Author: Joe Beaulaurier "jbeaul"
Reviews.Content: I forget what I paid for this cable but I am impressed by the quality of construction. I'm plugging and unplugging one end daily (connects to notebook computer used at work and home) so durability is important. It's only been a few weeks but I have no worries.

Reviews.Title: Love the lenght
Reviews.Author: April McAbee "AprilMcAbee .com...Future autho...
Reviews.Content: Good cord for a great price. Shipped on time and now my boys (that includes my husband!) have new cords for their gaming equipment. Some of the cheaper cords that you come across are good but they are short. Not this one. It is just right!

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly
Reviews.Author: G24
Reviews.Content: I bought a new Blu-ray player and wanted to hook it up to my bedroom TV. I learned years ago that it's not worth buying HDMI cables in stores because they're incredibly marked up. Everything about this has worked for me so far... I don't think there are a ton of other things to say about an HDMI cable. But yes, I would recommend this to friends.

Reviews.Title: heca length
Reviews.Author: linsan
Reviews.Content: works great. need length and found it. carries sound also. great find and even greater price. item works as described.

Reviews.Title: Came right on time

Reviews.Title: Amazon cables are the best

Reviews.Title: Works fine minimal packing.

Reviews.Title: YOU DO NOT NEED TO SPEND 40 OR 50 DOLLARS

Reviews.Content: BIG MONEY CABLES ARE FOR IDIOTS 8 BUCKS AND I CHALLENGE ANYONE TO TELL THE DIFFERENCE HAVE THIS ON A 1400 DOLLAR BOSE AND ONKYO SYSTEM PICTURE AND SOUND ARE GREAT

Reviews.Title: excellent.

Reviews.Content: using for my xbox. no complaints. excellent quality as long as bandwidth keeps up lolbest price by far. and long enough for things close to your tv.

Reviews.Title: Works perfeclty

Reviews.Content: It works perfectly, it seems well made. What else you can say a about a cable?  The actual cable part is a big bigger than I expect, but all those wires take space.

Reviews.Title: works as described

Reviews.Title: Great Product

Reviews.Title: Good product

Reviews.Title: Good product

Reviews.Title: DO NOT GET HDMI CABLES ANYWHERE ELSE!!!
Reviews.Author: Keith Flynn
Reviews.Content: For whatver reason ( I am sure someone will reply with some smart comment soon) many stores sell HDMI cables for $30 or more when you can come here and get these for CHEAP! Don't think twice or think they are fooling you with some cheap cables that don't function the same. These are most assuredly what you are looking for. They have the video, the sound, they have it all. They are absolutely no different that ones you would find for three times the price. I know, it's a weird world...

Reviews.Title: Completes the order for our DVD player
Reviews.Author: Cynthia B.
Reviews.Content: Ordered this to go with the Samsung wifi ready Blue Ray DVD player. Made set up easy and seems to work fine.

Reviews.Title: Great cable!
Reviews.Author: Goodneighbor "Eric"
Reviews.Content: I don't know how much I can say about an HDMI cable but it works great and the price was right!

Reviews.Title: Does exactly what it's supposed to.
Reviews.Author: Matt F.
Reviews.Content: This is a good cable and does exactly what it's supposed to. I got the 3-meter cable and it's perfect for sitting on my couch and connecting my laptop to my TV. It's a much cheaper solution than wireless HDMI.

Reviews.Title: Works as well as Monster
Reviews.Author: S. Smith

Reviews.Title: Great value; does the job

Reviews.Content: This cable gives good quality image and sound. It's nice to have the 10 feet of length for when you want to work the computer and see the screen at the same time (during lectures or presentations, for example). Good price, too.

Reviews.Title: Great cable for the money
Reviews.Author: C. Campbell

Reviews.Title: Basic cable

Reviews.Title: Can't beat it

Reviews.Title: The Best Deal @ Amazon!!!
Reviews.Author: allen
Reviews.Content: Purchased:08/21/13: In use with Sony Bravia HD > Kinivo hub;For the price, you just can not beat it for the quality! I've read where people have purchased other HDMI cable and were getting lots of issues/errors, (and those people spent up to $40!). This cable works perfectly w/my Roku, no issues at all. This cable is definitely the best deal @ Amazon!-A

Reviews.Title: Great for the money
Reviews.Author: MtBiker
Reviews.Content: Does the job well compared to high priced cables. Do yourself a favor and buy prior to making you hardware purchase or wait a little bit to hook your device while this comes in the mail.

Reviews.Title: Great Quality Cable

Reviews.Content: Great quality, more than I expected. Fast delivery and bring me the solution that I was looking for. A little expensive for a cable.

Reviews.Title: Fast Delivery

Reviews.Title: Excellently price interface cable

Reviews.Title: affordable

Reviews.Title: Great.

Reviews.Title: Great

I use it for my PS3 to my tv. It has a solid connection and looks pretty good. The quality feels great and also feels like it will be one that lasts a while compared to other cheap HDMI cables. I highly recommend this to anyone who needs an HDMI cable.

Reviews.Title: Good for me

Reviews.Title: perfect

Reviews.Title: Durable, as expected

Reviews.Title: easy to use

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive and works well

Reviews.Title: Why pay more, these work great!

Reviews.Title: Work great and so much cheaper!

Reviews.Title: works perfectly, and seems strong, so predict it will be reliable

I would recommend each and every one of them again in a heart beat.

Reviews.Title: It's fine. No problems. Cheap. I like it.

Reviews.Title: Perfect

Reviews.Title: Duh

Reviews.Title: it works

You can buy the expensive hdmi cables if you want but I bought this  cable and Blade Runner box set (5disc) and it still cheaper then some cables and looks great.

Reviews.Title: Happy camper

Reviews.Content: Was just what we wanted, price right came quickly, made my 9 year old grandson very happy. Noe he can play with 3 other friends on minecraft!

Reviews.Title: HDMI cable

Reviews.Title: A quality product at a great price.

Reviews.Title: GREAT VALUE!!

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: a631222009
Reviews.Content: i like your product, but i dont like to writh the comment, and that's all i want to write, you're welcome

Reviews.Title: Works Perfect

Reviews.Title: Great for the price....

Reviews.Title: cord

Reviews.Title: victooo
Reviews.Author: victor
Reviews.Content: After watching the first movie with my new upconvert DVD and speaker system I must say I'm very impressed. Next some things others may want to know. The speakers attach to the DVD player, not the TV. The speakers are easy to attach, it's all color coded. Speaker cords are long enough. The ARC works great, it didn't at first. Make sure you hook your HDMI cable to the correct HDMI port, one should have ARC by it, mine is HDMI 2. Set both your DVD player and your TV to the correct setting for ARC to work. I went back through several times getting the speakers to work off the TV alone,(with the dvd player on) think it was the fifth time re-checking all the settings before they started to work. Now for the review. Ever seen a close up on a movie that was so clear of a mans face you can count the whiskers? I can now. yep the picture is so clear on my 50 inch plasma I could count all the whiskers. The surround so crisp and clear from feet softly moving across gravel on the ground all the way up to explosions I could feel pass through me. I had the volume way up to 75 filing the living room with awesome sound! I love my early Christmas present to myself. For those of you hat do not have a Panasonic TV, I doubt if you can get the speakers to work off your TV alone. Foe those that do have a Panasonic TV, go for it!

Besides, I would rather buy 14 Amazon 15 foot cables for the same price as 1 Monster cable from "Not Best" Buy.

I'll give them another few weeks to see how they hold up.

Reviews.Title: Good cables, good price
Reviews.Author: C. Shrout "Everybody's tech guy"
Reviews.Content: The amazon basics cables are good stuff! If you need a digital cable that doesn't have a long run (i.e. less than 25 feet) you are safe to go with a generic brand. Remember, anything digital transmits 1s and 0s. Signal degradation doesn't matter too much so long as there is enough signal to send that 1 and that 0 from the source to the equipment receiving it. Analog technology (colored plugs, speaker wire etc.) would suffer from signal loss - digital technology only has to trickle in at the end of the line and be sufficiently read. So go buy these!

Reviews.Title: It's digital, so buy it and stop being fooled
Reviews.Author: B. McCarty "Geek"
Reviews.Content: With analog connections, spending more money can lead to a clearer signal path between your cable box / DVD player / gaming system and your TV. But with HDMI, it's a simple matter of either a working signal or not. It sends 1s and 0s that are decoded on the other end, rather than a compressed signal. Don't be fooled by expensive HDMI cables. These are great, they get the job done and they're pretty sturdy. I'll be ordering more.

It works fine from my TV to my cable box and Blu-Ray player, but I have noticed issues with the video and audio signals dropping out when using this with my Apple TV. I haven't exhaustively tested this to be certain that it's 100% not an issue with my Apple TV, but when using it with another HDMI cord that I had laying around, I haven't had any problems, so anecdotally, I think it might be this cord. Since I'm not sure, I'm leaving it at 4 stars because it works just perfectly for everything else, and the price for the AmazonBasics stuff is far superior to the big name brands.

Reviews.Title: Beware of "chunkier" cable ends, compared to Mediabridge cables. May have trouble fitting into tight spaces.
Reviews.Author: Niles508
Reviews.Content: I bought the 3' Basics cable to attach a speaker bar above my Hitachi flat screen TV. The cable ends are actually too chunky (thick) to fit into the recessed space on the side/back of the TV where the TV's HDMI connectors are located. [This was not a problem, however, since I also had purchased a right angle HDMI connector, which fit into the recessed area. The 3' connector then fits onto the right angle connector.]So, just be aware that these cable ends are a bit chunky when compared to other brands (I am only familiar with Mediabridge.) The more expensive Mediabridge cable (which I also have for a different connection) has a slimmer profile for its cable end. It will fit into the Hitachi TV's recessed area for HDMI connections.

Reviews.Title: Great customer service

Reviews.Content: I can’t speak to the quality of this cable yet because I haven’t used it.  When I ordered it I thought 9.8 feet would be plenty long.  I went online to find whether or not I could exchange it for a15 footer, but alas.  Since was in fact my error they could neither exchange it nor give me a refund.  Fair enough. No later than the time I took to draw a breath, I window popped up and something to the effect, “No problem.  We’ve got your back.  We will credit your account and you may keep the cable as well.”Wow. Whoever is writing their customer service software is a very generous person.  In all my years I’ve never had this happen.  It made me a happy chappy!Now, if there were only a way to leverage this little subroutine…

Reviews.Title: A simple case of big brand name doesn't mean anything
Reviews.Author: Curtis
Reviews.Content: go these cables for some home networking. I was unsure about getting "off-brand" cables and their quality. I would have wanted to buy Monster cables, but they are so expensive. Finally I decided on the AmazonBasics HDMI cables. I figured that since they are so inexpensive, I wouldn't be out very much if they don't hold up. Boy were my concerns unfounded!Since I DO have other Monster HDMI cables from past purchases, I can compare these to those, and the AmazonBasics are working just as good, for a fraction of the price. I know that I'll be buying more HDMI cables in the future, and now I know they'll be AmazonBasics cables!

I can't believe that people will actually spend $300 or more for an HDMI cable at the "Blue Shirt" store!

Reviews.Content: I've learned that the price of the cable doesn't reflect it's quality, only it's price.  I've been using cables from AmazonBasics for some time now, and they've worked beautifully.  I fact, I've found that they've held up better than some of the ultra-expensive cables I purchased in the past.  I recommend them highly to anyone looking for a quality cable at a reasonable price.I do recommend that you match the cable to the specifications of your system... all HDMI cables are not the same.  Some are built to a newer standard that support both audio and video, and some (like this cable) supports an audio return.  Make sure that you get the right cable for your needs and I'm positive you'll be quite satisfied.

These are exactly what they should be - inexpensive items that do exactly what they are supposed to do and don't require any thought or attention.

Reviews.Title: Great cable
Reviews.Author: Darl
Reviews.Content: I was impressed with the quality of this cable.  And it came at an incredible price.  I'm very pleased.  I installed this cable months ago and have had zero problems.

Reviews.Title: HDMI cords work great!

Reviews.Title: Perfect Cable

Reviews.Title: Works great on our bluray player

Reviews.Title: Worked great arrived on time

Reviews.Title: It works!
Reviews.Author: Marce
Reviews.Content: I bought this to go with my Sony Bravia TV. It works as it is supposed to and it is a sturdy cable.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Roberts
Reviews.Content: This product does not disappoint. It came quickly and the person we gave it to loves it. Great deal for us!

Reviews.Title: Great product, top quality
Reviews.Author: Daniel Brodmerkle
Reviews.Content: These cables are great and for the money you can't beat them. I plug/unplug them all the time and they still fit and work great. They come in really nice amazon packaging too.

Reviews.Title: Don't overspend for an HDMI cable...
Reviews.Author: Don
Reviews.Content: I get a kick out the videophiles who insist their high dollar HMDI cable is better than the reasonably prices cables.Fact: Cheap cables will produce the EXACT same picture and sound quality as expensive cables as long as they're rated as high speed cables.So, don't listen to that know-it-all tech guy at work, or the sales associate who insist on selling you a $40 (and up) HDMI cable.  This $5 cable will do the exact same thing...Don't take my word for it, do the research.  Go to CNET.com and read the HMDI cable buying guide.

Reviews.Title: Quality cable
Reviews.Author: James Stevens "Avid reader"
Reviews.Content: Amazon has a fine cable with good connections here.  It works very well for me.  Not a great deal more to say about that.

Reviews.Title: Cable Works
Reviews.Author: Jeremy Ray Brown
Reviews.Content: Not sure what to say here, it is just a cable.  But I never had any problems with the cable.

Reviews.Title: HDMI cable
Reviews.Author: John Rhodes
Reviews.Content: It did stop. Overall, it's a nice machine. I'm happy with my purchase. I love working out on it. The treadmill provides sufficient progarms to select different work-outs. The only annoying thing is the key that has to be used to start the treadmill. It is a safety feature & is right on the control panel at the bottom. I've knocked it off at least 5 times during my runs & that stops the machine. That is a design problem. I think the key can be attached higher on the panel so it can't be knocked off during work-outs.I would recommend this machine to others.

Reviews.Title: Great cable, well worth it.
Reviews.Author: Wayne C. Stokes II
Reviews.Content: I was worried about the interference with other cables and the stiffness of the cable as well as lag... (all the problems I read in reviews...) But it had none of that. It works very well. Good picture, no lag and the cable is really not that stiff... (its about the stiffness of a CAT 5 cable/Ethernet cable or maybe just a tiny bit thicker).Only complaint is that the ends of the cables (the black plastic that says amazon on it) is quite large/wide... but that's not even a big enough deal to loose a star over. Great product. Awesome price.

Reviews.Title: Thick as heck
Reviews.Author: Muffin
Reviews.Content: But it works great. I don't have to have a separate audio cable, just plug and play.  Couldn't be simpler.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: HWag
Reviews.Content: Stores price gouge on this item all the time. There really is no reason to spend $40 at your local corporate electronics warehouse for this cable. Great length.

Reviews.Title: Generic headline summary
Reviews.Author: Adam Donze
Reviews.Content: This is a copy and paste to meet the requirements to rate the product. Anything outstanding or awful is hand written.

Reviews.Title: Cheap, effective
Reviews.Author: Carrington
Reviews.Content: From what I understand it can't be called HDMI if it doesn't meet certain standards. I don't see the reason to buy the more expensive options. I have four of these, 2 of the 15' models. They've all consistently worked great for quite some time now

Reviews.Title: Great Cable!
Reviews.Author: Mike Novotny
Reviews.Content: Bought these cables to replace some old HDMI cables I had from Monoprice.com.  Amazon's pricing beat monoprice's (which is amazing) and with Free 2 day shipping through amazon prime it was a deal too good to pass up.I have a 3D TV and have no issues with these cables.  They are not thick wiring and the connectors are not huge so they fit nicely behind my wall mounted TV.Highly recommend and would buy again.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: W Kethman "wkethman"
Reviews.Content: As always, Amazon delivers, high-spead HDMI cables, deliver as intended, would recommend to anyone and will continue to purchase for my family as needed

Reviews.Title: Does what's expected
Reviews.Author: Michael Horn "mikie"
Reviews.Content: Pricing HDMI cables is a puzzle. Quality of picture, transmission speeds, latest technical versions, gold plating, etc - not to mention outrageous pricing of some brands can lead one to believe that more expensive is better.So far- not necessarily so. I've used this cable to connect a Panasonic 3D Blue Ray player to my new Sony 60" LED TV and there is no better picture or sound (Boise sound system) one can have.My most demanding test - a PS4 connection - worked as well - no issues - only loss was to those brand names that charge an arm and a leg for no better quality cabling.

Reviews.Title: Works as expected

Reviews.Title: used this to hook my new sony htct 260H sound bar up to my Sony HD tv

Reviews.Title: Great price

Reviews.Content: Works perfectly, arrived quickly. If you want to hook up your pc to a tv, or whatever, buy this cable! Simple and easy

Reviews.Title: Work great

Reviews.Content: Work great, bought at the same time I bought a Blu-ray player, perfect fit on both ends, will do again

Reviews.Title: Has Worked Flawlessly For Over a Year Now
Reviews.Author: Lord Galderon
Reviews.Content: I use this to connect my Roku 3 to my LG TV. It was a fraction of what Best Buy charged for an HDMI cable, and has worked flawlessly for over a year now. I have ordered several amazon basics products now, and I am amazed at the quality and price of these products. The price and quality coupled with amazon's supreme customer service and you really can't go wrong. I know that even if I did have an issue with this product, amazon would have my covered and would refund me and send out an immediate replacement. It makes me wonder how MONSTER cables still sell. Misinformation and stupidity keeps people buying, I guess.

Reviews.Title: Cable

Reviews.Title: Good quailty

Reviews.Title: Great!

Reviews.Title: high speed cable

These are your basic run-of-the-mill HDMI cables priced the way they should be (not the way the major brands and retail stores price them at). I ordered two of these along with two Blue Rigger HDMI cables. I've been using these on my LCD and Plasma TVs and have not been disappointing by their quality. Though the cables are basic, Amazon does include their logo on the cable plugs which is more than I can say for the other companies out there. These cables are a good buy and I would purchase them again.

Reviews.Title: Works Like  A Charm!
Reviews.Author: BrianGuy1979
Reviews.Content: I had just purchased a new Samsung 55" Smart TV and was about to get suckered into a $50 cable from my local electronics store.  I opened up the Amazon app on my phone and found this one for about 90% cheaper lol!  I paid to have it sent next day which was also when my TV was ready to be picked up.  This cable works like a charm!  Been using it daily for about a month now and I couldn't be more pleased. A+!

Reviews.Title: Great for what I needed it for!

Reviews.Title: tough, cheap, works

Reviews.Content: Cable is long, tough and it does it's job. Not much to say. Here are a few words to fill up the mandatory word count.

Reviews.Content: It's an HDMI cable...what more can I say!  My old one was toast and I bought 2 of these because the price was so good.  Plugged them in and they worked great.  You won't be sorry you bought one!

Reviews.Title: just what I needed

Reviews.Title: Why would you buy anything but something Amazon put their own name on

Reviews.Title: easy to use

Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of those cables. One for my Xbox360 and one for my computer to connect with the TV screen. The one on the console is OK after 1 year but the one I use with my computer sometimes dos not connect or disconnect with no apparent reason. However, I manipulate hte second one more and more often, that probably explain that fact

Reviews.Title: A HDMI  cable is a  HDMI  cable  nothing more.
Reviews.Author: B. Shafer
Reviews.Content: A HDMI  cable is a  HDMI  cable  nothing more.  There  is not any encoding  or decoding done  with the cable.  HDMI cables  are strictly  transmission devices  from point A to  Point B and everything that  place at  those ends and not with  the cable.  Anyone that  says  they  noticed a difference  between  from one cable to  another does not  know what  they  are talking about.

Reviews.Title: well made cable
Reviews.Author: guitar geek
Reviews.Content: I was a little worried that Amazon might just be branding cheapo cables, but my worries were unfounded.  If anything, these seem like better than average quality cables at an excellent price.  Nice job Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Good cable
Reviews.Author: Tom Sanders
Reviews.Content: This is a very inexpensive cable for use in a short run from equipment to television that fit my needs.

Reviews.Title: Average
Reviews.Author: TJ Morgan
Reviews.Content: Regular old HDMI cable.Good price point although mono price is also competitive. 3d pass thru works without issue. Seems legit

Reviews.Title: Good Product

Reviews.Title: good cable

Reviews.Title: PERFECT

YOUR NOT USING SCIENTIFIC EQUIPMENT HERE AND ANYONE WHO SAYS THEY HEAR OR SEES A DIFFERENCE IN PICTURE IS FULL OF IT, THAT BEING SAID- OBVIOUSLY THERE ARE REALLY CHEAP THINGS ON THE OTHER SIDE OF THE SPECTREM  I WOULD ALSO STAY AWAY FROM BUT AS FOR THESE, THESE ARE PERFECT! WELL MADE, SOLID AND REASONABLY  PRICED!

Recently it has started to cause the Blu-Ray player to need to be unplugged and then plugged back in at times to turn on, so it may be time for a new one. However, it was very inexpensive and did the trick at the time I purchased it.

Reviews.Title: Great cables
Reviews.Author: Azhrei
Reviews.Content: These are just as good as any expensive cable you can get in Best Buy (I cant' believe people STILL fall for those $80 cords in this day and age). I bought 3 of these, and a pack of couplers: Cable Matters (2 Pack) Gold-Plated High Speed HDMI Female Coupler 3D & 4K Resolution-Ready and they all work perfectly fine unlike the cheap arse $2 cords I got off here at first that fried 3 U-verse boxes (just the HDMI ports on them actually but that's all it needed to do to make the boxes useless).My Tv's on one side of my room in the Ent. Center with my PS3 and the U-verse box etc etc. My huge desk with my Desktop PC and laptop is on the other side of the room (only about 6 feet between them though.... talking about a reg bedroom..). I have one of Amazon's cables hanging off the Uverse Box behind the TV, another "hanging" out of (and clipped to the side of the Ent. Center's inner "wall") the 1st HDMI port on my TV, and one coming out of my PC's monitor. Basically using them as port extenders so I dont' have to struggle to find the actual port on whichever device.... Then I use the couplers I linked to connect these to the ends of a 25 foot cord I have snaked out of sight through my closet going from one side of the room to the other. So I can basically watch tv (from the Uverse box) on my PC monitor or route my laptop's picture to my actual TV. I could even route one of my game consoles to the PC monitor if I wanted or needed.

I haven't had any problems with any of them.

Reviews.Title: This is the one you want
Reviews.Author: Avid Mac
Reviews.Content: If you're the type that feels the need to pay exorbitant prices for Monster Cable products, stop reading right now.I swear, a certain part of the population walks around with an OVERCHARGE ME sign taped to their back. You want to pay $40 for one of these cables? Go right ahead. Otherwise, do a little research and you will learn that except for the very, very cheap models, these cables all do the same thing. Amazon makes a good HDMI cable and charges a fair price. What more do you want?

You have several length choices.  I like this because I prefer to purchase cables as short as possible.  There's enough junk behind all my electronics without having excessive lengths.Highly recommended.

Reviews.Content: I've ordered a few of these and if you look around you might find that you can order a pair of cables for only a few cents more but they do get out lickety split and they do what they are made to do.

Reviews.Title: Works for me!
Reviews.Author: Andrew W.
Reviews.Content: It's digital people.  Unless you are having noise problems...the cheapest cable is all you need.  Especially this one...which will remain plugged in and undisturbed...so it doesn't need any special strain relief or covering...It does what it needs to and doesn't break the bank.

Reviews.Title: Very effective and useful accessory.
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: This allows me to use my computer in new ways. The data transmission quality is certain with this quality cable.

Reviews.Title: HDMI Cable
Reviews.Author: Russ Messersmith
Reviews.Content: Price was right works great.  I would recommend this cable.  Be sure to order one with the Roku as it does not come with one.

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly.
Reviews.Author: D. Sheffield "D-very"
Reviews.Content: This cable works!  No need to waste extra money on some name brand 'high performance' cable.  One caveat: if the devices your connect are close to each other consider the 1.0 meter cable.

Reviews.Title: Great HDMI Cable
Reviews.Author: David H.
Reviews.Content: I have purchased so many of these cables over the past year and haven't had a single problem. They feel substantial and I have had no problems with it.

Reviews.Title: Good HDMI cable
Reviews.Author: Paca
Reviews.Content: This is all I needed to connect the TV to a Blue Ray player.  Although the player has wifi capability, I like the reliability of having a cable.

Reviews.Title: Works great, great price
Reviews.Author: Scott Willis "Technophile"
Reviews.Content: Works great, seems rugged, great price.  I've bought about 6 of these and they all worked.  A more flexible cable would be nice, not sure that's technically feasible.

Reviews.Title: New Wall Mounted TV
Reviews.Author: Shopper
Reviews.Content: This cable was long enough to allow the DTV receiver to plug into the 55" TV, works great. Best price...not different hat the original shorter monster HDMI cable

Reviews.Title: It works as expected, and it looks really durable, so I'm very satisfied with this Amazon Basics High-Speed HDMI Cable
Reviews.Author: Enrique
Reviews.Content: It works as expected, and it looks really durable, so I'm very satisfied with this Amazon Basics High-Speed HDMI Cable

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Jared Guest
Reviews.Content: Why pay so much for these cables in a store, when Amazon has them super cheap?  They work great.  I have a few of them.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: kyle
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the quality of the cables. Honestly it's straightforward and as advertised. The price is unreal, don't hesitate to buy.

Reviews.Title: Great price, great quality
Reviews.Author: Viet
Reviews.Content: This hdmi cable works just as well as the more expensive hdmi cables from retail stores at 1/3 the price. You decide!

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Ray in Kansas
Reviews.Content: This is everything the ad said it was. We could see a different in picture quality. We had only 3/4 screen picture but after adding this product we now have a full screen with a HD picture. I would recommend this to all.

Reviews.Title: Does what it says.
Reviews.Author: Debra
Reviews.Content: My only complaint is that I just got the new 13 inch macbook pro and when I plug the cord in its actually thicker than my laptop so it doesn't lay flat on the desk. Not a huge concern as I only plug it in to watch movies and do not type while it is plugged in.

Reviews.Title: It is a cable
Reviews.Author: B. Rob "B.R."
Reviews.Content: It is an HDMI cable, and it works perfectly fine. No reason to spend two to three times as much for an HDMI cable. Currently using it to connect laptop to a 50" LED tv and it sends the 1080 signal perfectly fine.

Reviews.Title: Great Price
Reviews.Author: Kelsey Evans
Reviews.Content: It works as it is supposed to work. Makes watching TV from my laptop easy! It is worth the money.

Reviews.Title: works great!
Reviews.Author: Susan Campbell "monkeymama"
Reviews.Content: It was just what we needed!  it is exactly as advertised, plugs in great, and works fine. Thanks! good luck!

Reviews.Title: Happy Wallet
Reviews.Author: Fillipe O.
Reviews.Content: You just cannot beat the price for the quality you are getting in this product. Don't even think of going to a local retailer because they mark up the price significantly. Be smart and get one of these. Your wallet will thank you later.

Reviews.Title: Functional Cable
Reviews.Author: Isaac
Reviews.Content: It is exactly what I expected when I ordered it. I'm guessing there's something not correct between my computer and the TV however, because when connected over HDMI instead of VGA (which has been working great), I lose my surround sound audio and there's a 1" black border all the way around. Updating video drivers, etc didn't solve the problem, so I just went back to VGA video and separate audio outs. Not 100% sure it's the cable's fault however, and it does function.

Reviews.Title: Best HDMI Cables for the monet
Reviews.Author: joshmoutlon
Reviews.Content: I've been purchasing Amazon Basics brand cables for a while now, great quality and great prices! Who couldn't be any happier?

Reviews.Title: Works well and a bargain
Reviews.Author: anonymous
Reviews.Content: Works well and a bargain; no problems at all.  That's all I can say andI'm making stuff up to complete your word requirement now

Reviews.Title: HDMI cables!
Reviews.Author: CPS
Reviews.Content: I bought this cable because Amazon rocks, and two, the reviews were ranked very high. I needed a short HDMI cable for my new Roku (they don't come with the cable), and Amazon had it, and the price was half of the big box competitors.Amazon has your cables covered!

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: susie
Reviews.Content: I got this for my daughters christmas gift tv for the bedroom and it works just fine. The price was good.

Reviews.Title: Great Find!!!!!
Reviews.Author: T. Credit  New Orleans,LA
Reviews.Content: Great fit, just what I was looking for... It was the exact match!!!!  Less money for a good item. thanks!!!!

Reviews.Title: great HDMI cord
Reviews.Author: Dave S.
Reviews.Content: basic cord, does the job well. inexpensive. paired with an apple tv and it looks great. plenty of length, too (that's what she said).

Reviews.Title: FINALLY
Reviews.Author: Lorilynn
Reviews.Content: I am finally able to attach my new monitor to my computer. love the visual effects on the new monitor and i know its because of the new connection.

Reviews.Title: Does exactly what it says
Reviews.Author: Alexander Landes
Reviews.Content: It's a HDMI cable honestly, it does exactly what it says it does no questions asked. I've had no problems with it.

Reviews.Title: Awwww yissss!
Reviews.Author: mastacj
Reviews.Content: I hate paying retail prices for things like cables.  I needed a longer HDMI cable and this did the trick.  Works great!

Reviews.Title: Unexpected Girth
Reviews.Author: Andrew Hyon
Reviews.Content: Works as advertised and it does its job.I did run into an issue where the sound would auto adjust but I haven't tested to see if its the computer or the HDMI cable.The cable was unexpectedly thick

Reviews.Title: Very pleased
Reviews.Author: Jacobv
Reviews.Content: I took a shot with this HDMI cable and figured it it wasn't good I didn't waste a lot of money on it. But I was not dissapointed with it. I wouldn't hesitate to buy another one

Reviews.Title: Fixed video game lag
Reviews.Author: Jason J.
Reviews.Content: We purchased a new TV and my son was sure that his video game was not operating properly because of the TV. I replaced my old HDMI cable with an AmazonBasics High-Speed HDMI Cable. Problem solve.  I can't say for sure it was the connection but it seemed to have work.  Nice solution for 6 buck!

Reviews.Title: Works good!
Reviews.Author: Alessandra
Reviews.Content: I bought this in conjunction with the HDMI to Wii adapter as another user suggested that it brings audio back and forth, and it does, well spent too and the length is just right! Keep making good cords Amazon!

Reviews.Title: SFSG
Reviews.Author: Kathleen J. Putzig "blue stocking"
Reviews.Content: Nae problems. It didn't register once but a re plug in fixed that. Any other issues I'll let you know

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: parabasz
Reviews.Content: HDMI cables have become commodity items, thankfully, after the extremely high prices in the early years. This cable works as it should, and for a very reasonable price. What more can I say?

Reviews.Title: Very Good Quality Cables!
Reviews.Author: O. Gonzalez "nycwolf"
Reviews.Content: Amazon Basic Cables seem to be the best Cables I have ever been able to find. They just work and they don't feel cheap like so many other cables do. No, I don't work for Amazon. If these cables were crappy, I would warn you all to steer clear of them.

Reviews.Title: Good Quality
Reviews.Author: Jobringer
Reviews.Content: I ordered four of these cables for various components and they all work perfectly.  They really feel high quality and are more sturdy than my other HDMI cables.  Would recommend to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Quality
Reviews.Author: BR "Riperoo"
Reviews.Content: Man, for the bang for the buck, these can not be beat, they are higher quality and a fraction of the cost to other HDMI cables, be aware that they are slightly larger, the plastic piece that holds the connector, than most, so that can cause trouble in some applications, such as having a case or cover on something that would interfere. I have encounterd no such issues on any that I have used, but it should be taken in to considerations.

Reviews.Title: Ordered this instead of Monster
Reviews.Author: NomdePlume
Reviews.Content: So I read the reviews that said why spend $120 for a monster cable when you can spend $5 for a basic one and I figured we had nothing to lose by trying this out.My husband plays video games and has not noticed any difference, we watch HD and have not noticed any difference...Perhaps there is some minuscule difference, or a longer warranty or ???  But for $5 we don't care.PS. The reason we purchased a new HDMI cable? Our original (expensive) Monster HDMI cable stopped working!!!!

Reviews.Title: HDMI goodness
Reviews.Author: S. Calvin
Reviews.Content: I can't tell you much about an HDMI cable, honestly i don't know. I got this one because, when we got a new blue ray player on black friday, we grabbed the inexpensive on off the shelf at target, it was a ge something or other. Anyways the ge one kept dropping signal, strange enough, but i lost the receipt so i ordered this one. Price point was way better, and it works, seems nicely built, and no issues what so ever with it. So it have my vote!

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: RG
Reviews.Content: I would say it's good enough. We had it for a few weeks and so far so good, specially for the price.

Reviews.Title: Awsome
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: Who ever doesn't own an HDMI cable yet will do themselves a huge favor by purchasing this product, for this price i couldn't ask for more.

Reviews.Title: Long enough to do anything
Reviews.Author: Anthony Bright
Reviews.Content: I got the 2m cable (i think) and it works just fine. It's well made, durable, and the price is great.

Reviews.Title: Work perfectly
Reviews.Author: K
Reviews.Content: I bought two - one for a Roku, one for my cable box. After a year, I have absolutely no complaints.

Reviews.Title: Great cable
Reviews.Author: Joshua Ackerman "Hebrew__Hammer"
Reviews.Content: This is as good as any $20 hdmi cable you will find. I own two of these now and never had an issue.

Reviews.Title: Like always great HDMI!!
Reviews.Author: Aaron Trujillo
Reviews.Content: Good product I can always count on these amazon hdmi cord to be good never had a problem with the ones I've order before. Come on time for delivery.

Reviews.Title: Great HDMI cable!
Reviews.Author: Hec6
Reviews.Content: After using the HDMI cable, once, I feel very satisfied with this cable. I have another HDMI cable being used for my Xbox 360, but I feel lazy just switching the cables and all of that, which is a hassle for me. This HDMI cable doesn't really have any difference with other cables, but it gets the job done. Especially, it's a great offer, instead of paying $20+ for just one cable even for a 6.5 foot cable. I recommend this cable to everyone who don't want to pay for an expensive cable and who just want a basic cable.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Eileen Rivera
Reviews.Content: The price is superb! The same cable at Wal-mart was 4 times the price!  These cables are working just great!

Reviews.Title: Cool...
Reviews.Author: Minori Yoselowitz
Reviews.Content: I wouldn't know the quality unless I compare 2 same tv with this HDMI cable and different brand HDMI cable next to each other and see what the difference could be...but I can't complain. It's a nice product and super cheap.It works and I'm happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Works just fine
Reviews.Author: Eric Schwarz
Reviews.Content: For those folks who are concerned about not paying through the nose for an HDMI cable rest assure that this works just as well as the excessively priced cables offered by other vendors.

Reviews.Title: nice cable at 1/2 the price of stores
Reviews.Author: Sharon Juchnowski
Reviews.Content: been using the cable since last week and been working great!works better than cables that cost twice as much.would buy more like this

Reviews.Title: Great cable!
Reviews.Author: N. Smith "Salz78"
Reviews.Content: Great cable at a great price.  Don't waste your money on $100 HDMI cables, these work perfectly.  Amazon Basics is always great.

Reviews.Title: Best HDMI Cable
Reviews.Author: Jake Conley
Reviews.Content: Best high quality HDMI cable, you cant beat this purchase anywhere else, and the price is just amazing! I have purchased over 5 of these and loved everyone of them!

Reviews.Title: Cable works great!
Reviews.Author: Marcia Murphy
Reviews.Content: This cable arrived as promised and works great!  It was a gift for my daughter and she loves watching movies on TV.  I would definitely recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use and works great
Reviews.Author: Jennifer C. Wall
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and works great, and a great price.  No complaints here. Shipped fast as well.  What's not to love?

Reviews.Title: 2 day shipping so it came quick
Reviews.Author: M1ck
Reviews.Content: I got it for my laptop so I wouldn't have to keep switching out the cord for my ps3. It works just as well as any other hdmi cord. It does have amazon written on both ends of the cord

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: lisae156
Reviews.Content: I got an HDMI cable from Fred Meyer that was super crappy, it flicked on and off and gave me red specks on the screen. This one was way cheaper and works!

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: Johnny "Online Surfer"
Reviews.Content: Another nice amazon product. Works great and does the intended job. Definitely recommend it to anyone. I should have gone with the 3 ft option, but thats okay.

Reviews.Title: Reliable and priced right
Reviews.Author: P. Higginbotham "RedZeppelin"
Reviews.Content: I'm using two of these cables in my HT setup now and they both work great.  They feel quite sturdy and the connections are solid. These are the only HDMI cables you need.

Reviews.Title: Good Quality and Great Price
Reviews.Author: W. Horton "handh"
Reviews.Content: The big box stores overcharge for their HDMI cable.  AmazonBasics are of the same quality and inexpensive enough to keep a spare around.  (Leave a cable in each TV and just move the Roku around between sets.)  Second or third AmazonBasics cable we've bought.  I also like the AmazonBasics computer sleeve--same quality as the "name brand" but with a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Crazy4mykids
Reviews.Content: This cable works great for my Toshiba laptop to my TV.  I have wanted to be able to hook a laptop up to our television for quite a while, and was pleased to finally figure out what cable I needed.  I have only used it a few times since receiving it, but so far so good!  Well worth the price!

Reviews.Title: Why
Reviews.Author: psh8989
Reviews.Content: Why do people pay so much for HDMI cables when you can get deals like this on Amazon? These cables are great and fit the needs of 99.9% of the people who need HDMI cables. It's an -especially- good value if you have Prime.If you know of anyone needing to purchase HDMI cables, be a real friend and direct them here...and remember - friends don't let friends buy Monster Cables in good conscience.

Reviews.Title: as good as other brand name HDMI cable but cheaper!
Reviews.Author: DJN
Reviews.Content: what more can you say..the cable was sturdy and worked right off the bat - and for the price...you can't beat this

Reviews.Title: Well made, works great
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Alderman
Reviews.Content: No reason to spend the crazy prices most stores ask for HDMI.  This one is as good as any of them.

Reviews.Title: Adequate as expected
Reviews.Author: C. Courtney "TAZ"
Reviews.Content: Build quality is decent but not spectacular, it's functional as expected.  I'd buy it again if I needed another HDMI Cable.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: Dray Thomas
Reviews.Content: This product does what it was made for great . Keep me pleased and happy to have it. If some one plan to get this product it great and works , your hard earn money will not go down the drain.

Reviews.Title: Good purchase
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: I used them to attach my Roku to my TV. They work great and are very sturdy. They arrived as promised and were packaged well.This is a good purchase.

Reviews.Title: Cheap and Good!!
Reviews.Author: Laurie H.
Reviews.Content: The price is right and the quality is good.  Would buy these again.  They worked great.  Other cords out there are more expensive - but these do a great job for less.

Reviews.Title: Why bother with any other brand??
Reviews.Author: Matt R "NolaSicilian"
Reviews.Content: It's a well known fact that ALL HDMI cables are pretty much the same, and if you buy any other brand like Monster, you're an idiot who just throws their money away. These are excellent cables. I'd never buy them again from anywhere else. Especially considering how much places like Best Buy try to charge for something as simple as an HDMI cable when they KNOW they're ripping people off. And they wonder why they're struggling and losing business to companies like Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Does the job cheaper …
Reviews.Author: E. Rogers "Bullit"
Reviews.Content: This HDMI cable works between my devices and my Sony Bravia. It doesn't have gold connectors but that's why I bought this for the economics. I'd recommend to a friend.

Reviews.Title: works good
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: on my smart tvPictures are clear and crispReally good dealI will probably purchase more in the future for my other devices

Reviews.Title: High Speed HDMI Cable
Reviews.Author: Neysa Zurkammer "Neysa Z"
Reviews.Content: I love this cable for watching photos and videos on my HD TV direct off my camera - from my favorite chair on the other side of the room.

Reviews.Title: Low price and good performance
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: Works great for me.  The 1.0m cables that seem to come with every device are a little too short for my TV cabinet.It's worked fine since I bought it.  Don't waste your money on the fake claims about requiring a fancy HDMI cable to get the best picture quality.  This seems to be well-constructed, and I expect it to last a long time.  I've had good luck with other 'AmazonBasics' cables as well.  They're not the absolute lowest price cable, but they're pretty close, and they seem to be made to last.  Next time I need a cable that is available from AmazonBasics, that's what I'll choose.

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: Jakintosh
Reviews.Content: Does what it describes. It's a cable. It plugs into things. Not a lot to it, except that it works.

Reviews.Title: works like a charm
Reviews.Author: Davidptapia
Reviews.Content: works perfect couldnt ask for better it does exactly as it says it should. no complaints from me at all

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: A cheap cord that performs well. My previous HDMI cable was too short and started acting up, so I replaced it with this one to connect my laptop to my tv.

Reviews.Title: It does what it's meant to do.
Reviews.Author: bonnie brooklyn girl
Reviews.Content: This HDMI cable is the right length for us.  It works perfectly, just as we expected.  Good value and very fast shipping.  Thanks, amazon.

Reviews.Title: High quality HDMI cable
Reviews.Author: J. Chu "adamantypants"
Reviews.Content: These cables are sturdy, and have a tight fit. Some cables are a bit loose at the connections which worry me sometimes. These cables are great. They're thick and I have no doubts about their durability.I haven't had to use the ethernet capability on these yet so I can't speak on it. These cables are well worth the price

Reviews.Title: Right price and it works
Reviews.Author: G. MCDONALD
Reviews.Content: I won't buy Dynex or whatever pricy brand of HDMI cords are out there because AmazonBasics' gear is cheap and works the same.  It's cheap.  It works.  There's no status to be gained by spending more for the same function.  End of story.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Kent Scott
Reviews.Content: My living room television is mounted to a wall.  All of my HDMI connection cords are fed through the wall so that they're hidden from view.  The length of this particular cord turned out to be perfect, supporting the connection between my TV and the "Apple TV" device, which is housed in a console cabinet, along with all of my other components.

Reviews.Title: Fast delivery and great product
Reviews.Author: Vikram
Reviews.Content: The cable works perfect for my ps3 without compromising the picture quality. The price is low and the delivery was fast.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal, will buy another one!!
Reviews.Author: Olivia
Reviews.Content: Love this product, works great, don't even bother spending money on something that cost more!This length works great for my xbox to tv connection. Even when my xbox was on a lower platform and the tv connections were at the top, it reached perfectly.

Reviews.Title: The price is great
Reviews.Author: Larry
Reviews.Content: I actually ordered another of these after I saw the quality of the first. The discount stores charge a lot more for no better quality.

Reviews.Title: Review For AmazonBasics High-Speed HDMI Cable (9.8 Feet/3.0 Meters)
Reviews.Author: anonymous
Reviews.Content: This is everything I could have asked for. I just wanted a long cable to connect my laptop to my TV, and this works like a charm.Very simple, and not complicated.

Reviews.Title: Works Beautifully
Reviews.Author: J. Barrett
Reviews.Content: This cable works beautifully with my Apple TV.  The cable itself is high quality (compared to some cables which seem cheap and break easily).  Definitely a great price also compared to the ridiculous price of cables in stores.

Reviews.Title: It works what more can I say?
Reviews.Author: the gamer
Reviews.Content: I got this to replace some old HDMI cables and to hopefully fix a graphics card problem unfortunately it turns out its the graphics card cause this didn't fix it. But these seem to work quiet well no problems really. Don't know what to say other then the price was pretty good compared to ones you can get at retail stores such as walmart. You don't need to pay over 10 dollars for an HDMI cable cause it will be about the same quality as this but also you should be a bit hesitant to pay less then this from other places cause those cables might not work to well. Hope my review helped.

Reviews.Title: Wire
Reviews.Author: Irene Gray
Reviews.Content: Yep it works and does what it says. I am wondering why you need more info & if you will even publish this?It is worth it

Reviews.Title: No Frills, Great Price
Reviews.Author: Kevin C
Reviews.Content: Great cable at a great price.  I have a couple of these and they work as advertised.  Much cheaper than what you can find at the local big box stores.

Reviews.Title: Works as well as the $40 cables at Best Buy
Reviews.Author: Eric J.
Reviews.Content: Please, don't ever buy an HDMI cable at any retail store, unless they're selling it as cheap as this. I never got why stores jacked up the prices on these cables, when they all (more or less) function the same. This cable works great, although don't be too rough with it. I was careless with it a couple times, and every now and then I need to unplug/then replug it back in for the output to display. Other than that, no problems with it at all.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy with it
Reviews.Author: A. Arditi
Reviews.Content: Cheap cable, looks of solid build quality. Ordered along with a new Roku 3 and they both seem to be working flawlessly.  No complaints about the cable at all.  Don't waste your money on more expensive cables that are indistinguishable from this one.

Reviews.Title: Connector
Reviews.Author: David E Rupert
Reviews.Content: Just needed a new type of connection for my new Blue Ray so I ordered the Amazon brand because I am cheap. It fits fine, is the right length and our video and audio is perfect. Why pay more?

Reviews.Title: High Speed Cable 4 Sony S3100 Blu-Ray Player
Reviews.Author: Gary Brown
Reviews.Content: Sony does it again with another wonderful product, the wife cant get me out of my chair but with this Blu-Ray player I DONT CARE.

Reviews.Title: High quality for the price
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Very sturdy, well made cable.  I have used it to connect cable set top box (STB) to 70" LCD TV across the room.  Works great.

Reviews.Title: As advertised.
Reviews.Author: C. Malaise
Reviews.Content: l purchased this to hook up my ROKU. HDMI is HDMI regardless of cost. Worked just as l had expected.

Reviews.Title: Small in Size, Works Great!
Reviews.Author: Heather A
Reviews.Content: I needed a smallish cable to connect my TiVo and Xbox One together and this did the trick. It works great and feels very substantial. It's not thin and wiry like some of the other less-expensive HDMI cables.

Reviews.Title: Worked!
Reviews.Author: MaSu
Reviews.Content: 5 stars, because it works!Used it with a VGA to HDMI converter, the signal is clear and precise. Would definitely recommend!

Reviews.Title: Great fit for Roku
Reviews.Author: Shapefella
Reviews.Content: I needed a short HDMI cable to connect my Roku to the HDMI on the back of my T.V.  This cable is perfect and well priced.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Angela Nations
Reviews.Content: This cable is exactly what I needed. I bought it to use with Google Chromecast. I had to return that because it wouldn't work with my modem. I saved it though and am now using it with my new Apple TV.Fast service, cable was in excellent condition, great price.I'm very happy.

Reviews.Title: It's an HDMI cable
Reviews.Author: Zachariah Lorenzini
Reviews.Content: It works. What more can I say? I am using this particular cable to hook a computer to a TV in my bedroom to watch movies. It does it's job admirable and was a good value. I like the way the Amazon logo looks on the plugs.

Reviews.Title: needed this !
Reviews.Author: caffeine "gadget lover"
Reviews.Content: who doesn't need another HDMI cable these days? Bought a Roku streaming player and it requires one to hook up to the TV apparatus, so here it is ! Easy purchase and cheaper than bothering to go to the actual brick and mortar store

Reviews.Title: Works great connecting a laptop to a screen.
Reviews.Author: Y. Lavy
Reviews.Content: I bought it to test a connection between my laptop to an external screen.At this price it was really a bargain and it works as expected.Still need to check how's the ethernet over HDMI works so I'll update once done.This one is a no brainer, make sure to buy just length you'll need so you won't have to worryabout cable management solutions.As always, it came with Amazon frustration free packaging which is always welcome, comparingwith the shameful packaging coming from other vendor and sellers.

Reviews.Title: Very good product
Reviews.Author: Lona85 "Diego Lonardoni"
Reviews.Content: The HDMI cable works perfectly between my MacBook Pro (with Mini DisplayPort - HDMI cable adapter) and my TV full HD, both for video and audio. Very cheaper, recommended purchase.

Reviews.Title: HDMI Cable
Reviews.Author: a-ron
Reviews.Content: I needed something for a few dollars to get free super saver shipping and remembered I needed an HDMI cable, so I grabbed this one. Good price and works as described.

Reviews.Title: tv
Reviews.Author: Julius Resnik
Reviews.Content: Just made a big difference on the picture of our tv. We had no idea that it would be so good

Reviews.Title: it works and continues to work
Reviews.Author: T. Crisman "Johnny Dangerously"
Reviews.Content: It's an HDMI cable that works, and has for at least 6 months now without problems.  AmazonBasics gets it right here as far as functionality goes, could do without their logo on it, but nothing is ever perfect.

Reviews.Title: Fast shipping, quality product.
Reviews.Author: Dakota Groves
Reviews.Content: I needed an hdmi cable to connect my new media center to my tv and I'm glad I went with Amazon on this one. Very sturdy and quality construction, works like a charm.

Reviews.Title: Bought for hubby
Reviews.Author: Shoppergirl
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my hubby to go along with the Apple TV I got him for Christmas.  Does what it's supposed to do.

Reviews.Title: It's an HDMI cable, what more do you want?
Reviews.Author: Allan
Reviews.Content: Sometimes in the past I've had problems with HDMI cables not being the right color.  Some were too black.  Some weren't black enough.  Some just had too much of a rubbery feel to them.  You know what I'm talking about.  It can be frustrating when you spend hours scouring the web to find an HDMI cable with just the right rubber content in the insulation only to open the package and see that the tint and feel didn't match exactly with the picture.  Annoying, I know.I heard about this cable while attending a meeting of the local chapter of HDMICE (pronounced HD MICE, stands for HDMI cable enthusiasts) but was justifiably skeptical.  How could any cable match up to the hype behind it?  I was hesitant, but in the end, my excessive (and somewhat troublesome) infatuation with all things Amazon got the better of me.  My wallet felt lighter, but I felt like a weight was on my shoulders as I waited for it to arrive.  My wife told me I needed to get some counseling, but she's been saying that a lot lately so I don't think it had to do with the cord.When it arrived, I found my hands shaking as I performed the necessary box opening rituals prescribed by HDMICE.  As the rituals removed all traces of bad HDMI cord heeby jeebies, I felt a warmth accompanied by a glowing light worthy of getting a new wand from Ollivander's coming from the cord.  I realized then that it's true what they say: the cord truly chooses the cinemaphile.Suffice it to say, I have ceased using or buying any other HDMI cords from that point on.  I can happily say that this cable is remarkably adept at transporting pictures and sound in the form of digital bits of information.  It also is nice and cabley, which is a real plus in an HDMI cable.  I am a very satisfied customer.

If you do not tie up monster cables nicely their weight will actually start to deform the cable and deform the hdmi slot on the receiver, tv, etc. The lightness of this cable prevents that and the speeds are basically identical. Solid purchase for whatever I paid for it...less than ten, I know that.

Reviews.Title: Good sturdy cables and not a bad price.
Reviews.Author: David Jerrard "Gadgetus Collectivus"
Reviews.Content: I bought a couple of these last year, figuring, at just $5, let's see how good an Amazon branded cable could be.  I recently got some cheaper cables from NewEgg, which were extremely thin, flimsy things with hollow, plastic-shelled connectors, and I didn't feel like they would survive a lot of handling, so I got these, hoping they would be tougher.  They are.  The cable itself in nearly a full 1/4" thick, and the connectors are nice solid injection molded units.  Aside from the brand name, these look and feel like other, more expensive cables, like RocketFish, Monster, etc., but at a fraction of those prices.These days, if you're spending more than about $5 for an HDMI cables, you're getting ripped off.  However, many of those cheap cables look and feel cheap as well; the insulation is hard and plastic-like, the connector housings are hollow sounding and the connectors themselves are sometimes loose.  These cables, while being a good thickness, are still quite flexible, about on par with the much more expensive Monster cables I have, and they do not look or feel cheap in any way.These do support 3D, as that was the first thing I tested with them.  The insulator isn't a shiny smooth coating and thus doesn't snag or cling onto other cables as readily as some other shinier cables would, which makes working with these a bit easier.I also bought some Twisted Veins cables through Amazon, and gave those five stars as well.  They're actually cheaper than these ( I bought a set of four for a total of $8), but for the qualities that matter, these are about the same.  As I mentioned earlier, these are at the upper range of what you should pay for HDMI cables, and you're getting a pretty good deal here.

Reviews.Title: A Lot of Cable for the Price
Reviews.Author: CoffeeMusing
Reviews.Content: HDMI cable is strikingly expensive, but unbelievably useful.  At the time I purchased this cable, I was on the road, and through the years, it's been a pleasure to have around, and generally one of the better things I carried.Pros:+ If you travel a lot, an HDMI cable is ridiculously useful.  Want to watch a movie in your hotel, boom, HDMI cable.  Need to hook up to a projector, pow, HDMI cable. How about linking up that Xbox you forgot the cable for, whelp, it does that too!+  At 10 feet, AmazonBasics' HDMI is less than a $1 a foot, which is an awesome value.+  The cable is super durable, and made of thick plastic.  It comes with end caps too, probably for shipping, but they keep it dust free.+  Video quality looks superb, and there are almost never audio issues.Cons:-  Basically, at nearly 10 feet, and made out of thicker plastic, sometimes it's hard to maneuver.Other than storage and guiding it into narrow or tight spaces, this cable is a fantastic cable for the money.  I even bought a second to have one at work.  If I were to ever need another HDMI cable, I'd almost immediately buy another one.
