Reviews.Content: Not sure what else to say here, I use this on my 1080p equipment and it works just as advertised.

Reviews.Title: Good product.
Reviews.Author: Sergio Garcia
Reviews.Content: Works perfectly. Foolproof and straightforward. At a great price. Should've bought more. Don't need to spend any more for this quality of cables.

Reviews.Title: It just works fine
Reviews.Author: Razvan
Reviews.Content: This product does the job that it says.Maybe it could be a little bit pricey, for a 2 meter cable.Other than that it is very good product.

Reviews.Title: Good cable
Reviews.Author: K. Cook
Reviews.Content: Very solid budget cable. For the money I would recommend the twisted veins cables. The shielding and outer braid are better and you get a right angle connector as part of the package.

Reviews.Title: a must have for your blue ray for internet connections
Reviews.Author: Kerry reidy
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up and six feet long . Ethernet is  in the cable .for under six bucks , a steal .

Reviews.Title: HDMI cable
Reviews.Author: R. Pimenta
Reviews.Content: This cable works just fine and come with really useful protectors! A perfect buy! But beware of the size, buy the one that fits your needs.

Reviews.Title: Works well and priced cheaply!
Reviews.Author: L. A. Friedman
Reviews.Content: Great HDMI cable at the right price.  Would certainly have hated to pay $15 dollars or more at one of the big box stores like Best Buy.

Reviews.Title: It is fine
Reviews.Author: Shannon Thomas
Reviews.Content: What can I say about this. It works as it is supposed to work. Very timely company and will deal with them in the future.

Reviews.Title: great cables for the money
Reviews.Author: mickyray
Reviews.Content: These cables wrok on my blue rsy yo tv just ss well as any. Good value. No need to spend extra money

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Dennis Sparks
Reviews.Content: It was just the right length, short, and served the exactly purpose that we needed it for.  The price also was too good to be true - but it was.  Great!

Reviews.Title: Good Buy
Reviews.Author: Dennis C. Brown
Reviews.Content: Not sure what you can say about an item such as this. Purchased for a good price and arrived in a timely fashion exactly as described. Cable is heavy and heads appear of great quality. And it works. When I have need for another HDMI cable of this length I would definitely return to this source for the new purchase.

Reviews.Title: No Reason to pay more
Reviews.Author: E. Kfir "edank"
Reviews.Content: For a short length cable, there is absolutely no reason to buy anything fancy. There is no difference quality wise (audio or video).That being said, if the length works for you it works perfectly.I have a couple of these cables to connect my tv to the xbox and another media device.I like that the head isn't big so it fits easily in any hdmi input i used it with.

Reviews.Title: Works Perfectly
Reviews.Author: Christopher Flood
Reviews.Content: This works perfectly with my Monoprice Adapter in order to connect my MacBook Pro and my TV. Just like others have said, don't be fooled by people saying that audio is not supported. If no audio comes at first, check the settings on your computer.

Reviews.Title: Great !
Reviews.Author: Aj
Reviews.Content: Sufficiently long. Can plug in the laptop from any corner of the room and enjoy. Works very well! Happy with the purchase!

Reviews.Title: good fit
Reviews.Author: Samantha
Reviews.Content: I liked this. I needed a new cord and this one is doing the trick. Works with my cable and tv.

Reviews.Title: Works great, would buy again!
Reviews.Author: Charlie Shaw
Reviews.Content: It's the perfect length (6.5ft) and works great! I recommend going for a longer length (6.5ft) than the 3.5ft just in case you change your TV set up.The cord gives me 1080p on my new TV while hooked up to my PS3. Couldn't ask for better.

Reviews.Title: exactly as promised
Reviews.Author: jesse cotton
Reviews.Content: arrived quickly and exactly as promised. I have yet to test them out because i bought them as spares to the one I have already but I am sure that they will work just fine.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: alewawa
Reviews.Content: good job, guys!Your cost is perfect for russian student. I thank you for the goodsFrom russia with big love.

Reviews.Title: Excellent cable.
Reviews.Author: D. Morgan
Reviews.Content: Seems to be a excellent cable. The plug if firm without being overly so. The connectors appear to be well made; as well as the cable over all.

Reviews.Title: The cable works awesome with my computer and smart TV
Reviews.Author: Sandip
Reviews.Content: wanna see your presentations or eBook on your TV, there is nothing else than this cable .. just connect between HDMI ports of your laptop and TV , change the source on TV and enjoy ..

Reviews.Title: Another great addon.
Reviews.Author: David E. Ward
Reviews.Content: This item was also an add on with my sound bar and was used to hook up my blue ray, great price.

Reviews.Title: Does What It Says
Reviews.Author: Matt Porter
Reviews.Content: This is your standard, up to date HDMI cable. It does what it says, and it does it well. 3 feet is a perfect size, as I carry this around in my backpack, and didn't want it to take up too much space. If you need a quality HDMI cable, get it here, and save yourself $20.

Reviews.Title: Great Price For Item
Reviews.Author: Michelle Butler
Reviews.Content: We purchased this to go with our new blue ray player.  It works perfectly and at a really great price compared to prices for the same item.

Reviews.Title: Thank you Amazon!
Reviews.Author: Fishing Dries
Reviews.Content: We use these for our game systems and they work great.  So glad that Amazon sells these for a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Always buy your HDMIs from Amazon
Reviews.Author: Shannon
Reviews.Content: To spend what Best Buy and HH charge for their low end cables is absurd.  Unless you are a high fidelity snob, there is absolutely no distinguishable results between this and the higher priced brands.

Reviews.Title: Works great, better price.
Reviews.Author: Rooon
Reviews.Content: I use this cord to watch TV from my laptop and it works perfectly. Best price I could find, so five stars.

Reviews.Title: Cheap and it works
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: These cables are great and they work. One complaint is that the connector head is a bit on the large size compared to most other hdmi cables but that doesn't really matter as it's hidden during use.

Reviews.Title: hdmi cable
Reviews.Author: OG "BDE"
Reviews.Content: not much else to say, it hasn't not done everything I wanted it wanted it to in the first place

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: Bookworm
Reviews.Content: This cable appears well made and substantial. It connected easily and the picture quality is as expected. A good buy.

Reviews.Title: Trouble-free and everything I expected.
Reviews.Author: Damir Missbrenner
Reviews.Content: Best thing about a product is not to get any surprises, as most surprises aren't the good variety.  This product did exactly that.

Reviews.Title: Excellent buy
Reviews.Author: AZ Desert Rat "movie buff"
Reviews.Content: I have come to learn that you really don't need $100 HDMI cables.  This brand has worked perfectly for me over the years I have purchased them.  I have switched back and forth between these and my Monster brand and see no difference.

Reviews.Title: Great HDMI plug!!
Reviews.Author: Kandieblu
Reviews.Content: Was perfect, durable and can't beat the price. You're getting a great deal, I have no problem with it at all.

Reviews.Title: Good, reliable, fair price.
Reviews.Author: Kaylee
Reviews.Content: Fair price for a cable that is just as good if not better than the more expensive cables, for example monster. Reliable, up to current standard. Just ordered another one for my bedroom entertainment center as a matter of fact.

Reviews.Title: It's okay
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: Ita cheap hdmi and it works wonderfully... kinda wished I bought the longer one, that was bad measuring on my part...

Reviews.Title: pretty thick
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Eddie"
Reviews.Content: I wanted to use this cable to run under my carpet.  this is the thickest HDMI cable I've ever had and is easily noticeable under the carpet.  Works just fine though and is really durable.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: liz5862
Reviews.Content: I like these cables. My local Walmart sells hdmi cables for $20 a pop. I tried to use one to hook up my sound bar to my TV, but I don't think my TV is compatible with audio cables.

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I don't know what to say about this cable other than it works and seems to be durable.  I would buy it again if I needed another one.

Reviews.Title: Amazonbasics High-Speed HDMI Cable
Reviews.Author: D. L.
Reviews.Content: This cable works good with the DAZ-HDMI-SW005-01 5-Port Smart HDMI Switcher and the short length allows you to hide it easily. Good quality cable. Good price!

Reviews.Title: Great Item!
Reviews.Author: Mij
Reviews.Content: very happy with this item. Highly recommend. Not cheaply made like some others I've seen. Great quality for the price.

Reviews.Title: Works fine.
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: This is one of those things you only notice if it's NOT working fine.  It's been working without incident for over a year now.  Expect it will continue doing so forever, and if it doesn't I'll replace it for $6

Reviews.Title: Does what its supposed to...
Reviews.Author: Desert CatMom
Reviews.Content: I bought this in order to connect my new ROKU to my HDTV.  I have done well buying Amazon labeled products in the past and this is no exception.  Nicely made and the right length.  Very pleased with it.>^..^<

Reviews.Title: Perfect Length
Reviews.Author: lawlady
Reviews.Content: I needed an HDMI cable but I hate having all those too long cords dangling.  This cord is short (3 feet) and since the DVD player is right under the TV, this was the perfect length

Reviews.Title: Good low priced HDMI....
Reviews.Author: Douglas W. Fielder
Reviews.Content: Some of the local retailers think these are made out of "platinum with diamond dust" and charge far too much.  Good basic cable, low price and two day shipping with Amazon Prime....

Reviews.Title: Really work for me
Reviews.Author: nelson
Reviews.Content: The cable work the only thing that i didnt like is that i was to short thats the only thing that didnt like it

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: mcole
Reviews.Content: This is a great product and everything was as the ad promised.Thanks for a good product and fast shipment.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Author: Terry L Sills
Reviews.Content: I'm happy with it. Works just a good as the more expensive cables. With Prime it was free shipping, that's always a plus.

Reviews.Title: What can I say--it's a cord
Reviews.Author: WordLover "WordLover"
Reviews.Content: My adult son always touts the value and quality of Amazon Basics, so I follow his advice. Does the job.

Reviews.Title: Good cheap cable
Reviews.Author: crystal denice palacios
Reviews.Content: The only thing I wish I would have done was buy the two pack I think it is a better deal and you can never have to many hdmi cables

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Jonathon D. Berliner
Reviews.Content: These cables are put together well, made very sturdy, and with top notch material  The cables sent were as described and are excellent -- perfect!

Reviews.Title: Great Cord
Reviews.Author: M. Prince
Reviews.Content: I have bought several of these cords for myself and family members,  they work great and the price is a lot better than anywhere else.

Reviews.Title: Fast and Cheap
Reviews.Author: Daniel Lytle "tech god"
Reviews.Content: This is a great product. Why pay more for a name brand when you can get a fantastic cable for this amazing price? I bought this for my Roku, and the video comes through crystal clear to my HDTV. Could not be happier with this product.

Reviews.Title: Great Cable quality build at Amazon price
Reviews.Author: ia_hwks "Go Hawks!"
Reviews.Content: This is my first Amazon Basics Cable.  I have bought several HDMI cables from one High priced Monster cable to the cheapest possible stuff.  This cable has top of the line specs, is well built and comes at a great price.  Don't waste money on some other cable.

Reviews.Title: If it's too good to be true, it probably is.  But in this case it is true!
Reviews.Author: Angela J. Anderson
Reviews.Content: This cable is so much cheaper than the cables in the big box stores. I thought it would be flimsy but nope, this cable is heavy duty. At this price you can buy an extra just in case and still save a lot of money.

Reviews.Title: Work great
Reviews.Author: Iamjustifyd
Reviews.Content: Hooked them up and they work just fine on my switch box.  Had bought 2 from a local drug store and they didn't work.

Reviews.Title: You need this!
Reviews.Author: Tracy Neri
Reviews.Content: Priority purchase if you get the Apple TV same product is 20.00 at the Apple store, look it up such a great savings!

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: AS
Reviews.Content: Works great. I ordered another one this year since the one I bought about a year ago worked perfectly. Recommended!

Reviews.Title: For my Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Cultech
Reviews.Content: I needed this for my Apple TV that I got for my husband for Christmas. I didn't realize that I needed to buy it. (I should have read further). However, what can I say about a cable? It does exactly what it is supposed to do and I needed to have it.

Reviews.Title: Welldone
Reviews.Author: Delia McGinnis
Reviews.Content: It serves it's purpose and functions well.  We are not very technologically astute but this was easy to install without any difficulty.

Reviews.Title: Good picture.
Reviews.Author: Richard Harris
Reviews.Content: These worked perfect, no problems what so ever, just plug and play, the difference in picture quality was unreal, good quality cables at an excellent price.

Reviews.Title: High Speed HDMI
Reviews.Author: Roberto Andara
Reviews.Content: The meter works great in all its measerments. I choosed this item because it looks handy but its was larger than I thought.

Reviews.Title: Why spend $70-$200 for Monster cable when this does the trick for $5
Reviews.Author: Thomas Connolly
Reviews.Content: I would love for someone to tell me the true differences, but I think it's fluff.  Why would I spend $70 on a cable from Monster when Amazon basics delivers the same quality for a fraction of the price.  I'm somewhat of an audiophile and definitely a techie, and I give this the stamp of approval.

Reviews.Title: Product stopped working after two months.
Reviews.Author: Adam
Reviews.Content: My wife and I bought this item in June 2013 to connect our computer to the T.V. so we could watch Amazon Instant Videos on our T.V. without having to buy a Roku or some device like that. It worked great for two months, and then just stopped working. All we ever did with the product was unplug from and plug it into our computer. We are not sure why it stopped working, but we would not recommend this product. However, I did just contact Amazon and they are sending me a replacement. The customer service for Amazon gets a 5 star rating. I will see how the replacement does and write more on this product at a later time.

Reviews.Title: High Quality
Reviews.Author: Justin Gross
Reviews.Content: For the price you can't go wrong with the cable. I use these my computer for streaming on twitch.tv. Their gold plated and are really great quality.

Reviews.Title: Buy 1
Reviews.Author: Christopher C Santo
Reviews.Content: It's a cable and it connects HDMI to HDMI.  There's not much more to say than that...works as it should, great deal for the price!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Garrett Kaeo
Reviews.Content: The cable is perfect. Has great length, and marked at a great price. Would never buy any other from anywhere.

Reviews.Title: Good Value ~ Heavy Cable
Reviews.Author: oldseagull
Reviews.Content: I bought the 25 ft length HDMI cable, connected it to iMac (late 2009 model) via Belkin Mini Displayport to HDMI Adapter and plugged into SAMSUNG HDMI TV.  I had shut down both computer and TV, so next step was to power up both units ~ Connection was immediate, seamless.  Only thing I needed to do was go to Preferences - SOUND and direct the sound to flow through HDMI cable to TV speakers.Now we watch college sports games online with the big TV screen.To those who might ask, I tried TV built-in wi-fi for online sports but TV kept running into "Buffering" problems.  I do not have any trouble using the computer.  It is worth the add-on to us.

ProductInfo.Features:
Ships in Certified Frustration-Free Packaging
HDMI A Male to A Male Cable
Cable allows you to share an Internet connection among multiple devices without the need for a separate Ethernet cable.
Meets HDMI 1.4 specification
